Summary: I think we made a very good decision when we booked this hotel, it is very well located, close to Disney parks, restaurants and convenience stores, it looks just like the photos on the web, everything is super clean, equipped and organized, we only had contact with one of the staff (I don't remember his name) but he was extremely friendly and cooperative. In summary, don't hesitate to stay here when you come to Anaheim and are looking for a nice and safe place to spend the night.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Clean, functional and really convenient for Disney
Summary: This is a great little hotel and so convenient for Disney.   Rooms were decent, clean and functional and free parking was great. We arrived at 07:00 for a 3pm check in as we were going to Disneyland for the day and the front desk staff were more than happy to let us park anyway - very handy.   Like most reviews have said, this is great for access to both Disney parks. Come out of the hotel, turn left and left again and 5 mins later you’re at Disney.   Both days we were there we left the park in the afternoon then returned for the evening shows. This was great for that as it was so close to the parks.   There’s a 7 Eleven nearby and a Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf right across the street (although also a coffee machine in the room too) and plenty of other restaurants nearby.   All in
Manager Response: Hey Stonylou,  Thank you for your 5 Star review! It’s always wonderful to hear our staff was attentive and friendly. We strive for excellence and are glad to know you enjoyed where our property is located. Thank you again for your kind words, we hope to see you again soon.  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: Nice and comfortable room, walking distance to Disney park and across from Anaheim convention center. Free parking at the hotel, but does charge for resort fee so I guess that is how you pay for parking. Bed is pretty comfortable too.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We've been staying at the Alpine for over 15 years and every room has always been meticulously clean and well maintained. The host is always very kind and treats us like honored guests. Great Beds and the mattresses are replaced regularly. Also, the rooms are very quiet. Anytime we visit Disneyland we stay at the Alpine.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is the friendliest and cleanest hotel I have ever stayed in. Also it is in walking distance to Disneyland. We had to get two rooms for our families and they gave us connecting rooms which worked out perfectly. We plan on staying here again when we go to Disneyland again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our first trip to Disneyland and I did a lot of research on where to stay. Alpine Inn ended up being our first choice and we had a perfect stay. We walked to the parks each day and stopped at 7-11 on the corner each morning to grab some fruit for a quick breakfast to eat as we walked. The room was clean, very quiet and the beds were comfortable. The front desk staff were friendly and helpful. If we return to Anaheim we will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This place is amazing and checks all the boxes for us. The front end staff are very friendly and personable. A special shout out to Timothy, Usman and Parth. I thank them for there kindness and their professionalism. The room was clean and very quiet. It is very apparent this hotel and their staff puts the overall guest experience above everything else and parking is free. We go to Disneyland often and this is are new go to place.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Alpine Inn was a good choice for our family of 6. We really appreciated the option to have the family suite with two connected rooms and 3 queen beds rather than two queens and a hide a bed. The rooms were well kept. The Alpine Inn is a quick 10 minute walk to the Disney Park entrance.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We LOVED our stay at the Alpine Inn. The location is absolutely fabulous and so are the friendly staff.  We booked a three night stay with two rooms and they already had us in adjoining rooms.  The room was clean and well appointed. It does not have the amenities of a Disney hotel, but I was not expecting that. The are actually inside the same city block as Disney's California Adventure. It was fun to walk walk to the parks in the morning and Downtown Disney in the evenings. If you are looking for a great place to stay, Alpine Inn did the trick for us and I'm sure will work for you too.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The property is well taken care of. Everything inside and outside was really clean. We were visiting Disneyland and really loved how close we were staying at Alpine Inn. It took us 10 minutes from the hotel to Disneyland entrance.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel isn't fancy. It's very basic but the staff was very friendly and accommodating. The hotel room was clean as was the property and the proximity to Disneyland was within a 10 to 15 minute walk. I highly recommend if you're just needing a place to sleep in between trips to the park.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Alpine Inn is in a great location for going to disneyland and California adventure. The staff were friendly and helpful. I love that they have family suites so I can have a private room and a shared bathroom with other family members without having to reserve whole second hotel room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This motel is small, but rooms are generous and super clean! Microwave and fridge, nice bathroom.  Pool and free parking. Feels safe. Hotel owner very friendly and accommodating-answered questions, helped us with directions, luggage. A very pleasant stay!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our first stay at the alpine inn.  We live in San Diego and often drive up to Disneyland and stay one night at the candy cane inn. Since the candy cane inn is closed for renovations, we went off of trip advisor reviews and tried out the alpine inn. The best thing about this hotel is the wonderful service from front desk worker America- she is a delight and aims to please! She was able to find us a room on the second floor towards the back of the property as requested- even though the motel was fully occupied. The room was clean. and comfortable but no frills at all! Our remote control didn’t work even after we asked for new batteries, but after a long day at the park we were too tired to care. We enjoyed our stay and appreciated we could park in the lot at 7am and go
Manager Response: none

Summary: This Inn is family owned!  What a fantastic place - clean and very friendly staff, from help carrying bags to friendly hellos and waves when coming and going, the hospitality here was excellent.  Thank you to Parth at the front desk - very kind!  This hotel is very convenient to the conference center, and several restaurants.  My stay was related to business, but I noticed several families here staying and going to Disney (also very convenient).
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was clean and beds comfortable. About a 15 minute walk from the Park gates. Anaheim Convention Center is right across the street, so if I ever do D23 Expo or Star Wars Celebration, this would be my top of list choice. Staff was very helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Alpine Inn was very clean.  We had fresh towels daily and because we stayed for 8 nights, our bedding was also changed for us.  The beds and pillows were very comfortable.  The gentleman who checked us in was nice.  It was only a 10-15 minute walk to the park from the hotel and there was a CVS just down the street from us as wel  as a 7-11.  We would stay here again if ever we go back to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Alpine Inn is a clean and convenient option for staying in Anaheim.  It is conveniently located within walking distance of the Disney Parks and the Convention Center.  The gentleman that helped us with our stay provided EXCEPTIONAL CUSTOMER SERVICE!  We were able to park our car in the lot on the day of our arrival before check-in.  We were also able to keep our car parked in the lot after check-out time while we visited the Disney Park on the 2nd day of our trip. Parking is free at the Alpine Inn.  The rooms are clean, comfortable, affordable,  and most of all the customer service is excellent.  I would highly recommend the Alpine Inn..
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very clean rooms and friendly staff.
Summary: If your looking for a clean, no frills play to sleep that has great costomer service Alpine Inn is great option for your family on a budget. We had a family of 7 and stayed in the family suit, it was the perfect size. The kids enjoyed the swim in the pool. It is a short walk to Disney and within walking distance to stores and restaurants. When we return to Disneyland we plan on staying here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We recently spent a week in the Disneyland area and stayed at the Alpine Inn.  The rooms were fairly basic but clean, comfortable and spacious enough for 3 adults to hang comfortably when we weren't at the Park.  They don't have the luxuries associated with all the 3 and 4 star hotels, but there's a coffee maker, fridge and microwave which were enough for us.  There is also a nice little pool - again, basic but clean and pleasant to cool down in.  It is also smaller and has more character than those generic chain hotels. The staff were very pleasant and helpful, also.  Finally, it is just over a 10 minute walk to the Disney Park entrances so coming back in the middle of the day for a break is easy, as is getting home after a long day walking and standing in lines at Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stay was great! Room was comfortable. Highly appreciated the microwave and refrigerator in the room. Very grateful for the parking allowance after check out. (Lot was not too full, we visited during a not busy time ) I was offered many parking options which was helpful.Thank you all for being friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review us. We’re glad that you enjoyed your stay here. Also that you found us to be close to Disneyland, our staff to be great and like the free parking.  Thanks again for choosing to stay with us and we would also love to welcome you back here again! We would also appreciate it that when you do decide to visit again that if you would please call us so that we may handle your reservation personally.  Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: I always tell people that the Alpine Inn is Disneylands best kept secret. What a gem of a place. I’ve been staying here for years and I’ve never had one complaint or one negative comment. This place is just the cutest. It’s got everything you could possibly need right in your room and did I mention it’s always so consistently clean and tidy. The folks that work there are always so great and the location is right around the corner from the main drag where the Disneyland entrance is. It’s a quick walk, 10-15 min depending on how quick you’re walking, not bad at all. It’s important to me to support these folks when there’s so many big companies around them. They work hard to keep a lovely little place to stay and the prices are always so practical.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to know you have already recommended Alpine Inn to your friends and family. We’re glad you enjoy our clean rooms, location and staff! Your review is greatly appreciated. Future guest will get an idea of staying at the Alpine Inn. We would also appreciate it that when you do decide to visit again that if you would please call us so that we may handle your reservation personally with a returning guest discount.   Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: The rooms were simple but clean. Microwaves and mini fridges are in the room which is great if you want to stop off at Target and cut down on your food expenses. The Disney Parks were only about a 14 minute walk away making it easy and convenient to get back to our room throughout the day. Compared to the other hotels located within walking distance to Disney, this was the most economical and honestly the room type and amenities were the same as the hotels directly across from Disney. You’re just paying around $60 less a night. We will be staying here again for our next trip.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our first visit in Disneyland CA and I’m glad that I chose this inn. Place is literally around the corner of the park, 7 eleven is just 3 min walk. The room was neat and had everything we needed (mini fridge, microwave, iron, hair dryer).. Management was accommodating, my son was surprised with the birthday greetings in the room. Highly recommended place to stay for family. We would come back here if we’ll visit Disneyland again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Clean, cheap, close to the Mouse House
Summary: It’s all in the title. For the price, I can’t fault this place, but I found the A/C to be noisy. It’s clean. It’s cheap. It’s close to Disney. The service is good. The pool is refreshing. You get what you pay for and this place ticked all the best deal in that regard.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great last minute find, the staff here are fantastic and always available. The room was spotless and comfy after a long day walking around Disney. 10 minute walk to park entrance even with a 4 year old. Ample free parking and although only small the pool is well maintained.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have been staying here for years and are always treated like family! Rooms are always clean and tidy and the staff is great! Thank you Parth and Derrick! Can’t wait to come back! Our stays are never long enough!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Fantastic to finally make a childhood dream come true!
Summary: Growing up in So Cal I remember seeing this motel nearly every trip we made to Disneyland, and it was one of the one's I always remember wanting to stay at and now is the last of those old motels left you can stay in. Living in the UK now, and decided to finally give this one a try after noticing it's great reviews and it was available on our dates for visiting Anaheim. We were not disappointed at all.   The front desk staff was very nice, including helping with our bags upstairs, after we had a very long day and I had a very tired child on my hands on my own. The cleaning staff was also very nice, when I asked one a question and one of the staff even brought my daughter and my sister a towel when they noticed them having a swim.   The rooms were very clean, well appointed with
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very clean hotel and near of the Disney Park
Summary: It's the first time I lay my head on the bed without smelling strange smells. The hotel is just around the corner right behind the Cars attraction, you can well hear the people screaming with excitement.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great little spot. Close enough to walk to Disneyland, very clean, friendly staff. They held our bag for us when we arrived in the morning and we were able to easily access our room at close to midnight.  Beds are very firm but decent quality. Would def stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Short walk to Disney main entrance (half mile). Remodeled and new feeling. Extremely helpful customer service. Safe courtyard parking area. Bathroom exhaust fans and small bathroom windows to outisde. Great price for so close to the Park. Even better price when booking directly. My new "go to" for Disney stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Perfect location for a comfortable Disney holiday
Summary: My husband and I stayed here for 3 nights in April and had a wonderful time.  The staff were friendly and helpful, and the room itself was large, clean, well decorated and very comfortable.  Really, at the price you pay for this little gem of a motel, there's nothing more you could ask for. Large desk, large chest of drawers, fridge, microwave, ironing board & hair drier all provided. The location is truly perfect for Disney. 7-10 minute walk from the gate, but the Disney noise doesn't disturb you at all. 4-5 minute walk to a giant Cheesecake Factory. Several other restaurants nearby. A CVS, 7/11 and Walgreens are all within 2 minutes also. We stayed in 5 different accommodations during our trip up the Californian coast this month, and Alpine Inn was possibly our favorite of the
Manager Response: Hi whosallyanyway,  It is an honor to be considered a perfect location for Disneyland! Our locations is only 10-15 minutes walking with so many restaurants within walking distance! I'm very glad you liked our new renovations and amenities. We would appreciate if you can call us directly so that we can personally take care of your next Disney getaway!  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great, clean, comfortable place to stay near Disney
Summary: This place had everything you need for a comfortable stay near Disney. It’s about ten minutes walk from the park entrance. It was clean and the beds are very comfortable. Also has a fridge and microwave. Great value for money stay near Disney.
Manager Response: Hi Abi379,  We really do appreciate taking time out of your day and writing us a review on your Disney trip. Thanks again for choosing to stay with us and we would also love to welcome you back here again! We would also appreciate it that when you do decide to visit again that if you would please call us so that we may handle your reservation personally.  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: We spent 3 marvelous nights at Alpine inn! The staff was great and very accomodating. We arrived at 11am, they hold on to our luggage and had the room ready only two hours later, despite the normal check-in time at 3pm. Hotel very close to Disneyland (10 mn walk). This is the place to stay to enjoy a stay in Anaheim!
Manager Response: Hello,  Our team strives to make sure your Disneyland trip is relaxing and memorable! Thank you for an awesome review and we would love to welcome you back during your next Disney trip. Give us a call directly next time so we can handle your reservation personally.  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: The Alpine Inn is a cute little hotel.  The rooms are clean.  The staff is very pleasant.  If I am 100% honest, I would not stay there again only because I am used to much nicer hotels, but it was fine and had what a person needs. It is very easy to walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback following your experience at the Alpine Inn. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and we would like to thank you for being with us.  Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: Staff was amazing and very accommodating, rooms where very clean and updated. It was super close to Disneyland and convention center and minutes to all the restaurants.  Would highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests  We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback. We look forward welcoming you back soon.  Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: Very clean room and property. Super friendly and helpful staff. Property backs up to the park so definitely a convenient place to stay to go to Disneyland. And the price is reasonable. I will consider staying here again.  A few things for management to consider…Hair dryer (wall mount style) has a coiled cord that doesn’t pull far out from the wall, making it almost impossible to use. And the soap and shampoo dispensers only dispense a microscopic amount of product that makes you push it dozens of times to get a very small amount….. almost pointless.   But these minor issues wouldn’t cause me to give a bad rating or not come back, especially with how well the staff treated us during our stay.
Manager Response: Hello,  I appreciate your taking the time to share your experience with us and for the 5 star review! Please give us a call at  (714)-535-2186, to book directly and we can offer you a repeat guest rate as well. I apologize the hair dryer cord was having  maintenance issue during your stay. Notify the front desk if there is any issues during your stay so we can do our best to accommodate our guest. The company has made a new thinner formula for the soap dispensers to make sure everything dispenses properly now. I appreciate the information and advice you have shared four our future guest.  Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: Alpine Inn never disappoints. Always clean, quiet, and a wonderful staff. Free parking and within walking distance to the parks. We have stayed here many times and will continue to do so. It's a charming little gem.
Manager Response: Hello,  We really appreciate you being a returning guest and giving us a perfect 5 star review! We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn whenever you are back in the Anaheim Area. Please give us a call @ (714)-535-2186, to book directly and we can offer you a repeat guest rate as well.  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: This was our first stay at Alpine Inn. We really enjoyed so much about this property. It was clean, with lots of storage for our 5 night stay.  The room was a decent size for two adults and two children under age 6. Our major issue with the room is the amount of light that comes in from outside. Our window was directly under one of the lights outside, so it was always very bright in our room. If you like blackout conditions for sleeping, this didn’t fit the bill for us.  The staff was great, we never tried the pool, though it seemed open, no one was interested in swimming in December in a rain storm. Free parking was awesome. Housekeeping was minimal due to the pandemic, though I’m sure it would have been great as the housekeepers were very kind when I did talk to them for a new
Manager Response: Dear karrenandjasonw,  Thank you for taking the time to write a great review for the Alpine Inn. I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us and the convivence of getting from and to the Disneyland Parks. I was able to notify our maintenance team about the sun light entering through the windows. We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn whenever you are back in the Anaheim Area. Please give us a call @ (714)-535-2186, to book directly and we can offer you a repeat guest rate as well.  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: We enjoyed our stay here. We usually stay in a different hotel, but they were booked for part of our travel days so we stayed here for one day. I would definitely consider it in the future! The staff was so friendly and welcoming, the room was extremely clean. The room, though simple, is updated (new tile in shower and vinyl plank floors, which is so much cleaner than carpet!) 3 queen beds with a separate room is a find near Disney at this price. Also free parking! The walk wasn’t too bad (just up Harbor). The Alpine Inn is charming.
Manager Response: Hey jkm5,  We appreciate you taking your time and writing us a 5 star review! I'm glad you enjoyed the remodeled rooms with vinyl flooring. We recently remodeled the entire property right before 2020. I will notify our staff of the kind words. Please call us directly @ 714-535-2186 for your future Disney vacation and we can get your a returning guest rate.   Thank you! Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this property.  The staff were so welcoming and friendly, the room had every amenity we needed and was very clean.  The bed was comfortable and we appreciated that we were able to park in their lot as we checked in early.  It is a great value compared to Disney resorts.
Manager Response: Hi,  Thank you for the 5 star review! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We will offer you a returning guest rate if you call us directly @ 714-535-2186 for your next Disney vacation.   Parth Alpine Inn

Summary: Great place to stay near Disneyland.  Wonderful office staff they make you feel so welcomed. Very clean, quiet, and very comfortable beds. You can park very close to your room.  I highly recommend this hidden treasure to stay near Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hi,  Thank you so much for the nice review. We are very glad you enjoyed your vacation with us. Our returning guest do get a special rate if you call us directly at 714-535-2186.   Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: The staff were all very nice. The rooms were clean and comfortable. They accommodated us by letting us store our bags while we visited Disneyland on our last day.  I would recommend to anyone traveling to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello,  I am pleased to hear our staff was accommodating during your Disney trip! Call us at 714-535-2186 for a special returning guest rate.  Thank you for the 5 star review!  Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: Least costly option when researching for trip to Disneyland. Super friendly and accommodating staff. Nice, clean rooms, comfy beds and great showers with nice hot water and good shower pressure. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi,  We will offer you a special returning guest rate for your next Disney trip. Call us at 714-535-2186 next time your in the Anaheim area. We really appreciate your 5 star review and the pleasant words about Alpine Inn.  Parth A.  Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great place for a great price
Summary: This is our 2nd time staying here and I highly recommend them. Rooms are super clean, nice and simple. They have a fridge and microwave which is nice when you have kids. Property was very clean and staff very friendly. Its only a 10min walk to Disneyland, close to coffee shops, pizza places and mini stores.
Manager Response: Hi,  Thank you so much for your fantastic review! We’re so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at Alpine Inn and that you especially enjoyed our convenient location and friendly staff. We can’t wait to welcome you back again soon for another Disney vacation!  Parth A.  Alpine Inn

Summary: Super convenient location to Disney! Easy walking distance. Room looked recently remodeled as it was very clean and the beds were super comfortable. The staff was quite friendly and helpful. I’d stay here again in the future, especially for another Disney trip.
Manager Response: Hi Melanie, Your 5 star review is greatly appreciated! Your words mean a lot to us and we hope our future guest will have a wonderful stay just like yours.  Thank you! Parth A.  Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel for your Disney stay
Summary: We have been staying here for every Disney trip for over 30 years. They provide a consistent, pleasant experience with clean rooms. The hotel is quiet and comfortable. The best part is that the hotel is inexpensive but doesn’t feel cheap. It is also within walking distance of Disney. The hotel staff are very nice. We will be back again!
Manager Response: Hi,  Thank you very much for your continued support all these years!  We strive to provide comfortable and affordable lodging for visitors to the Happiest Place on Earth. I thank you for your positive feed back and look forward to see you many visits in the near future.  Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: This hotel sits between a lot of bigger places and doesn't look like much from the outside, but the room was very nice and be clean.  The front desk clerk was so nice and pleasant and helpful. The parking is a little tight but there's no extra charge which was a huge plus for us!
Manager Response: Hi,  We appreciate the 5 star review! Please call us directly for a returning guest rate the next time your in the Anaheim area.   Thank you! Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Clean/Easy Walk to DL/Great Customer Service
Summary: Always a nice stay at the Alpine Inn. Easy walk to Disneyland, friendly staff, and clean room! Second stay here in 2021 and would stay here again! Only one street to cross to get to DL and it is a street that only DL transits use so you don't wait forever for the lights to change.
Manager Response: Hi,  Thank you so much for your 5 star review! We’re so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at Alpine Inn and that you especially enjoyed our convenient location. We can’t wait to welcome you back again soon for another Disney vacation! Call us direct for a special returning guest rate.  Parth A.  Alpine Inn

Summary: I have enjoyed staying at Alpine in the past, but some of the recent improvements made our most recent stay just wonderful. We only had one night, but it was quiet, clean, and cozy. The accessible room had enough space to comfortably move a wheelchair or walker and the spacious bathroom had enough grab bars to give my loved one privacy while not fearing for his safety.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for choosing Alpine inn for your lodging during your Disney vacation!  We appreciate the kind words about our renovations that were done in 2020.  We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn whenever you are back in the Anaheim Area. Please give us a call @ (714)-535-2186, to book directly and we can offer you a repeat guest rate as well.  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: The Alpine Inn staff were all very pleasant and professional. We enjoyed our stay despite the COVID restrictions such as no breakfast provided and no room service/cleaning until you leave. We just had coffee in our room and brought breakfast bars with us.  Another option is IHOP just across the street. Within an easy walk to Disneyland - you can see the back of Cars ride from the hotel parking lot.  The light bulb in our bathroom went the second day we were there. I walked across to the office to report it and it was fixed by the time we got back in the evening.
Manager Response: Hi jrobboz, We appreciate you taking your time and writing us a review! We have started serving hot beverages at the front desk from 7am-11am. I apologize for the issue during your stay and I am glad our maintenance staff was able to take care of the matter for you. We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn whenever you are back in the Anaheim Area. Please give us a call @ (714)-535-2186, to book directly and we can offer you a repeat guest rate as well.  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great clean room, very friendly host
Summary: We were there only there 1 night, but management was very accommodating and helpful. Room was very clean and beds were comfortable. Even had a microwave, very useful. Pool was clean. This was our second time staying there and would definitely go back. thanks again
Manager Response: Dear guest, We are very thankful for your 5 star review. Our team will make sure everything is wonderful during your Disney vacation.  We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn whenever you are back in the Anaheim Area. Please give us a call @ (714)-535-2186, to book directly and we can offer you a repeat guest rate as well.  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: We have been staying at the Alpine Inn for several years and keep coming back for a good value and proximity to Disneyland.  But when we arrived this trip, we were thanked for our loyalty with a stay in one of the inn's Disney themed rooms with new furnishings and Disney art work.  'Just another reason to keep returning for a snow storm year round!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write us a 5 star review!! We are so glad that our new recently remodeled Disney themed room over exceeded your expectation during this stay!  We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn whenever you are back in the Anaheim Area. Please give us a call @ (714)-535-2186, to book directly and we can offer you the repeat guest rate as well. Leave us a special request so we can place you in our Disney room during your next stay.  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Good location close to the parks
Summary: Rooms are clean with 2 queen beds, fridge, microwave and coffee maker. 4 pillows on each bed and a wall AC / Heater. Easy walk to the parks and has a small pool if you choose relax that way. Because of Covid-19 there was not room cleaning each day, but they wold give you towels if you requested and pickup your trash.
Manager Response: Hey Jerry, We are grateful for your 5 star review. I'm glad our proximity to the Disneyland parks was an short easy walk.  We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn whenever you are back in the Anaheim Area. Please give us a call @ (714)-535-2186, to book directly and we can offer you a repeat guest rate as well.  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: From the friendly welcome to the CLEAN updated room the Alpine Inn does not disappoint. The location is a ten minute walk in a safe area. No frills but great value compared to local chain hotels. I feel like I'm back in grade school having to be required to write 200 characters to give a review posted. Really ? Too much word pressure.
Manager Response: We are very grateful for your review! I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our location and friendly Alpine inn staff. We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn whenever you are back in the Anaheim Area. Please give us a call @ (714)-535-2186, to book directly and we can offer you a repeat guest rate as well.  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: Small two story motel close to Disneyland. Extremely clean and very appreciated during Covid-19. Beds are very very firm. Our unit had a microwave and mini-fridge. No housekeeping during Covid but additional towels or sheets if needed. We stayed in room 118 away from the main road. The complex has a small well kept pool. Grounds are tidy and staff welcoming. We used Uber to the park drop-off zone. No shuttles are running in the Disneyland parking lots. Haunted House was closed for remodel as were a few other attractions. In addition to purchasing your ticket/pass you MUST reserve the day of attendance on the Disneyland app. If you are spending the day in the part this is a great option at a reasonable price. I gave a lower rating on sleep quality because we had toddlers above us
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for the review and making it easier for any future guest at our property. I sincerely apologize for the issue. I have notified the maintenance department to look into the mattress in room 118. We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn whenever you are back in the Anaheim Area. Please give us a call @ (714)-535-2186, to book directly and we can offer you a repeat guest rate as well.  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: A very pleasant stay at the Alpine Inn!
Summary: We very much enjoyed our stay at the Alpine Inn. The staff was very accommodating, and had been previously very helpful when we cancelled our March 2020 reservation due to COVID. The room was spacious and clean, and the location was super convenient. The room wasn't super dark at night, however, so bring an eye mask if you need total darkness.
Manager Response: Hi,   Thank you so much for this 5 star review! We are delighted to hear that your family enjoyed our room amenities, proximity to Disneyland. We are dedicated to keeping our staff and guests safe during these uncertain times, and it is great to know that you appreciated our policies so much. We are truly sorry for the inconvenience and I have notified maintenance department. We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn whenever you are back in the Anaheim Area. Please give us a call @ (714)-535-2186, to book directly and we can offer you a repeat guest rate as well.  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: This was our second stay at Alpine. Very friendly and helpful staff. Clean, comfortable and quiet rooms and a short walk from the Park. All you need when you are spending all day with the Mouse. Spend 3 nights here for the price of one night staying in DL lodging.
Manager Response: Welcome back Guest,  We are always happy to see a familiar face when you come back to Alpine Inn! I am glad our team was able to successfully accommodate all your family needs during you Disney vacation! We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn whenever you are back in the Anaheim Area. Please give us a call @ (714)-535-2186, to book directly and we can offer you a repeat guest rate as well.  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Nice little place to stay while at Disney.
Summary: This was a nice place to stay although the rooms are very small. The staff was helpful and very nice. The pool is small but we didn’t use it bc we were obviously more interested in getting into Disney.  The location is perfect bc it’s easy walking to the entrance. The hotel is right behind the “Cars” ride area.
Manager Response: Hey Christopher,   Thank you for taking the time to write us a review about your stay. We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn. Please give us a call @ (714)-535-2186, to book directly and we can offer you a repeat guest rate as well.  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Clean/Easy Walk to DL/Great Customer Service
Summary: America and her manager were amazing!  I somehow managed to book five different rooms instead of the one I needed and did not realize this until checking in!  I was so upset to think I was going to have to pay for the first night on those extra 4 rooms.  America and her manager were so understanding and assured me I would not be charged.  They turned a stressful event into a great vacation. In the future I will book directly through Alpine Inn and skip Booking.com!
Manager Response: Hi,   We are very happy to hear that America and management were able to take care of your family during your stay with us at Alpine Inn. Thank you for giving us a 5 star review! Book directly with us and we will offer you a special returning guest rate during your next Disney getaway!  Parth A  Alpine Inn

Summary: We loved our stay at the Alpine Inn for a five night Disney trip. It was excellent, very comfortable, easy walk to the park, love the staff, quiet and very safe feeling. It backs onto the park which adds a sense of being at a Disney hotel. The walk was shady and close enough that we ended up coming back for naps then returning to the park later.  The microwave fridge and coffee maker make the stay very comfortable. It’s a family owned business and all the staff were super nice. The pool is very warm, surprisingly big and ended up adding a lot of fun to our trip.
Manager Response: Hi Dreamer00182692347,  We appreciate you taking your time to write us a 5 star review! I am glad you enjoyed the amenities Alpine inn has to offer.  We are located on the back side of Carsland at California Adventure.  We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn. Please give us a call @ (714)-535-2186, to book directly and we can offer you a repeat guest rate as well.  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: So close to Disneyland Resort.  Clean, comfortable and friendly staff. I will absolutely stay here again! Our bathroom window was on the Alamo car rental side, so the only down side was the beeps in the am when they were opening/locking the cars, but when we shut the door to the bathroom that kept out the beeps!
Manager Response: Hi,   We are so happy you enjoyed staying with us at Alpine Inn. We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn. Please book directly and we can offer you a repeat guest rate as well. We do have rooms that are considered Quiet rooms for your next Disney getaway. Thank you for the 5 star review!  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: This is not the first time I stayed at The Alpine Inn and it won’t be the last. It’s is always a nice to stay here. Always greeted with a smile and very accommodating to any request. This time when I arrive I made a last minute change on t room and it was met with no hesitation. I highly recommend this motel not only for the convenient location but also for the great service. Thank you for being a part of this wonderful trip with my nieces! In the process of making reservations for November 2021.
Manager Response: Hello Guest,  We love to see returning guest! We allow our guest to make any changes or cancel for any reason up until 2 days prior to your arrival. I'm glad our team was able to help accommodate your changes. Please call us at the hotel directly so we can get you the repeat discount. This discount should be lower than what is offered online. Looking forward to your next visit to Disneyland!  Thank you! Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Good budget motel for Disney vacation
Summary: I am rating my stay based on my expectations.   The Alpine Inn worked out really well for a girls trip that I took with my daughter    There were only 2 of us staying in the room and so we each got our own bed and felt like it was very roomy.  The room was very clean.  We appreciated that there were no comforters and no carpeting.   And lots of pillows was a bonus !   We went to Target before checking in and stocked up on breakfast foods since the free breakfast is temporarily suspended due to covid.  The room fridge was big enough for all of our foods and drinks.  We checked in around 5pm and walked over to Downtown Disney for dinner.   That night we went swimming in the motel swimming pool and we had it all to ourselves.   We were located on the 2nd floor and our room was very
Manager Response: Hello Guest,  Thank you for rating Alpine Inn with a 5 star review! Pleased to hear that you liked our renovations that was done in 2020. Glad you took advantage of the microwave and mini fridge in every room. We started serving Coffee, Tea, and Hot chocolate in the morning from 7am-11am. Call alpine Inn during your next visit to Disneyland so we can get you a returning guest rate.   Thank you! Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great little hotel in great location
Summary: We love the look of the Alpine Inn's exterior! Appreciated being able to park at the hotel and get pre-checked in so that we could spend the day at the parks. Rooms are basic but they have everything you need and plenty of space. Comfy beds too. We did not go swimming but we appreciated the presence of a pool just in case we felt like taking a swim. Staff were very friendly. Everything was very clean. The walk from the hotel to the Disney parks is not bad at all and really is not much different than having to walk to your car if you had parked in the theme park lots, so we did not mind the walk. Takes a little over 10 minutes if you are just casually walking. I also really love that at these old style inn's, you can still open your windows! So nice to get some fresh air! I'd
Manager Response: Hey Guest, Happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us at Alpine Inn. The exterior has been the same since Disneyland opened in 1955. All rooms have been remodeled in 2020.  Call us directly to book your next visit to Disneyland to get a return guest rate.   Thank you! Parth A.  Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Very friendly staff and easy walk to Disney
Summary: Staff was very friendly and accommodating. Great price for the location and time of year. Rooms were clean and had the basic amenities. Convenient locations to restaurants, convenience stores,  CA Adventure and Disneyland. Thank you.
Manager Response: Hello guest,  After a year of lockdown, it is nice to welcome all Disney enthusiasts to visit the happiest earth on earth once again. We are glad to be here to provide restful nights after a full day of fun.

Summary: We’ve seen this hotel many times over the years but never tried staying there until our most recent June 2021 trip. It’s a hidden gem! Very pleasant staff and updated rooms. We stayed in a two room family suite with three queen beds. We each had our own tv in both rooms. Nice small mini fridge and microwave came in handy. Only down side was beds seems more the size of a double, not queens. The mattress s also a bit too soft for our liking, but at the end of a long day I. Parks it really didn’t matter much. There was no coffee pot, but I’m assuming that’s COVID related. Overall a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your review as well as the opportunity to try us out. Even though the last 14 months was difficult but we did take the opportunity to redo office lobby, parking, pool fence, painting entire exterior and added flower pots on the wall.   We will take a look at our mattresses and see how we can provide even more restful nights for your future stay.   Our goal is to provide comfortable stay for all our guests and glad to know we have achieved.   We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: Always a pleasure staying at Alpine Inn and this will not be my last time. I am always greeted with a smile and rooms are clean & welcoming. Upon arrival, I made a last minute request for a three bed suite and received it with not issues. During this past year of uncertainty, it was nice to see that this family owned motel was able to survive. I highly recommend staying here. Location is wonderful. As soon as I arrive my car stays parked until the day I leave. Alpine in is within walking distance to EVERYTHING.
Manager Response: Hello Guest,   It is esciting to see familiar faces. We survived the last 14 months with a few imrpovements and continue to see how we can be better to serve our guests.

Summary: We loved our first stay here on Monday that we immediately rebooked the room for the following Friday. The motel is clean and well kept up. A great location and a super value. What else can I say other than we will be back again sometime.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your stamp of approval to stay with us again. We strive to provide  comfortable and affordable lodging for visitors to the Happiest Place on Earth.  I thank you for your positive feed back and look forward to see you many visits in the near future.

Summary: I've stayed twice at the Alpine Inn. Both trips I told anyone i could that it's a great choice. 12 minute walk to the Disneyland plaza entry screening. The front desk is very capable and well-managed. You can ask to leave your car there after you check out and they'll let you, based on availability. The room was adequate and recently updated with LOTS of outlets for charging devices!! This is a unique property that's held onto its personable service even when everything around it is all big national brands!
Manager Response: Hello, We appreciate the 5 star review! Delighted to hear that our location is perfect for Disneyland. We do have options parking upon checkout and before your room is ready. Our property is privately owned since Disney opened in 1955. Call us directly so we can get you a return guest rate during your next visit.  Thank you! Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Clean basic room, close to Disney, great staff
Summary: Really nice to be right near Disneyland. Clean room that looks recently updated. Didn't try out the pool and the walls are thin but not too bad depending on your neighbors. Everyone's mentioned the tight parking, and that's true but still not too bad as long as you don't have a huge SUV. All the staff was super nice and we were able to get a parking space in the morning of our check in to park there during the day. Definitely would stay again.
Manager Response: Hello,  We appreciate the 5 star review! Alpine Inn is located right behind California Adventure and has been recently remodeled in 2020. For any issues with parking, please come to the front desk so we can guide you to the best parking space. Call us directly @ 714-535-2186 for your future Disney vacation and we can get your a returning guest rate.  Thank you! Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Our go to hotel when visiting Disneyland
Summary: They’ve recently done some renovations and it looks nice. They’ve added some Disney touches but it’s not overwhelming. The mattress were very comfortable, not hard or thin & flimsy. The pillows were also nice, not just fluffy for show. Two negatives 1. the bed frame was metal on a fake hardwood floor, so every time we sat down too hard or leaned against the bed it would slide, maybe some rubber stoppers or something could help. 2. The sink is too tall. My 6yr old who’s tall had a hard time reaching the faucet & spitting in the sink. Other then that, the staff was nice & helpful, parking is free & the pool is nice.
Manager Response: Hello Guest,  We are glad you like our recently remodeled hotel. Thank you for letting us know about the negatives so we can try and accommodate our guest better. Management and Maintenance has been informed about the issues with the bed frame along with the sink being too high. Call us directly during your next visit to Disneyland to get a better rate than online.    Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: This is a terrible place to stay. First of all you will not get the rooms that you see here (they shared). The furnitures are very old, smells and dirty. Forget about dealing with customer service. They have the worst customer service ever. Please think twice before book from this place.
Manager Response: Hello Busrao126,  Thank you for choosing to stay with Alpine inn. We're very sorry to hear that your experience with us didn't meet your expectations. This is not reflective to the service standard we are accustomed to.  We hope to have another opportunity in the future to show you our commitment to delivering excellent service and restore your confidence in our hotel.  Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great stay for a good price
Summary: We stayed 2 nights in the hotel for our trip to Disney.  The walk to Disney was easy with our tween children.  The pool is heated, though could be a little bit warmer.  I'm not sure what the temperature was, but I'm guessing in the mid-70's.  We were at a hotel the night before that heated their pool to 80, which was perfect, but this pool was a little colder.  The kids still enjoyed swimming for about an hour.  The room and pool area were very clean.  The bed was so comfortable with 4 pillows per bed!  The towels in the room were quite small, which was our only disappointment with the hotel.  I loved that the room floor was not carpeted and that the windows had shutters -- fewer soft surfaces = easier to keep clean.  A huge bonus for the hotel was the included refrigerator and
Manager Response: Hello, We are pleased to hear that the proximity to Disneyland was easy, and that you especially loved our comfortable rooms. We’re so happy that everyone in your party had such a fantastic experience, and we hope to have the chance to welcome you all back soon for another Disney vacation. Please give us a call at (714)-535-2186, to book directly and we can offer you a repeat guest rate as well.  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: My daughter and I are going to Disneyland tomorrow and wanted to be close to start the day.  We were put in tbt updated rooms.  They were really cute and clean.  I loved the floors, desk and bench.  It was roomy, comfortable and affordable! $115 for room, 2 queen beds, free parking and within waking distance to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Hi 556michaelab,  Thank you So much for your lovely review! We are so happy you loved our recently remodeled rooms. We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn whenever you are back in the Anaheim Area. Please give us a call @ (714)-535-2186, to book directly and we can offer you a repeat guest rate as well.  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: This little family owned motel has recently been remodeled They are friendly and helpful and follow all the safety measures. We've been staying there for all our Disney and convention needs for several years.
Manager Response: Hello,  Always a pleasure having guest come back and stay with us when visiting Anaheim. Thank you so much for the 5 star review!  Please call us directly @ 714-535-2186 for all your future Disney vacation and we can get your  returning guest rate.  Thank you! Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: We originally booked this hotel opening weekend of Disney because it was the most cost effective within walking distance. Originally we had very low expectations, however come day of that all had changed! We had called prior to arrival to let them know we'd be arriving a little earlier than expected and immediately was greeted with a friendly voice! They read the note that we were celebrating a birthday and wished a happy birthday and that our arrival time was not a problem! Upon check in we were again greeted with great hospitality and a warm welcome happy birthday from Jobbie! When we got to our room there was a cute little birthday card and gift from the hotel! I would've never expected this from this kind of hotel! We felt the warmth and care immediately!   The room itself
Manager Response: Hello,  First of all, Thank you so much for taking your time to write such a detailed review for our future guest. I'm so glad our team was able to take care of you during your special day. We strive to treat our guest with above and beyond service so everything is wonderful and relaxing during your Disney vacation. I'm very pleased to hear you liked our new renovations as well! Secondly, We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn whenever you are back in the Anaheim Area. Please give us a call @ (714)-535-2186, to book directly and we can offer you a repeat guest rate as well.  Best, Parth A. Alpine Inn

Summary: I really appreciated the covid protocols in place; my family felt safe and comfortable. Karla at the front desk was friendly and helpful despite our 4am check in! The gentleman who helped us check out (didn't catch his name-sorry!) was also kind and helpful; I left a pair of shoes in the room upon check out and he let me back in to grab them. The only complaint comes from my sister who said the beds weren't her favorite-the rest of us were fine!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have been staying at the Alpine for many years and can find no fault with this property nor its staff.  They have done a lot of work on up-dating the rooms during the pandemic and will continue to thrive!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: It's one of the few 'classics' left in the Disneyland Resort area, now being overtaken by luxury (expensive) chain accommodation. Been there since the 60s, yet so lovingly cared for and updated. An excellent location, within 15-minute walk of the entrance to Disneyland. Comfortable beds, quiet rooms, and all the necessities for a nice stay. The free parking and wifi are great. And if you have any problem at all, the front office is anxious to help you and make it better. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good location~ Good Kindness~ Thank you everything~ I Loved the kindness of the staff I was so happy because I visited Disneyland for my honeymoon~ If I have a chance, I'd like to visit again. Thank you so much~
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family & I have been staying at Alpine in for at least 6 years, I can’t believe I haven’t written a review before now. It is a small motel that backs up directly to Cars Land. Parking is free & it’s a short 10-15 minute walk to the main gate of Disneyland and across the street from the convention center. We usually grab a muffin & coffee every morning from their free continental breakfast before heading to the park. The rooms were recently renovated and are so nice!! Simple, clean, great A/C and NO carpet. There is a heated pool that our kids can enjoy year round. We have stayed here so often, all of the staff (who are amazing) know us by name when we walk in the door. They really treat us like family. We highly recommended Alpine Inn and won’t stay anywhere else when we come
Manager Response: Dear TracyG797,  We appreciate all the kind words and thank you for taking the time to write a review! Nothing brings us more joy than seeing our repeat guests. Thank you for continuing to keep coming back and we always enjoy your wonder family and kids! We hope to see you soon. Thanks again!   Best Wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: This hotel was updated recently and the room was very clean. However, the bed (both of them) didn't seem to benefit from the update. The mattresses are in desperate need of replacement so unfortunately, I did not get a good nights rest any of the four nights that I stayed. The breakfast is just pre-packaged muffins, cereal and yogurt. I probably will not recommend this place to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear Bonsky64,  Thank you for taking the time to bring this issue to our attention, we at the Alpine Inn & Suites appreciate all guests feedback good or bad. We are very sorry that the bed you got was uncomfortable. We would love the chance to earn your business back and invite you to call us directly for any future reservations with a 10% returning guest discount. Again, thank you for bringing these issues to our attention and have a great day!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: A hotel that included the basics- parking,breakfast, 3 beds, close to Disney & Alamo return.
Summary: The hotel includes it all -Located in the corner by Disney property. Included in the rate was a small breakfast table, parking, next to Alamo car return and had 3 Q-beds for 5 people. The parking was tiny and close so take your driving skills with you.
Manager Response: Dear MarysB9802VO,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience with us. We are so glad that you found our rooms comfortable as well as the proximity to Disneyland. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs.  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: We stay here every time we go to Disneyland. It's clean, in easy walking distance to the parks, has helpful and friendly staff, and is an amazing value for the money. We don't have kids but their two bedroom suite is well-priced. Not a lot of amenities (though it does have a pool) but it's proximity to the parks means midday naps which we do take advantage of. We don't spend any time at all in the room so a clean, comfy bed and a shower is all we need. After 10 years, Alpine Inn continues to be my #1 choice.
Manager Response: Dear Honey2theBee,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of our property and your time with us. We are so glad that you enjoyed your time here. It really sounds like you had a chance to enjoy the location our property has to offer. We are so glad that you will be coming back for your next visit and encourage you to call us directly for your future booking needs!   Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great hotel to visit the parks on a budget
Summary: Great location, the walk to Disneyland was not heavy for our 10 and 13 year old kids, even the return. It was what we were looking for: affordable, clean, close to the parks. The breakfast is limited but we were aware of it. Only one problem, one of the beds squeaked. We were so tired that we didn't ask for a room change but it is something the hotel should take a look at. The bed itself was confortable but the noice did wake us up, one person in our party decided to sleep on that bed because he barely moves when sleeping and that was the end of the problem. Other than that it was a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Dear C L,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of our property and your time with us. We are glad you enjoyed the proximity to the parks as well as the cleanliness of our rooms. Maintenance has been notified of this issue and we will look into a solution. Thank you for bringing this issue to our attention. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs.  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: A simple, no-frills hotel with a great staff and location
Summary: A great welcoming and accommodating reception staff makes up for the lack of luxury. The room is almost complete and comes with ironing board and iron but no safety deposit box. Was given two bottles of complimentary water on day 1 but none on the remaining 5 days but they do have grab and go breakfast and cold water in the reception area. Location is great. It is 15 minutes walking to Disney entrance and 2 minutes walking to convention center and 711 and other shops and restos.
Manager Response: Dear ces1801,  We are so glad that you found our front desk staff to be helpful and welcoming. Thank you for taking your time to write us a nice review. Unfortunately, we don’t have any safety deposit box in the rooms. We do have a safety deposit box located at the front desk for any guest to use.  We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience with us.  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: With a max walk of 10 minutes to the parks, this hotel is absolutely perfect if you want to be close to Disneyland Resort. The rooms were nicely updated and very clean, the staff were always accommodating and very lovely. Although the breakfast isn't much it certainly worked for my partner and I as a quick and easy eat before a big day at the parks. It's certainly a great price compared to some of the other hotels that are even a further distance from the Disneyland Resort. I would definitely book here again for our next Disney trip!
Manager Response: Dear 568gemmab,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us. We are truly grateful to have hotel team members that enjoy being of service to our hotel guests and make you feel comfortable during your Disney Getaway. We know that you have many choices for hotel accommodations when staying in the Anaheim/Disneyland Resort area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to host your accommodations in the future. Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience with us.  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: If you are attending an event at the Anaheim Convention Center and don't like crowds this is the place to stay. It is literally a 10 foot walk across the crosswalk and you are there. We had a perfect room upstairs in the corner. The staff is excellent. Beyond impressed with the front desk staff. The room was really clean and  a simple modern.
Manager Response: Dear Sunshine296991,  We are so glad that you found our rooms comfortable as well as the proximity to Anaheim Convention Center. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience with us.  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: Close to Disneyland, nice pool, nice continental breakfast, comfortable beds, clean, great service! My family and I reserved a 3Q room. 1 bathroom, but 2 queens in one room with 1 queen in a separate room. Upstairs, quiet!! Great stay!
Manager Response: Dear 1travelperson,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience with us. We are so glad that you enjoyed the family suite room, as well as the proximity to Disneyland. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs.  Best wishes Alpine Inn

Summary: Easy fast walk to Disneyland resort.  Friendly front desk personal.  Rooms are updated and clean.  Comfortable and quiet.  Already booked our next stay here.  Great price and definitely recommend this motel
Manager Response: Dear BenjaminC2680,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience with us. We are so glad that you found our rooms comfortable as well as the proximity to Disneyland. I will definitely  pass the positive message to our Front Desk Team.  We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs.  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: This property is a short walk to Disneyland and Downtown Disney.  The staff is very friendly.  They offer free parking. It's clean and quiet and there are breakfast selections to choose from every morning, saving time and expense.   The Alpine Inn is a great bargain.  Will stay here again next time we're visiting Disney Parks.
Manager Response: Dear DORF828,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience with us. We are so glad that you found our rooms comfortable and enjoyed grabbing breakfast before heading over to Disneyland. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs.  Best wishes Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great location, Friendly staff, Very clean
Summary: We enjoyed our stay very much. The only reason I did not give the Alpine Inn a full 5 is because the sound proofing isn’t too impressive. Upstairs neighbors’ walking around and excited families getting out for early mornings are very easily heard. But if you are one of those excited families planning to get to the park early every day, this is a great choice.  The park entrance is only 1/2 mile away, so you can easily leave your car in the free, motel parking and walk to Disneyland. There is a small strip mall about a block away with a Subway and other small restaurants. There is also a CVS and a Walgreens across the street.  The room was very clean and included a fridge and microwave. There was always enough hot water. We found the bed very comfortable.  The free breakfast
Manager Response: Dear Three-men-and-a-babe,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience with us. We are so glad that you found our rooms comfortable as well as the proximity to Disneyland.Thank you also, for bringing up that you experienced some noise issues, please let us know in the future and we definitely resolve the issue. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs.  Best wishes Alpine Inn

Summary: Stayed here for four nights in December for a girls trip to Disneyland in December. Radiator Springs backs up right to the hotel. You can actually her the racers when you are outside the hotel. It's about a 15 walk to the parks if you go through the main gates and about a 20 minute walk if you go through Downtown Disney. There is a CVS, Walgreen's and 7-11 within walking distance if you need any supplies or food. There are also a lot if different restaurants around as well. There is a microwave and refrigerator in the room. Bathroom area was a little small for four girls, but we made it work! Iron, ironing board and hairdryer in room and a few hangers. There was a small breakfast available in the lobby in the morning, but we didn't partake because we brought our food. There is a
Manager Response: Dear 918azblonde,  We appreciate you taking your time on writing such a detailed review about our place. Were very happy that your family enjoyed our property and proximity to everything. We offer a 10% off discount for our returning guest. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs.   Thanks Again! Best wishes Alpine Inn

Summary: A just-right place.... has clean, safe rooms. Comfy beds. Nice staff. And location walkable to Disney, restaurants, and the convention center (literally right across the street). They offer breakfast, but I didn't use that. Also have free parking.
Manager Response: Dear nickg179,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience with us. We are so glad that you found our rooms comfortable, the property felt safe, as well as the proximity to Disneyland. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs.  Best wishes Alpine Inn

Summary: Rooms were clean and short walk to Disney. They were remodeling and the noise started about 6:30 am every morning until 7:00 PM at night. When I say noise I mean extremely loud jackhammer type noise in the rooms above and beside you. Not to mention the work crews hanging out outside your windows talking and having there breakfast. If you have kids and want to come back to the room for naps etc, forget it. When we complained about the noise all we got was sorry. If I had known up front this was going on I would have booked somewhere else.
Manager Response: Dear Samuelh405,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience. We do apologize for the inconvenience of the remodeling of rooms and how it may of affected your stay. We hope you will give us another chance in the future and we will definitely make it up to you. As for as the remodel, we are finished with all of our rooms so we will not have anymore issues with construction.  We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs.  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: Very nice place to stay and staff was very friendly. As of this writing, they are currently remodeling some of the units. This hotel was a short walk to the entrance. Breakfast consisted of: coffee, tea, sweet corn flakes, oatmeal, apples and oranges, small muffins, 2% milk and orange juice. Our room had: hairdryer, ironing board and iron, refrigerator, microwave and a neat little magnifying mirror. Parking is included. Best of all, no resort fee. I definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear candelariorealestate,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience with us.We are glad that you loved our location and amenities that our hotel has to offer. We offer a 10% off discount for our returning guest. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs.   Thanks Again! Best wishes Alpine Inn

Summary: We were looking for a hotel within walking distance to Disneyland. This was a 10 to 15 minute walk.  A grab and go breakfast was offered from 7am to 9am. The rooms had what needed.  We were there for rest not to hang out.  There is a pool and we used it once.  One parking space is available per car.
Manager Response: Dear DustinMargaret,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience with us. We are so glad that you found our rooms comfortable and able to grab a quick breakfast before heading out to the Disneyland Parks. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs.  Best wishes Alpine Inn

Summary: Very friendly staff and accommodated everything we asked.  Good location and easy walk to Disneyland. Let us park our car on the day of arrival during pre check in. Has a pool and a quick breakfast. Beds were a little hard, but after a day at Disneyland, slept like a rock.
Manager Response: Dear constantrippin,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review of your experience with us. We are so glad that you found the proximity to Disneyland an easy walk. I will definitely, pass along the positive feedback to our front desk team as we are glad to help you. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs.  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: When I called the front desk to see when breakfast ended, Parth told me he had just put it away but would pull out items we wanted. I mentioned the oatmeal and yogurt. When we came down he had arranged a tray to take to our room with my requests plus fruit and orange juice. Thanks Parth!!
Manager Response: Dear Kevs5522,  Thank you for taking your time and writing a nice review for Parth. Our Front Desk staff will always accommodate all guest request in a professional but friendly manner. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes Alpine Inn

Summary: I have been coming here for a few years now and it’s my hidden secret. It seems to be a family owned and operated establishment so you can tell they really take pride in it being cute, clean, comfortable and unlike the huge mumbo jumbo hotels with tons of people. I always feel super safe here as well, whether I fly and take an Uber there or drive and leave my car there, it’s super safe. The staff is always so friendly and accommodating. Exactly what you need if you’re not a big hotel person. It is a quick walk to and from the Disney Parks as well.
Manager Response: Dear 597meghany,  From the entire staff at Alpine Inn, we want to thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are so happy to hear that our efforts to keep every guest feel at home were successful. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes Alpine Inn

Summary: I got in late Saturday night and went straight to sleep. When I awoke and started to pack, I saw that my sheets were stained. I thought it was just filthy housekeeping until I took a shower and found marks on my shoulder. I took photos and complained.  When I got home, I couldn't risk bringing my suitcases into my house, so I emptied everything into sealed garbage bags and took the luggage and my laptop case straight to the trash.  I submitted a request to replace the cases and was flatly rejected. I was willing to work with them on this, but they are not interested in the least.  Do. Not. Stay. Here.
Manager Response: Hi Kristen,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. As we spoke earlier, we do apologize for the stain on the sheets. We have notified our Housekeeping Supervisor about the situation.   We do this matter seriously and had to do some research into the claim that you had bed bugs so we double checked your room with our maintenance and did not find any signs of bed beds. We then, spoke with the other guest who was staying with you, Cory, and asked if he noticed any signs of bed beds. Cory did not see any signs of bed beds and responded that he enjoyed his stay with us. We then, offered a discounted rate for the night that you noticed the stained sheets and refunded the amount back to the card on file.   Again we do apologize about the whole situation .  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn Front Desk Manager

Summary: We had to last minute change our hotel reservation to here as the hotel we had booked had a bed bug problem. The Alpine Inn was very clean, service was great, and the location was perfect. We were all very pleased with staying here.
Manager Response: Dear MagmyGeraith,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience with us. We are happy that you had a great stay with us and found the Alpine Inn to be, "clean, great service and perfect location." We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes Alpine Inn

Summary: The rooms were clean, beds were comfortable, location was right across from the convention center and was 0.7 miles away from Disneyland.   Every staff member was friendly and helpful. My wife and I will be returning next time we come to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear OnHawaiiTime87,  We sincerely thank you for your business and appreciate you taking time to write about your stay. We are happy to know you liked our proximity to Disneyland and Anaheim convention center and also how every staff member was helpful and friendly. We hope you come back and stay with us again soon. Call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: Wonderful staff, clean remodeled rooms. Walking distance to the parks. They let us check in early and they also let us keep our car their after we check out as we still had a day left to enjoy the park. They also were so kind in helping us find good places to eat and answering all our questions. Highly recommend this Inn.
Manager Response: Dear dmrast,  We appreciate you writing such a wonderful review about Alpine Inn. We try our best to accommodate all request from our guest and are glad you enjoyed our newly remodeled rooms. Thank you again and we encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: Attended a conference at the Anaheim Convention Center. Hotel across the street from the center, about half the price. Have stayed here twice , will do it again. Rooms clean. Simple continental breakfast. Free parking. Next to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Howard Harel B,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review of your experience with us. We are so glad that you found our location and property to be perfect for Anaheim Convention Center.  We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs.  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: We needed a stopover before flying out of LA. This was perfect. Shower was good and hot Great room clean and tidy. Close to Disney. Breakfast was an unexpected bonus. Good coffee and muffins.       Parking outside room was good for us.
Manager Response: Dear HollyHouse200,  We appreciate you taking your time and writing a review for Alpine Inn. We are glad to hear your had a great stay; found the room clean, close to Disney and were able to get a grab n go breakfast before the parks. We encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: The staff were helpful and polite. The room we were in (208) was very clean but old (stained carpet, bathtub dripped, etc). The mattresses felt new and were comfortable. The air conditioner was noisy but effective. A grab & go breakfast is available (cereal, milk, muffins, yogurt, fruit, beverages). As the website states, the room contained a small fridge, microwave, and tiny coffee maker. And most importantly, it is a 10 to 15 minute walk to Disneyland. This is not a resort, but recommended if you want to pay less money and still be close to the park.
Manager Response: Dear Sarah C,  We apologize for the inconvenience you had during your stay. We have remodeled all our rooms and would love to have you stay with us again. We encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes Alpine Inn

Summary: My husband and I plan a yearly Disney trip and like to book and stay at good neighbor hotels. This year we were taking our toddler (2 years old) for her first visit and my mom so she could get to share in the memories. We were specifically looking for a hotel that offered suites and the Alpine Inn had great reviews and very good rates. I decided to book a 8 night stay in the 2 bedroom suite (2 queen beds, 1 king bed, 1 bath). We were in room 114 and it was absolutely horrendous.
