The room had a very musty and moldy smell, carpeting was absolutely disgusting, water pressure in the bathroom sink was either non existent or spraying everywhere, and the beds were very hard. We stayed two nights and asked to end our reservation early so we could move to a different hotel. The front
Manager Response: none

Summary: Alpine inn was a very cute, clean and friendly hotel. Beds were comfortable and bathrooms were clean. Super close to Disneyland, Starbucks, mall nearby, lots of food choices and convenience stores. All employees were very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Misti R,  We appreciate your kind words! Thank you for writing a review of your experience with us. We are so glad that your found the beds comfortable, close to Disneyland and that our front desk staff were very friendly. We encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: We originally did not have a reservation for this hotel.  When my wife and I arrived from Mesa AZ, we checked into our other Hotel and it was a disaster.  Long story short, we left that property immediately and tried to find something else.  When we found Alpine Inn, the price was totally reasonable, and the rooms were amazing.  We felt safe and comfortable and overall had a great trip.  10/10 would recommend this hotel and would book here again.
Manager Response: Dear Brigstrr,  Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback. Although your vacation did not start the best, we were so delighted to hear that you had a great stay at the Alpine Inn. We encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland & it’s a GEM!
Summary: We stayed in a Triple Queen room, their newly renovated one. It’s small but it’s a “Little Gem”. Most importantly is it’s great location, CLEAN, comfortable bed and pillows & their hotel staff Parth who took my reservation over the phone was very helpful, friendly but professional & knowledgeable around the area. Thank you Parth! And special mention to your staff, Derrick. Our morning was rough, we woke up 3am and 4am started our long drive this day & we were not in the best of mood but Derrick made it all better!! He even helped us carry our luggage and store it for us. He has an amazing customer service skills/leadership! Thank you Derrick for all your help. You made it better for us & because of you, this was our Home away from Home. You deserve to be recognized. Employers
Manager Response: Dear Ralph S,  Thank you for taking your time and writing a nice review for our front desk staff.. Our Front Desk staff will always accommodate all guest request in a professional but friendly manner. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: Overall a good experience. The bed felt a little harder than two years ago but still comfortable. Great service and friendly staff. Continental breakfast was good. The one thing missing was a hand towel bar.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Nataliah724,  We apologize for the inconvenience you had during your stay. We have remodeled all our rooms and would love to have you stay with us again. We encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: Checked in late last night. After a long 7 hour drive and we just couldn’t stay. I looked at pictures read the reviews and it seemed like a nice hotel. To be honest maybe it was. The front desk staff was very nice and welcoming. This trip was for my daughter 16th Birthday so it was my daughter her best friend and myself. We checked in after 11pm went to our rooms and started to relax. The room appeared clean carpet was stained and appeared dirty but it’s an older hotel. After going to the bathroom and washing my hands I noticed something crawling on the sink. Then I got a little freaked out because it was a ROACH after killing it. I called the front desk. He apologized and offered another room. We moved but in the second room there was some hair in one of the beds and well to be
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Fantastic friendly staff close to Disney
Summary: The Alpine Inn was a little gem. Walking distance to Disney, on the corner was a 7/11 to get supplies.  Surrounded by some great restaurants if you get bored of Disney food (we did)! The breakfast was enough for us and had nice coffee. The staff were so friendly. My son enjoyed getting his breakfast and having a chat with reception and housekeeping too were friendly. There was some improvement work but we were out all day and didn’t here a thing. Air conditioning amazing. Would definitely stay again. If I could mention one small negative, it would be no mirror in the bedroom.
Manager Response: Dear Midnight20112015,  From the entire staff at the Alpine Inn, we would like to thank you for taking your time and writing such a detailed review on our place. We have remodeled and would love for you to come stay with us again. Call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes Alpine Inn

Summary: This is the best value for a 2 star hotel. I've stayed here 3 or 4 times. The mattresses have always been comfortable. I was able to check in very late at night. The staff is always available and professional.
Manager Response: Dear Joni L,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience with us. We are so happy to hear and appreciate you being a loyal Alpine Inn guest! We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs.  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: The staff was extremely courteous and did their best to address any concerns we had.  Great service.  The room itself was disappointing however.  The rug was worn, stained and very dirty.  We decided not to allow our toddler to crawl on it.  When we arrived the room smelled horribly of burnt popcorn and persisted until we left two days later.  The staff tried to address the concern via air freshener but it did not work.  An alternative room was offered on the second day but we decided not to repack all our belongings.  5 star service, 2 stars for the cleanliness of the room.  It did look like they were renovating other rooms so maybe we just got a dud.
Manager Response: Dear Michael S,  We apologize for the inconvenience you had during your stay. Thank you for the kind word about our staff! We have remodeled all our rooms and would love to have you stay with us again. We encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes Alpine Inn

Summary: We stayed at the Alpine inn a few nights in July. The inn was close enough to walk but far enough away to be lower in price. They are remodeling their rooms and the remodeled ones are very clean with lots of places to charge devices. Desk open 24 hours, makes for easy check out times.
Manager Response: Dear JoshuaDoreen,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience with us. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs.  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great staff, easy free parking, nice room!
Summary: Alpine Inn was such a nice deal. Easy access to walk to parks, and to park-cars which are in front of rooms so you can grab stuff in and out easily, it’s akso free parking (rare in Disney area) with no surprises, a cute free breakfast (unheard of in Disney) -coffee, cereal, muffins and yogurt, totally all you need to get yourself into the park fast with little provided trays to bring it back to the room. Rooms have nice sized fridge and little microwave too. They are renovating one room at a time but it was no big deal, we still were able to walk back during the hot hours of the day and nap just fine even with people working in rooms nearby-and it looks like the project is nearly complete. The renovations are very clean, fresh and pretty. The little pool is really sweet, perfect
Manager Response: Dear ColoradoJo,  From the entire staff at the Alpine Inn, we would like to thank you for taking your time and writing such a detailed review on our place. Your Review will help others find accommodations a lot easier. We are so glad that you found our location and property to be perfect for Disneyland.  We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs.  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: This has got to be the best hotel I stay at.  They always give me the room I want.  I am greeted personally by the management.   A computer is available in the lobby for guests to use.  Breakfast is always provided in the lobby.   Service is excellent if anything is needed   and nowhere adjacent to the Disney property has better rates.    This is my favorite place!!
Manager Response: Dear RonaldU,  Thank you so much for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and it puts a smile on our face when you stay with us, every year! We will be seeing you again and look forward to your next stay with us. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: Spent the weekend at the Alpine Inn. Reasonable prices, 15 minute walk to Disneyland, quiet, buy park tickets at front desk, continental breakfast. Alpine Inn is an older property but well maintained. Looked like there’s some remodeling being done. My double queen room was spacious and had strong cold AC.
Manager Response: Dear traveling_with_kathy,  Thank you for your stay with us and your review.   We are under going renovation of the entire property and we hope you will visit us soon in our new remodeled rooms.  Enjoy the rest of the summer and see you soon.  Best regards, Management

Summary: We've enjoyed this motel. It's small but the bed was comfortable, slept well because it was quiet. Nice continental breakfast. Grab and go, nothing fancy. Coffee, hot tea, instant oatmeal, cold cereal, oj, yogarts, apples and oranges. Always cold water in the lobby. In room Microwave, good size little fridge, iron with board, free parking and Wi-Fi. Laundry room with 1 washer and dryer. Will stay here again, very quaint little property.
Manager Response: Dear Annie H,  Thank you for your kind review. We are proud to be an independent owned and operated motel in the Disney Resort area where we can customize our amenities and services to best serve our guests.   As our slogan said "Our Inn, You Memories".  We hope you will visit soon.  Best regards, Management

Summary Heading: Our New Home Away From Home
Summary: We have just spent 11 nights at the Alpine Inn.  It was great to have a 2 bedroom family suite.  Very clean and comfortable.  A king bed in 1 room and 2 queen beds in the other.  About a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland and local convenience stores close by.  We'd like to thank Derek and Parth and the other staff for looking after us and making sure everything was just as we wanted.  They were all excellent to us. We couldn't have asked for anything more.  Excellent Customer Service.  We will be back again.
Manager Response: Dear Navigate35062500836,  Thank you for taking your time and writing a nice review our front desk staff. Our staff will always accommodate in a professional but friendly manner. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine Inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Cute little motel right by Disney California Adventure
Summary: This is an older, but we'll maintained motel in a perfect location. The staff were super friendly and very responsive to our needs. It was a great value for a motel so close to the Disney Resorts, restaurants and stores.
Manager Response: Dear Colleen1926,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience with us. We are so glad that you found our rooms clean. We have remodeled and hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs.  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: It's not a palace, but it is reasonably priced, very clean, very friendly, and very close to Disneyland. Throw in the free parking and the ability to buy your park tickets from the front desk and it's a winner!!
Manager Response: Dear Cyneswith,  We appreciate your kind words! Thank you for writing a review of your experience with us. We do offer free parking and Disney tickets can be purchased at the front desk. We encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: We stay here every time we're in the area ~ mostly visits to Disneyland, but often for other events going on in the area.  Although the rooms may be small by some standards, they are very comfortable and always well kept.  There is also a wonderful pool and every morning they have a small morning breakfast available for all their guests.
Manager Response: Dear DisneyFanatic1944,  Thank you for choosing Alpine inn as your home away from home. We are glad you found are rooms to be clean and comfortable. We encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: Perfect hotel for a trip to Disneyland with older kids. Had a two bedroom option and it was perfect for our needs. Easy walking distance to park. Staff very accommodating and helpful. Allowed us to store luggage before room was ready and park early. Also allowed for a small late check out. All of those features I truly appreciated.
Manager Response: Dear AngieT1986,  We appreciate your kind words! Thank you for writing a review of your experience with us. We encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great value for a quiet, clean, comfortable stay near Disneyland and its hotels and restaurants!
Summary: The location was ideal, walking distance to Disneyland and the hotels where restaurants are at and Downtown Disney. Free parking, free tokens for ice machine, nice staff, grab and go breakfast items, comfortable beds, and there is a pool.
Manager Response: Dear Doybrian,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience with us. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Clean, quiet, short walk to Disney
Summary: What else could you possibly want? The staff are friendly and helpful, the beds are comfy, the shower has good pressure and hot water. The light breakfast (coffee, prepackaged muffins, cereal, yogurt, juice) is perfectly adequate to get you going on your theme park assault, and the in-room fridge/microwave combo is a nice bonus. The main asset, of course, is the location, which can scarcely be beat-- certainly not at this price point.
Manager Response: Dear Jerwillow,  We appreciate you writing such a wonderful review about Alpine Inn. We try our best to accommodate all request from our guest. Thank you again and we encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: Just around the corner from the Disneyland Resort entrance, the Alpine Inn is a family friendly motel that provides a great value for one's money. We usually stay in an upper floor room near the front, but  stayed in one of the recently updated downstairs rooms this time. The remodel was nicely done with upgrades throughout. The staff is always very friendly, the rooms are always clean, and the onsite parking means we never move our car while we enjoy Disneyland Resort.
Manager Response: Dear BrucesX5952UZ,  We appreciate your feedback and for choosing us as your home away from home. We will notify our staff on your kind words. Thank you again and we encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you Bruce and Michelle!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: the staff was super! The rooms were clean, good beds , excellent pillows, quiet and safe environment. Walking was easy to Disneyland.. Air conditioner was a little noisy, but it didn't keep you from sleeping.
Manager Response: Dear Cmarz,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your experience with us. We apologize for the air conditioning unit. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Nice and comfortable stay near Disneyland
Summary: The hotel staff are very friendly and help facilitate all our requests. Good choice to stay near Disneyland about 15 minutes walk. Breakfast is limited. We have a very comfortable stay for 3 nights here. Free parking.
Manager Response: Dear Atchariyawit P,  Thank you for writing a review of your experience with us. We encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: Good value for money, good sized rooms, Poor breakfast, clean rooms, walking distance to Disney, Wooden building; so each step around you can feel it. Good parking. Good value for money. Bring your own food.
Manager Response: Dear 536sheriff,  We apologize for the inconvenience you had during your stay. By law, we are only allowed to have prepackaged items due to not having a kitchen on site. We encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Best hotel to stay in for Disney trips
Summary: Stay here almost every year for our Disney trip that we try to take each year. Every year we are happy with our stay. The staff is genuine the rooms are clean and cover your basic needs. Plus it's only a 12 minute walk to the front gate of Disney with a 7-11 on the way. The rooms are fairly priced so don't hesitate on booking here. Thank you Alpine Inn for all of our past and future visits.
Manager Response: Dear Barry W,  We sincerely thank you for your business and appreciate you taking time to write about your stay. We are happy to know you liked our proximity to Disneyland and restaurants. We hope you come back and stay with us again soon. Call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: This was a great location for walking to and from the Disneyland parks.  The hotel was very adequate.  It was clean and spacious.  We stayed in a family suite with a king bed and two queen beds.  It was great for my family, because my parents could sleep in a separate room while my small family slept in the queen beds.  It was very affordable too.  Overall, I would stay here again!  To the cleaning staff who helped us with a mess, “Muchas gracias. Lamentamos que nuestro hijo se haya enfermado. ¡apreciamos su ayuda!”
Manager Response: Dear BrrokeB160,  We appreciate your feedback and for choosing to stay at the Alpine Inn. We will notify our staff on your kind words. Thank you again and we encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: A nice place to rest while visiting Disney, carpets need to be replaced desperately, mattresses are firm, ok with me not so much my wife. We had a smoke detector go off 2 times our first night 12:30 am and 1:15 am, maintenance checked it the next day finding no problems, neither did we have any other alarms after that. Not a bad place to stay for the money.  Mike
Manager Response: Dear Michael E,  We apologize for the inconvenience you had during your stay. We have remodeled all our rooms and would love to have you stay with us again. We encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: It was an overall good experience.  First time staying here and the accommodations were clean and peaceful.  I never heard any noise here at all except excited kids who were up early in the morning passing by the door on the way to the parks.  (No traffic noise, or footsteps above us, or through the walls etc.) . The staff were kind and easy to work with.  I'm a young adult who looks even younger than my age but they treated me like an adult which was hugely appreciated.
Manager Response: Dear TinkerbellPatten,  From the entire staff at Alpine Inn, we want to thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are so happy to hear that our efforts to keep every guest feel at home were successful. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly at (714) 535-2186, for any future booking needs. Alpine inn offers discounted rates for returning guest. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: Alpine Inn was a great place to stay for our trip to Disneyland.  Close enough to Disneyland and California Adventure that we could walk but also had the advantage of using ART buses for transportation, although the number 9 ART bus wasn't the most reliable.  The room was clean, although the carpets could use some update/cleaning.  The people in the office were wonderful - helpful with questions and recommendations. Thank you!  Best wishes, Alpine Inn

Summary: it was a family trip to LA ,specifically for disneyland and California adventure park. it is a clean property, rooms are small but equipped with refrigerator and microwave, they provide dry breakfast which is good. this place is just walking distance from disneyland and daily need store seven eleven and many eating joints are nearby.
Manager Response: Dear Vyaspritesh,  Thank you for the great review of the Alpine Inn. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our amenities; mini-frige, microwave, the cold breakfast, as well as the short walk to the Disney Parks and stores. We hope you had a good time at the Disney Parks and would love to welcome you back anytime you are in the Anaheim Area!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: This is the second time staying at this adorable, little place and I just love it. This is a place for those that aren’t looking for the Ritz Carlton but want a clean, well kept, simple and safe place to stay that is also affordable. The rooms come stalked with all the necessities that you might need (nice tv, microwave, mini fridge, iron/ironing board, hair dryer, comfy bed and lots of clean towels. If you’re traveling with kids, it’s just a super easy, convienent (only 10 min walk to Disneyland entrance) place to stay. The people at the front desk are super nice and super laid back and the pool is a great touch. This place is a hidden gem for sure. Perfect for your Disneyland trip!
Manager Response: Dear Meghan Y,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review as well as returning to the Alpine Inn for the second time. We are delight that you had another great experience and enjoyed all the amenities. If you are ever back in the Anaheim area, please give us a call to make your reservation, mention you are a repeat guest and we will be able to give you an additional discount! Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Very good staff, close to Disneyland
Summary: The staff here helped us throughout the trip.  They gave us tips on visiting Disneyland to help us maximize our visit at both Disney and California Adventures.     They also helped my mom get a motorized scooter to scooter from the Inn to Disney.  They ordered the scooter from a delivery company and within 15 minutes, the scooter arrived.  Very helpful staff and very convenient place to stay
Manager Response: Dear Cynthia A,  Thank you for the amazing review of the Alpine Inn. It is our pleasure to help you and your family out and are glad to assist you in any way. We hope you had a great time at the parks and anytime you are in the Anaheim area, we would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Hotel was very clean, staff very friendly/helpful. Free breakfast was very basic but did the job, room was a little outdated, but comfortable. Great stay for the price, very close  to the Anaheim Convention Center, and also walking distance to many other restaurants/attractions.
Manager Response: Dear Jim H,  Thanks for taking the time to write a review of the Alpine Inn. We are delighted that you found it to be a great value for your stay; and also that we are, "very close to the Anaheim Convention Center, and also walking distance to many other restaurants/attractions." We would love to welcome you back anytime you are in the Anaheim Area. Thanks again!

Summary: Stayed here for one night while visiting Disneyland. The front desk staff were friendly and helpful, the premises and the room were clean, and the bed very comfortable. It was also very quiet, which provided for a good night's sleep. Didn't have time to try the pool, but it looked well kept and clean. Just about a 10 minute walk to Disney, so super convenient. Would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Manager Response: Dear Cherie G,  Thank you for taking the time to write a positive review of the Alpine Inn. We are happy to hear about your great stay with us and that it was convenient to walk to the Disney Parks. We would love to welcome you back and hopefully you can use our pool as well. In the future, please give us a call to make a reservation and we will be more than to give you a repeat guest discount!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Short,  Short 7-10 minute Walk, No streets to Cross
Summary: Over Priced, But Everything in this Disney area is; Not outrageous but high, Quality is less than Motel 6<>Clean and Close to Disney's Harbor Blvd. entrance and save he Parking fee<. Call Early, Books up real fast <>
Manager Response: Dear dearrow,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of the Alpine Inn. We are happy. that you found the walk to the Disneyland Parks easy and short. We hope that our amenities and quality of room was sufficient to our rates and pricing. If you have any concerns, please dont hesitate to reach out me. Thank you again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: The room was very clean. The Walls aren’t paper thin like most. The internet held up to 4 people playing online games which was surprising. Staff was very friendly and willing to help in anyway possible. And the pool is year round also haha that’s a plus.
Manager Response: Dear tyw0,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a great review of the Alpine Inn. We are happy, that you had a great stay with us; room very clean, internet connection strong, and friendly front desk staff. We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn, anytime you are in the Anaheim area. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Good for saving money (without being in a slum!)
Summary: Continental breakfast was portable and easy, room was small but still functional, close walk to the Disneyland parks, close to a 7-11 for purchasing food cheaper than in the parks, carpet was a bit stained but everything else was very clean and tidy, office staff were friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Andrearip119,  Thank you for the great review. We are delighted to hear about your experience; close walk to the Disney Parks and stores, and friendly front desk staff. Thank you for your feedback about the carpets,  as we do, routinely do a carpet cleaning. Thank you again for taking the time to write a review and we hope to see you in the near future. Thanks!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Couldn't ask for more in this price!
Summary: With the clean room, a nice location, a reasonable charge, and friendly staff, I couldn't ask for more! And it is not very far from the Disneyland entrance. Actually, it's a nice short walk since you can pass by some restaurants and shops. It's super convenient if you need to buy something or get something to eat. So glad I chose this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Orange_orchard,  Thank you so much for taking to the time to write an amazing review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us; nice location, reasonable rates and friendly staff. Thank you for the kind words and I will pass the message along to our front desk team, as we try our best to ensure a great stay for all of our guests. If you are back in the Anaheim Area, please give us a call and make a direct booking and we will be able to give you a repeat guest rate. Thanks!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: This is not a luxury hotel, but you aren't paying for one of those. This is a nice hotel, well within walking distance to Disneyland. The rooms were reasonable, clean, and well stocked. We had the family suite. It has a main bedroom with attached bath. There is a door off of the main bedroom which leads to the single bedroom. No additional bathroom facilities in the second room. Just a room with a bed and tables. It does not open to the outside, so the occupant must come through the main bedroom (two queen beds) to access the outside. I liked this for my kids. Much safer than having a separate entrance for them. The breakfast is about what you pay for. No real dining area, just a couple of chairs in the hotel lobby, or take the food back to your room. Breakfast consisted of cold
Manager Response: Dear Terri W,  Thank you for the detailed review of the Alpine Inn. We are delighted that to hear about your experience in the Family Suite Room. We appreciate your feedback about our basic breakfast as we are always trying to find improvements. Thank you again for the review and we would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn in the near future.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We stayed here for two nights while we visited Disneyland and California Adventure Park. The location is very convenient - easy to walk to and from theme parks without the hastle of parking and riding the trams.  The 3 queen room was perfect for our party of 4. Very clean with comfortable beds.  The staff members were very helpful and nice.  I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Traci W,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy to hear, you had a great stay with us; convenient location, helpful staff and comfortable beds. Please let us know when ever you are back in the Anaheim Area, we would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Ballin on a budget I went with Alpine Inn. Best part of our vacation!  There was five of us so the room was small but it was perfect. The place is well maintained- beds comfortable- we had exactly what we needed. Staff was always helpful and  accessible. The walk to Disneyland was at the end of what is comfortable at the end of a day at DL but do able and nobody complained.  Pool was clean. Didn’t get to swim because of weather. Felt safe. Place was quiet. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear 991screenname,  Thank you for taking the time to write an amazing review for the Alpine Inn. We are delighted to hear that you had a great stay with us; comfortable beds, helpful staff and easy walk to the Disneyland Parks. If you are ever back in the Anaheim area, please give us a call to make your reservation and we will be able to apply a repeat guest rate. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Favorite place to stay at Disney
Summary: Comfortable Beds, clean rooms and great front desk service! I have stayed here several times as a Disney passholder. Tried another hotel to save a few bucks but still prefer Alpine Inn for location and value.  Breakfast options aren’t fancy but it’s good enough to hold us over until we eat lunch!
Manager Response: Dear dtidwell279,  Thank you for the awesome review! It is always a pleasure for us to see familiar faces. So we truly appreciate you keeping us in mind and staying with us through out the years. We are happy you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back to the Alpine Inn.Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We selected this hotel based on location.  We really did not expect much,  but were so pleasantly surprised.   The staff was so helpful,  and the hotel was clean and very well maintained.    Even the parking area was spotless!!  And the location was perfect.   Short walk to Disneyland and a variety of restaurants and shops.  Will definitely book again next time!
Manager Response: Dear Marias511,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a great review for the Alpine Inn. We are delighted that you had a great stay; helpful staff,  perfect location and short walk to the Disneyland Parks. We would love to welcome you back, anytime you are in the Anaheim Area. Please give us a call, when you make your next booking and we are able to give you a repeat guest rate. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Rooms are simple, clean & comfortable in a motel style set-up. PERFECT location for WonderCon- right across street from Convention Cry. About a 10min walk to Disneyland at a leisurely pace. Front desk staff very friendly and price is right!
Manager Response: Dear SophiePJ,  Thank you for taking the time to write a great review of the Alpine Inn. Thank you again and if you ever back in the Anaheim Area, we would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Staff was friendly and helpful..We were able to park in front of our room.  This Inn is just a short walk to Disneyland.  We rented a scooter (recommended by the staff) for one of our party members and it was delivered directly to the Inn with a full charge.  The staff kept the scooter in the lobby over night, connected the charger and had the scooter waiting outside for us in the morning.  Our room was clean and comfortable.  The bathroom tub actually drained while taking a shower, unlike most places we have stayed.  Air condition was quiet and cycled as needed.   Pricing was comparable for the area.    The only two issues we had were the bed squeaked, but comfortable and we had to park else ware after we checked in the morning and went Disneyland  because of afternoon check
Manager Response: Dear Facc5,  Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review of the Alpine Inn. We also appreciate the feedback regarding the squeaky bed and limited parking. We would love to welcome you back anytime you are back in the Anaheim Area. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Easy, convenient, and affordable. We had a great stay. Close to Disneyland. We were able to walk there.  The rooms were clean and nice. It was a last minute decision to come and they were very accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear Jamiejowilliams9,  Thank you for taking the time to write an awesome review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy to be able to accommodate your family for the last minute trip. Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: The Alpine is cute, clean, well-maintained and within easy walking distance from Disneyland’s front door.  The staff were friendly and helpful.  The hotel provided a basic continental breakfast, free WiFi and has a pool.  Great value and location.
Manager Response: Dear Neon75,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a great review of the Alpine Inn. Summary Heading: Perfect for a quick Disney trip

Manager Response: Dear Bethany S,  Thank you so much for the awesome review. We appreciate the kind words about our Front Desk Team and so happy you were able to return back, since you were a child. We would love to welcome you back, in the future, please give us a call to make a reservation and let us know you stayed with us, to get a discounted repeat guest rate. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Parking was a bit limited so a tight squeeze. We were on the second floor and didn’t see an elevator, so if you are unable to do stairs request first floor.  Beds were very comfortable! Staff was friendly and super helpful! We frequent Disneyland and LA area frequently so we will be back.
Manager Response: Dear BriBre87,  Thank you for taking the write a review of the Alpine Inn. We are happy to hear you had a wonderful stay; staff was friendly and helpful and you found the beds very comfortable. We would love to welcome you back, in the future, please give us a call to make a reservation and let us know you stayed with us, to get a discounted repeat guest rate. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Whilst staying in LA we planned a 2 day visit to Disneyland.  Initially we planned to travel to and from but after experiencing the terrible traffic we decided to try and book room near Disneyland the day before departing.   From start to finish the booking process was straightforward.  We dropped off our luggage early in the morning before we entered the park and were met by a very friendly gentleman on arrival at Alpine Inn who was more than happy to hold our luggage until we arrived back in the evening.  Our room was very clean and perfect for a short no frills stay - it was an easy walk to the park and in the morning a simple but very adequate breakfast was available.  I would highly recommend this Inn if you want to stay nearby and want a good room, great service and a
Manager Response: Dear BeehiveSatch68,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a great review of the Alpine Inn. Thank you so much again and if you are every back in the Anaheim Area, we would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: The room was clean and the staff very friendly. Parking was tight in the lot but overall it was quiet and within walking distance of the park. The pool was in good shape but never got a chance to use it.
Manager Response: Dear Marjorie W,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of the Alpine Inn. We are delighted that you had a great stay with us and had an easy walk to the parks. We would love to welcome you back, anytime you are in the Anaheim Area. Thank you again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Easy walk to Disney Land.  Not fancy but very clean and perfectly comfortable. I was a little uneasy when we returned from Disney Land at about 11:00 PM and the toilet was running.  I had put the Do Not Disturb sign on the door.  At first I thought maybe it had been running ever since we left that morning and I need to jiggle the handle.  But, then as I walked into the bathroom the toilet stopped running.  Very strange....made be think someone must have came into our room but nothing was missing so not sure....
Manager Response: none

Summary: After reviewing several places to stay around Disney Land and actually canceling one of the reservations, I settled on Alpine Village based on the reviews. If you want a clean and comfortable place to stay at the right cost. I highly recommend it. Located right against California Adventure Land it took about 10-15 minutes to walk to the ticket entrance with 3 kids in Rowe, really convent considering if were to park or take a shuttle having to wait and the costs.  Since you will be spending the entire day at the parks, this is a good place to stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I loved it everything was perfect stayed here 4 nights . Perfect walking distance to Disneyland.  Staff was very nice and helpful . No issues would definitely stay here again. The heated pool  was very enjoyable as well :)
Manager Response: Dear Muneca777,  Thank you for the wonderful review. We are so happy that you had a perfect stay with us. And it is an easy walk to the Disneyland parks and you were able to enjoy our heated pool. Thank you again and hope to see you again soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We were looking for an affordable place to stay by Disney and Alpine Inn was perfect. It’s about a 15-min walk to Disney (but we chose to drive) with free parking. The room was clean and the front desk staff was friendly and helpful. They provide a small breakfast of cereal and muffins. There are restaurants surrounding the motel along with 7-11 and CVS so literally everything you need is right there. The room had a mini-fridge and microwave as well. It all seemed pretty safe as well. For a motel-type establishment, it was very nice.
Manager Response: Dear MNmover,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review of the Alpine Inn. We are happy that your had a great stay; front desk team was friendly and helpful, and also close to restaurants, stores, and the parks. Thank you again for the review and anytime you are in the Anaheim Area, please give us a call, if you book directly and mention you are repeat guest, we can offer a discounted rate. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Thank you for the wonderful experience, awesome staff and the upgrade to our family suite was beyond awesome! We will definitely go back and continue to stay there. I also really appreciate and I’m thankful that your staff was honest enough to call me that we had left our tablet after we had already checked out and saved it until the night when I was able to pick it up.
Manager Response: Dear msilva15,   Thank you for taking the time to write a great review of the Alpine Inn. We are happy we were able to upgrade your room and that you were able to get your tablet back! If you are ever in the Anaheim Area, we would love to welcome you back!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: The room is very clean, at the front desk we found riendly attention  and it is located only two blocks to the park .My children and I have a fabulous vacations. We will back to this hotel for the excellent service

Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: This is an excellent hotel to stay at, when in the Anaheim area. The staff is always so accommodating and friendly, whether it's 10am, 5pm or the middle of the night. The rooms are spacious, quiet and always clean and comfortable. We have stayed here 2 years in a row, while attending WonderCon, and will come back again and again.
Manager Response: Dear Mrs_claus28,  Thank you for taking the time to write a great review of the Alpine Inn and also, another big thank you for returning to stay with us for WonderCon. Summary: This was in a perfect location to get to both the convention center and Disney. The rooms were small but adequate. Beds were comfortable and clean. This is a motel not the Hilton, but we needed 2 bedrooms and this worked out perfect; price was excellent and saved me getting a second hotel room. Water pressure was excellent. The night before I stayed by myself at the Hilton. It took me forever to get to my room. Found a silverfish in the tub. The room was typical of a Hilton, very spacious. Parking here is expensive while the Alpine Inn was free. The parking lot was mostly empty during the week, but did fill up on the weekend, so iif arriving late, be aware that there are limited parking spaces. We used SuperShuttle. It doesn’t have the best rep, but it was inexpensive and door

Thanks!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

The front desk made checking in a breeze, they made sure we had ground floor attached rooms, as we were traveling with my 87 year old father in law. The rooms were clean and ammenities as promised, were fully stocked.  Thank you for making this special trip memorable for the whole family. We will always stay at Alpine Inn, The Aguilar Family, San Mateo, CA
Manager Response: Dear Kimaguilar1960,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a wonderful review of the Alpine Inn. Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: This is the best hotel I have ever stayed at.   The people at the desk know me and always strive to give me the room I ask for.   Service is excellent, a computer is available, and the morning snacks are excellent.  It is a 10 minute walk to the main entrance of Disneyland.   Shopping facilities are nearby and the OCTA bus routes are easily accessible.  The AMTRAK Anaheim station is nearby.    I go back to this hotel each summer when I visit the Los Angeles/Anaheim area
Manager Response: Dear Ronald U,  Thank you for the wonderful review. We are happy to have you as a repeat guest and look forward to you coming down every summer. Thank you the kind words and see you soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: It’s an easy 15 minute walk from Disney. The room was clean and the staff was friendly and accommodating. There are a lot of places to eat within walking distance. We would of stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Chris E,  Thank you for you for review of the Alpine Inn. We are happy to hear that it was short walk to the Disney parks, plenty of restaurants within walking distance and that our front desk was friendly and accommodating. Thank you again for taking the time to write a review, if you are ever in the Anaheim area, we would love to welcome you back!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Very convenient place for the Comvention Center
Summary: I stayed for 5 days, when I attended the Natural Products EXPO West 2018 as exhibitor. 1. The location is very close to the convention center. It's right across the street. 2. You can park your car for free. You can save $40 per day, compared with parking at other places. Also, you don't need to wait in a long line in order to take a shuttle bus between the convention center and the Anheim stadium. 3. Free WiFi available. 4. You can have breakfast like muffin and coffee for free. 5. There are two pharmacies, many retaurants and the world-famous Disney land, if you want to go. 6. You may hear fireworks of Disney land around 9:30PM but can't see it because of the high wall between our real world and the dream land. Don't worry. It will not disturb your sleep.
Manager Response: Dear 281shinsukey,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a detailed review of the Alpine Inn and the great information. We are delighted to hear you had a great stay for the Natural Products Expo West. Thank you again for the review and hope to see you again soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We have stayed at the Alpine Inn a few different times over the years and it has been a great home base for our long days at Disneyland. It's about a 10-15 minute walk and has all the the amenities you need in a room. The staff has always been very helpful and the value can not be beat.

Please let us know the next time you are in the Anaheim Area and we would love to welcome you back. If you make a direct booking with us, either over the phone or in person, we are able to give you a repeat guest rate as well. Hope to see you soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Great location for easy park walking. However, our tub drain didn’t close so our toddler couldn’t take a bath. Also, I found that the nooks and crannies of the room could use a little more thorough cleaning. But the staff was friendly. Just needs a little love and attention.

I requested adjoining rooms, which they wouldn't guarantee, but we did end of getting them. It was perfect for our family. Not fancy...economical and pleasant! The only caveat is that the included breakfast isn't really a breakfast. It's more like snacks---packaged muffins, small yogurts and a few little boxes of cereal. Now that I know that we will just plan on getting breakfast somewhere else next time we stay.

Summary Heading: A pleasant surprise...a short walk to Disneyland.  Clean and guest friendly hotel was just what we needed.
Summary: We were comfortable and so close to Disneyland. Saved on parking costs because the staff let us leave the car in the lot for the two days rather than paying the $20 a day fee at the park.  I would stay here again in the future.

If you are ever back in the Anaheim Area, we would love to welcome you back!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

When we first arrived, the bathroom light didn't work, but once we arrived back from the beach it was all fixed up. We had two cars, which is no issue as long as there is a place for them to park and you pay a small daily fee for the second car. Overall, they had great service and the hotel was wonderful!
Manager Response: Dear Kelcee J,  Thank you for taking the time to write such an awesome review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy to hear, you enjoyed your stay. If that's what you like this is a great place to stay. With that said I would stay here again and recommend it to other travelers.

Summary: Alpine Inn?  "It's a Motel, I told my wife as she booked the reservation."  I mean, I'm hooked on Hotel type accommodations, but OK I went along and to my great surprise, I was more than pleased!  Close to Disneyland - maybe a 15-minute walk or I'm thinking UBER if that walk is a challenge.  Especially after the 7 - 8 miles you'll walk during your visit to the park.  What a great place!  Yes, it is a "Motel"  but a great one.  Excellent Staff, room, and experience.  Our room was equipped with all the normal room stuff PLUS a microwave and a mini frig.  TV was excellent and the beds were super comfy.  The place was quiet even though it is occupied by families with small children.  There is a pool as well.  The staff was just great.  Very accommodating and helpful.  Breakfast was
Manager Response: Dear RIVERMAN63,  Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review for the Alpine Inn. We are delighted to hear, that you had a great stay; close to Disneyland, amenities, and great staff. Thank you so much for the kind words and will pass them along to our Front Desk Team. If you are every in the Anaheim area, we would love to welcome you back!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Alpine Inn exceeded our expectations and will definitely stay there again. Clean, convenient and excellent staff! Couldn’t have asked for more helpful people. They definitely go above Nd beyond to make your stay the best it can be. Thanks again for a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Dear Jonnylitho12,  Thank you so much for the amazing review. We do appreciate the kind words about our Front Desk Team, as hope we went over and beyond to make your trip memorable. I will also make sure to the pass on the kind words to our Front Desk Team. Please let us know whenever you in  the Anaheim Area, as we would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn.'  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: My colleague and I attended a ginormous convention for 5 days in Anaheim and Alpine Inn was the perfect choice. The room was spacious and comfortable, we made plenty use of the fridge and microwave. Short walking distance from Anaheim Convention Center. The staff at the desk is delightful, friendly and helpful. I will definitely make Alpine Inn my base for future stays.
Manager Response: Dear Princesslyka,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a great review for the Alpine Inn. We are delighted to hear, that you had a great stay with us, which was close to the Anaheim Convention Center. Also that you enjoyed  all the amenities available in the room. In the future, please give us a call directly when you make a reservation and we will be able to give you an additional discount. Thank you again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: For not being part of a larger chain of hotels, this place does an amazing job. It’s not prefect, but it rivals any Hampton Inn, or Hilton I’ve stayed in, and you can’t beat the price. It’s within walking distance of the parks, surely if you walk around Disneyland all day, you can walk the 15 minutes or so back to your room. I can’t stress how impressed I was, the price was amazing. Now, the breakfast isn’t much, but it’s more than enough to get you going. The staff was super friendly, and they obviously take pride in their property. We loved it, we will be back!!
Manager Response: Dear Daveb186,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a postive review of the Alpine Inn. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay; easy walk to the parks, affordable, and friendly staff. Thank you again for the awesome review and hope to see you in the neat future!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Found this little gem while looking for a room for a business conference. The conference center is right across the street. Bonus: a short walk to the front gates of Disney! We were able to walk to shopping and restaurants. The room was tidy, the bed and pillows were comfy with a small fridge and microwave! They had a small breakfast that was perfect for grabbing and going. It consisted of dry cereal, milk, juice, fruit, muffins, yogurt and coffee. For the price, it was perfect and the staff was so nice and helpful!
Manager Response: Dear therealsac1110,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a great review for the Alpine Inn. We are delighted to hear that you found us conveniently located to the Anaheim Convention Center and to the main gates of Disney. If you are every back in the Anaheim area, we would love to welcome you back. Thank you so much again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Staff was polite, kind & helpful. Room was clean and well stocked with the usual.  It is an older place nothing fancy Actually feels a little like a ski resort  or cottage .Location to the Convention Center I couldn't beat  No need for a Lyft !
Manager Response: Dear BarbarasO5110GX,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of the Alpine Inn. Delighted to hear that you had a great stay during your convention and that the staff was helpful and the location to the Anaheim Convention Center. Thank you again for the review and whenever you are back in the Anaheim area, we would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We stayed here previously in 2016 with our two teenagers so didn't hesitate when just the two of us came back to Anaheim. On arrival we were warmly welcomed and given the key to our room. The room was very clean and a good size. It has fridge and microwave plus a coffee machine. We had a very comfortable super king bed and large tv. Breakfast was a good start to the day - coffee, juice, cereals, fruit, yogurt and muffins. We were quite happy with the selection and it kept us going at Disneyland until lunch. Disneyland is only a walk if about just over a mile away and so easy to walk to with only one road to cross at Disneyland bus entry lines to cross. Would stay here again without even looking at other options - and plan to do so next year.
Manager Response: Dear wheretonextBucks,  Thank you for talking the time to write such a great review for the Alpine Inn and returning back to the Alpine Inn. We do appreciate the time words and happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and our amenities in the room. If you are ever back in the Anaheim Area, we would love to welcome you back! Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Clean, friendly, comfortable, and convenient... what more could you ask for? The staff was friendly and very accommodating. The location was right across from the place we were doing business. Parking was also available for our rental. The grab and go breakfast items were clean and well presented. This place is my number one choice for the NAMM show.
Manager Response: Dear derrickonbass,  Thank you so much Derrick, for the awesome review. We are delighted to hear you had another great NAMM show. Looking forward to seeing you the following year!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Easy walk to Disneyland and large room. Carpeting was stained and in need of replacement but beds were very comfortable! Our refrigerator was not working properly but was quickly replaced. An issue with guests using pool at 3am was quickly resolved. Very courteous & helpful staff.
Manager Response: Dear lakeloverNH,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on the Alpine Inn. We are happy that the issues that occurred were quickly resolved. Although, we do apologize if it did cause any inconveniences to you. We do want to let you know we do service our carpets on a monthly basis and we are actually going to switching out the carpet for hardwood flooring in the near future. We would love for you to come back and stay with us, anytime you are in the Anaheim area. Thank you again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Judy and the staff were very accommodating!  They were kind and made us feel very welcomed! We did a family Suite and it was perfect for our family!  The rooms are basic but smell clean and looks very clean...  we have not one negative thing to say about our stay...  we will most definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear karlyd686,  Thank you for such a positive review. We appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your experience. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the Family Suite room and all the front desk staff were accommodating. Thank you again and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Clean, Courteous, convienient,comfortable! great price this was our second time staying at the alpine inn and both times were awesome!we will definately be back. great to be able to just walk around the corner and you are in the park
Manager Response: Dear mgesbrek,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a great review for the Alpine Inn and also returning to the Alpine Inn for the second time. We are happy that both experiences were awesome and it was convenient to get to the parks. We would love to welcome you back anytime you are visiting the Disneyland Parks. Thank you again.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great staff, clean room, loud neighbors
Summary: Our stay was great, despite our neighbors above us - they were letting their children run back and forth, over...and over....and over. We definitely will stay here again, but we will be shooting to try and get a room on the second floor!  Staff were genuinely kind and friendly! The room was a great size - the bathroom was large.  The fridge and microwave was a huge perk!  Parking was easy and location was more than ideal - it was a short 10 minute walk to the park(s).  Beds were *very* firm, but the sheets felt super clean and the pillows were super fluffy.  Definitely will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Deborah W,  Thank you for taking the time to write a great review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy to hear that you had a great experience with the front desk team, enjoyed our amenities and had just a short walk to the parks! We do apologize about the neighbors above you, as we happily will assign a different room in future or if you have any requests, we are more than willing to accommodate them. Thank you again and hope to see you soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We liked the walk in coupon. We like when they are on Hotel.com to give us good prices and close to Disney Land. The people were very nice. Good pool and nice tables to sit by. This place is quiet and relaxing.
Manager Response: Dear Ann A,  Thank you taking the time to write a great review for the Alpine Inn. We appreciate you sharing you great experience at the Alpine Inn. If you are ever back in the Anaheim Area, we would love to welcome you back.   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: I cannot state enough how great this hotel was. I stayed with my wife and two children and couldn't have picked a better hotel. The front desk are welcoming, friendly, and knowledgeable. We called ahead to ensure we could arrive before check-in and park our vehicle. They just gave us a pass, alnd ask us to return after 3 pm to check into our room. The location is prime. They state it's a 13 minute walk. We made it to the park in no time. We came back during the day to check in and take a needed nap. The room was clean and quiet. The beds were nice and comfortable. The shower was nice and hot. We have stayed at another larger hotel in the past, that was closer, and enjoyed our stay but this hotel was more clean, relaxing, modern, and friendly. And at the price we got I can't see
Manager Response: Dear Jimenzgc,  Thank you such much for the amazing and detailed review of the Alpine Inn. We are delighted to hear, that you had a great experience with us a at the Alpine Inn. From the friendly Front Desk Team to the location, we are happy that your stay was great. If you are ever back in the area, we would love to welcome you back. If you give us a call and book directly in the future, we can apply a repeat guest rate. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Exactly what we were looking for
Summary: If you’re expecting to get a Ritz Carlton experience from a room near Disneyland that only runs $100 then you’re just unrealistic. We were looking for a reasonably priced room where our girls could nap before returning to the park and then for us to crash after a long day of rides and sugar. For this, the Alpine was perfect.   The Beds were very comfortable with nice sheets pillows. The bathroom was in good condition and clean. Room also had a mini fridge and microwave. The free breakfast was packaged muffins, cereal, packaged oatmeal, OJ, yogurt, and coffee. Pretty much exactly what I’d expect for the price.   Yes, the walls were a little thin and there were people coming and going as late as 1am and as early as 6:30. It’s almost like we were a few blocks from a major theme
Manager Response: Dear Jeff A,  Thank you taking such a positive and detailed review of the Alpine Inn. We are more than happy, that the Alpine Inn was exactly what you were looking for and you had a great stay. If you are back in the Anaheim Area, please give us a call to make your next reservation and we can apply a repeat guest rate. Thank you again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: I will definitely stay here again. We came to town for A1 Supercross at Angel Stadium and a visit to Disneyland. The location of the hotel was excellent! I have two adults kids and the accommodations were great for the three of us. Rooms were very clean and service was excellent. Everyone was very friendly and helpful. My daughter even left behind a sweatshirt and they quickly called us to see if we would come back or if we wanted them to mail it to us. Thanks for the wonderful stay Alpine Inn.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review of the Alpine Inn. We are happy to hear you had a great stay and had fun during your vacation. Also that you found our rooms clean, and our front desk team was friendly and helpful. We would love to welcome you back anytime you are visiting the Disney Parks or in the Anaheim area. Thank you again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Just a short stroll to all Disney has to offer. Clean rooms, breakfast included (cereal, yoghurt, fruit, juice - was plenty for us) and every staff member we encountered were very friendly and helpful. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear teenie_m71,  Thank you for the great review! We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay, from the clean rooms to the friendly/helpful front desk team. It is our pleasure to help you and to go over and beyond. If you are back in the Anaheim area, we would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn. Thank you again for taking the time to write such a positive review!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great location and great value for the price!
Summary: This was my second time staying at the Alpine Inn while visiting the two Disneyland parks. Both visits were a very pleasant experience! The hotel staff is attentive and friendly, there is a modest continental breakfast available each morning at 7am, free WiFi and free parking on site for one vehicle per room. The beds and pillows are so comfortable, and that is personally one of the biggest factors for me when staying at a ‘home away from home!’ The walk to the parks was 10 mins or less, which is a perfect amount of time for decompressing and walking back to your hotel room from the oh so fun, but busy bustle of the parks!When we are in the Anaheim area again, we would absolutely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Kanicane,  Thank you so much for taking to time to write such a wonderful review of the Alpine Inn. We love our repeat guests, so thank you for coming back. With that being said, we are happy you had another great stay with us, from the comfortable rooms to the easy walk to the Disney Parks. We would love to have you stay with us again in the future. Thank you!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised with how nice this facility, location and newness of the hotel was. Come to find out- I stayed here with my parents when I was 3, same as my daughter was on this trip. The staff was incredibly nice and I would ABSOLUTELY stay here again. Besides power at Disneyland going out, it was a perfect trip.
Manager Response: Dear Bethany S,  First of all, thank you for taking the time to write such an awesome review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy that you enjoyed our location and the facilities. Also, that you had a great experience with our Front Desk Team which I will make sure to let them know. If you are ever back in the Anaheim Area, please give us a call as we would love to welcome you back. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: The Hotel has a nice location.  It is a little further than other hotels, but for the price it wasn't bad.  The hotel is literally behind Cars Racers (California Adventure).  The staff was very friendly and nice.
Manager Response: Dear Ronald S,  Thank you such much for the wonderful review. We are happy to hear that you had a great experience with our Front Desk Team and I will be more than happy to pass the message along to them. Also, that you found the Alpine Inn conveniently located to the Disneyland Parks, Anaheim Convention center and plenty of restaurants; all within walking distance. We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: I booked Alpine in for a 24-hour stay in California. We arrived earlier than our check-in time, and Alpine Inn was kind enough to let us take advantage of their complimentary quick breakfast items and to hold our bags at the front desk while we made our way to Disney. (The hotel is a quick 15-minute walk to the parks.)  We returned that night to our room, which was clean and comfortable. Perhaps the only drawback is that they are located right on a busy road, so the sounds of traffic at night are noticeable. Overall, we had a lovely experience with Alpine Inn and would stay with them again.
Manager Response: Dear Alyssa F,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy to hear, that you were had a great experience. Also that you were able to pre-check in and just come back to get your rooms keys from the short walk to the Disney Parks. If you are ever in the Anaheim area again, please let us know and we would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn. If you book directly, call us at (714) 535-2186 to make your next reservation, we are able to offer a repeat guest rate. Hope to see you soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great older property, very well kept up.
Summary: The staff here is terrific to work with, the rooms are very clean and the beds were quite comfortable. The pool was nice and warm. Distance to Disney is an easy walk. Many amenities are nearby. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Kim K,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us; terrific staff, amenities and an easy walk to the Disneyland Parks. We would love to welcome you back anytime you are in the Anaheim Area. Thank you again and hope to see you soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: A convenient, safe, and budget-friendly place to stay
Summary: I travelled to Anaheim by myself in early December, and I'm glad I stayed at the Alpine Inn! I booked very early and got a great deal, so the value for money in my case was excellent.  I arrived in Anaheim a little too early for check-in, but was able to leave my bags with the front desk and come back for them later when my room was ready. I stayed for a total of 10 nights (December 1-11) and had a great experience. The hotel staff were all very friendly and helpful. The room was clean, everything was in working order, and there was plenty of room for me to spread out and be comfortable. I stocked the mini fridge with groceries since I knew the continental breakfast would be light, but it was definitely adequate (and the coffee was great!).   The walk to Disney was an easy 10
Manager Response: Dear Craynadian,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a detailed review of the Alpine Inn! We are delighted to hear about your experience and that you had an easy walk to the parks, found the front desk helpful and our rooms met your expectation. We would love to welcome you back anytime you are in the Anaheim Area. Thank you again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: I am writing this from the hotel because I've been awake since 5am three mornings in a row now. I would never stay here again. This place is super noisy and has zero sound proofing. You can hear your neighbors talking, from the bathroom area you can some times make out the exact words, the plumbing is so loud it sounds like it is coming from your room and if your on the ground floor is sounds like an earth quake above you when people walk around. Three mornings in a row I was woke up around 5am even with ear plugs in due to people above me walking and how loud it was. Worse I have ever experienced in any hotel/motel. I was so tired all 3 days that I couldn't even enjoy Disneyland. If you don't wake up super early than don't stay here because you likely won't be sleeping past
Manager Response: Hi Nicole J,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review and we sincerely apologize about your experience and the noise. We are aware of the situation that happened last week and it was totally out of our control but as a guest here we are responsible for your stay and good nights rest. We have been reaching out with Disney,where the noise was coming from, to make sure this situation will never happen again. Please do contact us at (714) 535-2186 as we would to make things right for you. Thank you again for letting us know about your experience and again we truly apologize.   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: For the money,it was really good value. Ten minute walk to Disney. Clean with friendly staff and close to shops. A basic breakfast but sufficient before a day in the park. Would book again. Ticked all the boxes.
Manager Response: Hi fiveoffive,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review. We are happy you enjoyed your stay here at the Alpine Inn during the Holiday Season. We are also  delighted to hear you found the Alpine Inn a, "really good value" and would love to welcome you back anytime you are in the Anaheim Area. Thank you again and Have a Happy New Year!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Approx 15-20 min walk to Dland and Downtown Disney. Pool not heated and no gym, sauna, jacuzzi, or room service. Basic motorlodge. Continental breakfast is boxed cereal, packaged oatmeal, coffee/tea and yogurt.  Very nice staff, clean rooms and free parking. Did not use WiFi.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie H,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review for the Alpine Inn. We would like to get some more information about your stay and see how we can improve your experience. Although, we are delighted to hear that the staff was very nice and you enjoyed the free parking. Please let me know if there is anything we can do to make your stay that much more enjoyable. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Our family has enjoyed staying at Alpine Inn many times for our Disneyland trips as Annual pass-holders. It is about a 12 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance. The hotel is clean, the beds are comfy and the it is a quiet area. We love it!
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer S,  Thank you for the wonderful review. We do appreciate the loyalty and that you and your family continue to stay with us during your Disneyland trips. It means a lot to see familiar faces, so thank you again! On your next stay with us, please mention you are a repeat guest so we can apply a discounted rate. Thank you again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Ok so I have stayed at almost all the cheap hotels within walking distance of Disneyland and this one is average. Clean enough parking was adequate. Most drawbacks was free breakfast below average. Bonus backside view of cars land in CA adventure and able to see some of colors of the night show
Manager Response: Dear Tracy R,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review for the Alpine Inn. We appreciate the feedback about to breakfast.We would love to hear more of your experience with us so we can make any improvements. Thank you again!   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: My family loves to stay here because it is family operated and they make sure your well taken cared of during your stay. Very friendly staff! Also, this hotel is within an easy walk to the front gates of Disneyland Parks.
Manager Response: Dear TahoeSnowman,  Thank you so much for your awesome review. It is a pleasure to see you and your family every time! We are delighted to hear all the kind words and will continue to provide the same quality of service! Please let us know when you are coming back to the Anaheim area. Thank you again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Stayed one night to visit Disney.   Easy check in, room was clean and all in all a good hotel within walking distance from the park.   Good to have on site parking that is complimentary to your stay, as we were visiting a number of places.
Manager Response: Dear Hoodie159,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review for the Alpine Inn. We are pleased, that you had an easy check in,  a short walk to the parks and also the complimentary on site parking was convenient. Thank you again, and we would love to welcome you back any time you visit the Disney Parks. If you book directly with us and let us know you are a repeat guest, we can happily apply an additional discount!   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Most clean, convenient and comfortable! Will definetely come back! Only ten minutes walk to Disneyland, and five minutes walk to all kind of souvenirs stores and restaurant, once you are there , no car needed!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write a positive review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy you found everything, "most clean, convenient and comfortable." Also, that it was just a short walk to the Disneyland Parks. We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn, anytime you are in the Anaheim area or going to the Disneyland Parks. Thanks again!   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Alpine Inn provided a conveniently located and comfortable place to stay during our vacation. Plenty of amenities nearby and a very comfortable bed. Only (very minor) complaint is that the “heated” pool is not really that warm. However, it is beautifully kept up. Lovely stay experience.
Manager Response: Dear RACHAELwines,  Thank you for the taking the time and writing for the Alpine Inn Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the amenities, and that you found our beds very comfortable. Also, thank you for letting us know about the pool temperature as it is heated all year around. We will definitely look into this. Thank you again and hope to see you in the near future.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights. Everything was clean & tidy when we arrived.  The beds were a little more squeaky then I would have liked, but not a deal breaker. We left for our 1st day of Disneyland & when we got back that evening our room was completely cleaned! They even folded our own blankets & my kids pajamas! The free breakfast was just like they said, boxed cereal, pre-packaged muffins & yogurt, they didn’t lead us to believe it was anything else. But it was all great on the go food.  The walking distance for Disney was just right! Close enough that we could see fireworks, but far enough that we didn’t have to deal with the crowds. We will defiantly stay here again for future trips!
Manager Response: Dear Sean C,  Thank you very much for taking the time for write a wonderful review for the Alpine Inn. We delighted that you found the Disneyland Parks just a short walk and that the room was clean and comfortable. We would love to welcome you back anytime you are in the Anaheim area. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Alpine Inn, and the location cannot be beat for a visit to Disneyland. The kids enjoyed the pool, and the beds were comfortable. The carpet was dingy - pretty obviously from a fresh re-asphalt job on the parking lot, but we heard they are putting in new floors, which will definitely bring it up another notch. The breakfast items were great for us for a quick morning bite, and we had no problem maneuvering our mini-van in the parking lot. The pool, free parking, quick walk to Disneyland, plus the friendly staff and nice decor, all helped contribute to a nice stay.
Manager Response: Dear OutdoorsyTypes,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review for the Alpine Inn. We are delighted you had a great experience with the staff and enjoyed our amenities. Thank you for the feedback about the carpets, as we do plan to replace all our carpets with hardwood flooring. We hope to see you again in the near future.   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Great Hotel for the price. Very friendly hotel and a 15 min walk to the main gate! The rooms where nice and clean! I would totally stay here again. We got a free upgrade to a suite parking space a little limited.
Manager Response: Dear susyelenas,  Thank you for the awesome review of the Alpine Inn. We are more than happy, that you had a great stay. Also, that you found the Alpine Inn, just a short walk to the Disneyland Main Gate and that your rooms were nice and clean. Thank you again, and if you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn
