Summary: I loved the location of the property. Easy walk to the parks and if you need tickets, they sell them. So easy! No need to wait in the long lines at the park. Walking to and from the parks I felt very safe. I even walked alone, but because it is a busy street always people and cars and buses around. Only issue was with the hot water. If that could be consistant, I would give Alpine Inn 5 stars. They offer breakfast snacks and coffee and tea in the morning. I would recommend this property to my friends and family.
Manager Response: Dear Marvelfan2011,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review of the Alpine Inn. We are delighted that you had an easy and safe walk to the Disneyland Parks and enjoyed the basic continental breakfast. Also, we do appreciate the feedback about the hot water, as this message has been passed along to our maintenance manager. We hope to see you again in the near future, thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: location: very close to convention center and the park       service: friendly (available all day)    breakfast: convinient (open at 4:00 !) Information: good           room: clean and comfortable I reccomend this Inn for visitors who want to stay active in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear winbell1303,  Thank you for your review of the Alpine Inn and the detailed information about our property. We are delighted you found the Alpine Inn, priced reasonably, very close to the Anaheim Convention Center and the Disneyland Parks. We also appreciate the recommendation and hope to see you again soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: The best part about this hotel is that it is about a 10 minute walk to both Disney parks in Anaheim. This is originally why we chose it. It is also fairly affordable since the majority of our stay we weren’t even in the hotel room. There was a weird buzzing in our bathroom that sounded like there was a constant electric razor on, which was strange. Also, our fridge only had one temperature, which was FREEZING, so we couldn’t put any food or drinks in the fridge to stay cool. Overall, was a good stay for the value and the distance to Disney which is what we were here for.
Manager Response: Dear EpicAllison,  Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review of the Alpine Inn. We are happy that you found our property a short walk to the both Disney Parks and found the rooms affordable. We have passed the message to our maintenance manager, about the buzzing sound and apologize about the fridge just having one setting. Next time, let us know during your stay and we can see if it can be adjusted. Thank you again for taking the time to write a review and hope to see you again on your next visit to Disney.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Clean, convenient and well priced plus very friendly staff. Only a 10 minute walk to Downtown Disney makes it perfect to save on parking and if you want a quick break from the parks during the day. Will stay again
Manager Response: Dear Benjamin O,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your recent stay at the Alpine Inn. We are more than happy to know that everything was clean, convenient, well priced and the front desk staff was very friendly. Thank you and anytime you are in the Anaheim area or visiting Disneyland, we would love to welcome you back.   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Staff is very friendly and helpful. I was able to buy our Disneyland tickets in the front office with no hassle. Coffee and continental breakfast provided in the lobby. Easy walk to Disneyland. Room had a microwave and refrigerator. They allowed us to park in their parking lot and check in later in the day. Everything was great. Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear elainelc57,  Thank you so much for the positive review of the Alpine Inn. It is our pleasure, that you had a great experience here; from the front desk staff to our amenities, so thank you for that. We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn, anytime you are in the Anaheim area. Thank you again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Comfortable beds. Simple rooms. Basic complimentary breakfast of cereal, muffins, yoghurt and fruit. 5min walk to Disney including downtown which was real handy. Showers are ok. Not great pressure. Close to a selection of eating places.
Manager Response: Dear Lara S,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of the Alpine Inn. We are happy that you would found our beds to be comfortable, a easy and short walk to the Disneyland Parks and close to a selection of restaurants. Thank you again for the review and hope to see you again in the future!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Wife and I always stay here when visiting Disneyland. Always clean and affordable. Customer service always polite and accommodating.  10 min walk to Disney gate and they let us park our car there before and after checking in/out.
Manager Response: Dear David B,  Thank you for the positive review of the Alpine Inn Anaheim. We do appreciate the kind words and that you and your wife always stay here while visiting Disneyland. Also glad to hear that your stay here has been consistent and enjoyable. Please let us know when you stay with us again and we will be able to apply a repeat discount rate. Hope you see you again in the near future!   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Very clean, conveniently placed and inexpensive
Summary: The room was comfy, staff was very nice and was very close to all the areas I wanted to visit. Nice place, great area and definitely  not expensive! I will definitely stay here again if I come back to this area.
Manager Response: Dear Crystalann32,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our property. We are happy you found the room comfy, staff friendly and the price affordable! We do hope you stay with us again, if you are ever in the Anaheim area. Thank you again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine inn

Summary Heading: Get your kicks at Alpine Inn
Summary: We just finished a 2 month trip on Route 66 & Dawn Welch from the Rock Café in Stroud Oklahoma, who is the inspiration for Sally in the Cars movie, recommended the Alpine Inn to us. Totally spot on was 'Sally'! Close to Disneyland, very comfortable, terrific staff & really good value made the Alpine Inn perfect for our visit to Cars Land.
Manager Response: Dear Daryl M,  Thank you for writing a great review for the Alpine Inn! That is amazing, the inspiration for Sally in the cars movie, recommend the Alpine Inn to you! We love to hear stories like that but most of all that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future!   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We stay a week at the Alpine.  Room was nice. Beds were great.  Bathroom is a bit small and the carpet could be replaced.  Very friendly staff, made you feel at home.  It has a fairly small number of rooms.  Parking was a bit crowded on the weekend, but was free.  Easy walk to Disney with no major roads to cross to get to the parks.  Breakfast was minimal, but good.  Orange juice/coffee/tea/hot chocolate, muffins, hot/cold cereal, yogurt & apple/oranges was about it. Walgreen's; 7/11; CVS was at the end of the block.  FYI..  California has a plastic bag law.  You get charged 10 cents for a bag at these stores.  Would stay at the Alpine Inn again.
Manager Response: Dear rbalaka,  Thank you for the detailed review of the Alpine Inn! We are very delighted to hear, you had a great stay; short walk to the Disneyland Parks/Restaurants/Stores and our front desk staff made it a family like atmosphere. Thank you also for the feedback about the carpets, as we still are in the process of changing the carpets to wood flooring. We hope to give you an update soon about the renovations that will occur within the next year. We would love to welcome you back anytime you are in the Anaheim Area!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: I've been staying at this hotel for years since it's right behind California Adventures. It's an easy walk to the parks, about 15-20min. The rooms were nice and clean as they always are, and they renovated the bathrooms so that was a nice surprise. The people at the front desk were friendly.
Manager Response: Dear J T,  Thank you for taking to the time to write a great review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy you had another wonderful stay with us and found the property just a short walk to the Disneyland Parks. Thank you so much again for returning to the Alpine Inn and hope to see you again, the next time you are in Anaheim.   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Another great visit at Alpine Inn
Summary: We absolutely love the Alpine Inn! We stay here every time we visit because the rooms are clean, the beds are comfortable and the staff is AMAZING! Thank you Alpine Inn for being a safe, affordable, cozy home away from home for our family! We <3 you guys!
Manager Response: Dear Lynnette C,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a wonderful review! We are so delighted to hear that you had another great stay and we do appreciate that you have been coming back to stay with us! We hope to see you again soon!   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We stayed here this week for the first time and had a great experience! The price is perfect considering we spend very little time in our hotel room when we are visiting Anaheim. The walk to Disneyland is easy and enjoyable (only a 10 minute walk to the park/ Downtown Disney). We went to a concert at The House of Blues and that's just a 10 minute walk also. The room itself is very standard and nothing fancy, but for the price, it is what it is. The bed is SOOO comfortable, the room is CLEAN, but the floors are pretty grimey. We read reviews that the carpet is gross and it really is-so bring extra socks or slippers to walk around the room in. The only thing I think Alpine could do better is to replace the carpets. We will definitely stay at Alpine Inn in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review for the Alpine Inn. We are delighted to hear that you had a  great experience and stay with us. The walk was easy and enjoyable to the Disney parks, downtown Disney, and the new House of Blues, that is right down the street from us. We do appreciate the feedback about the carpets, as we regularly do a carpet cleaning, but would like to let you know, that we are in the process of remodeling all our rooms and are going to replace the carpet with wood flooring. We would love to welcome you back in the future! Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Over the last 30 years of occasional visits to Anaheim we've always remarked on how quaint the Alpine Inn appeared but usually stayed at chain hotels. Maybe we've missed a trick.  There's a lot to commend the Alpine Inn, mainly its location. There's also a friendly welcome, adequate rooms, a modest pool area and basic breakfast included in the price.  At this price it's excellent value.
Manager Response: Dear adrianhobson,  Thank you for taking the time to write a positive review for the Alpine Inn. We are delighted to hear that you noticed our property and decided to give us a chance. We do understand that at times, you don't know exactly what you get from an independent hotel but that you found the Alpine Inn, conveniently located to the Disneyland Parks, restaurants, and Anaheim Convention Center. Thank you again, and if you are ever back in the area, we would love to welcome you back!   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Our stay at Alpine Inn was great! Very clean rooms with comfortable beds, very affordable and only a 10 minute walk to Disneyland! The stay comes with a nice little continental breakfast consisting of yogurts, muffins, fruit, cereals, and milk.  This was really nice and saves money on breakfast at the park.  The people at the front desk were very friendly and helpful.  There's a computer in the lobby you can use if needed. That was helpful to us in accessing travel docs we couldn't easily get to on our phones.  We will definitely stay here again!!
Manager Response: Dear ChuckyA_inPhcx,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy to hear, that you stay was great and you found the rooms very clean, beds comfortable and easy walk to the Disneyland parks. Also, that you able to utilize our lobby computer to print/access documents. Thanks again and hope to see you in the future!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We only stayed here one night 10/4/17 to surprise our 7 year old son with a trip to Disney.  We arrived at about 8am and of course didn't expect to check in, but we did let the front desk know we were there and they gave us a paper to put in our car for parking (no charge) while we were at Disney.  Area seemed very safe and we were able to walk to Disney, took roughly 10 minutes.  I will tell you the walk seems longer at the end of the day after walking all over Disney so keep that in mind.  Tons of different restaurant choices in the area.  We returned about 6pm to collect our keys, and we had been upgraded to family room.  The room was a great size and very clean, shower pressure worked good and I was able to get plenty of hot water.  All three front desks clerks I spoke to
Manager Response: Dear KL H,  Thank you for the amazing and detailed review. We are delighted to hear, that you enjoyed our location, found the front desk team friendly and room very clean. We always enjoy hearing positive reviews about our front desk team, as we try our best to go over and beyond to make your stay memorable. I will definitely pass the kind words to our front desk team, so thank you again! If you are every back to Disney, we would love to welcome you back! Thank you again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Excellent location, clean and comfortable and at a great price. Right on the back of carsland, free parking and breakfast. And stay away friendly. Highly recommended. Plus points their are also washing machines and tumble dryers available and you are a short 10-15mins from park entertance
Manager Response: Dear dcweeman,  Thank you for the awesome review. We are happy to hear, that you found the Alpine Inn, an excellent location, clean and comfortable, and at a great price. We appreciate the recommendation and would love for you to stay with us in the future. If you are repeat guest and book directly with us, we are able to give you a discounted rate. So in the future give us a call for your reservation. Thank you again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We have stayed at many different hotels in Anaheim, but this was our first stay at Alpine Inn. We were pleasantly surprised with this small out of the way hotel. Customer service was great, the rooms were very clean and in good repair, and the breakfast was pretty good with a decent selection for a small hotel. There was no seating for breakfast but they provided trays so you could take your breakfast back to your room. We walked to Disneyland from the hotel and it took between 10 and 15 minutes (can't remember exactly). Parking was a little tight as others have mentioned, but we were able to find parking the days we stayed. Overall, it was a great stay and we would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Dale2Lisa,  Thank you for the great review! We are happy that you enjoyed, your first stay with us and hope there are many more to come. We do realize that at times, parking may be a little tight, but we always guarantee one free parking spot per room. We would love to welcome you back, if you are ever in the Anaheim Area. Thanks again for taking the time to write a review and hope to see you in the near future.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: The Alpine Inn is CLEAN, reasonable and very affordable. Short walk to Disney. Close to restaurants, shops of all kinds. Great for Families. Not fancy , breakfast is limited but very adiquit.  The homeless at night are the only drawback. That did scare the kids a bit.But that is unavoidable unless the city can intervene.
Manager Response: Dear Mary G,   Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review for the Alpine Inn. We are more than happy, you had a great stay with us and found the rooms, clean, reasonable and very affordable.  We do appreciate all the feedback and hope to continue to improve our guest experience. If you are every back in the Anaheim area, we would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Close to Disney, clean and big rooms. Great price for the 3-night stay. Room temperature was perfect and the beds were very comfortable. Free breakfast was always fully stocked. Parking was free but a bit crowded. Had access to other amenities as well.
Manager Response: Dear mike_1025217,  Thank you for taking the time for writing a positive review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy that you found the rates affordable, beds comfortable and our continental breakfast. We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn, anytime you are in the Anaheim Area. Thank you again and hope to see you in the near future!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: This hotel has good location to Disney, coffee and restaurants. Beds and linens average. Towels on small and thin towels. Comfort of bed was decent. To say they had breakfast is a small counter with cold cereal available with packaged muffins and yogurt. Not any place to sit. But it is offered. Our room never got serviced because the cleaning schedule allotted for our room was around 3:00 in the afternoon and we had to get dressed for a wedding. Not the maids fault, but, hate getting into an unmade bed.   The rooms were given a face lift, but tub was chipped with dark stained caulking. The room had a microwave, fridge, and iron.
Manager Response: Dear HappygoluckyPhoenix,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review for the Alpine Inn. Also, for the feedback , as we do appreciate the suggestions, so we can better serve our guests. We are delighted that you found our location, close to Disney, coffee and restaurants. Thank you again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Short walk from park, clean quiet rooms
Summary: This was our second stay at Alpine Inn. I chose it for the value. They are about a 15 minute walk from the park. Not as close as I would have enjoyed, but a safe easy walk, at the end of a long day. The rooms are clean and comfortable. Nothing too fancy but they do have a fridge and a microwave, which was nice. I particular liked how they do not try to nickel and dime you. They do not charge for parking or wi-fi like most hotels along Harbor do. This was a nice benefit as it made the trip a little more affordable. We stayed 4 nights and it was very peaceful. We are annual passholders and plan to return in a few months.
Manager Response: Dear Addi2016,  Thank you for the amazing review! We are more that happy that you stayed with us for the second time and you had another great experience. We appreciate our repeat guests and in the future, if you booked directly with us and have stayed before, we can apply a discount for you! Thank you again and see you soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Small hotel with a family feel
Summary: We loved our stay at Alpine Inn. The service was friendly & efficient. We arrived early, and Kevin arranged an early check-in for us. It's a short 10-15 min walk to Disneyland. The OCTA bus stop is right outside & the Luxbus stops at the corner of Katella & Harbor, a short walk from the hotel. The convention centre is over the road. For cleanliness, location, friendly service, value for money, you can't beat this hotel. We will definately return. I've knocked off one star, because the furnishings are tired and need a re-vamp.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time for write a review for the Alpine Inn. We are delight that we we were able to accommodate an early check in for you and that our front desk team was friendly and efficient. Also, that you found the Alpine Inn, conveniently located to the Disneyland Parks and the Anaheim Convention Center. Thank you again and would love to welcome you back anytime you are in the Anaheim area.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We visited The Alpine Inn last week and were extremely pleased with this hotel! It was spotless and well kept. The beds were comfy and housekeeping was outstanding. It is located literally behind Cars land in Disney’s California Adventure! It is an easy walk to Downtown Disney and both Disneyland and California Adventure Parks. We will definitely stay here again on our next visit to Anaheim. The front desk staff was very courteous and helpful, especially when we had an issue with our reservations. Truly a hidden gem!
Manager Response: Dear Sharon M,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a wonderful and detailed review for the Alpine Inn. We are more than delighted that you were extremely pleased with our property. It does give our front desk team and housekeeping team motivation to continue to go above and beyond to provide quality service. Thank you very much again and will definitely convey the kind words to our team. Hope to see you again in the future!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great location for families wanting to avoid parking at Disneyland
Summary: This is great place to stay if you're visiting Disneyland and want to keep costs down. The location is close to the park entrance. If you're up for walking 10-15 minutes you can avoid paying for parking at the park. It also is very reasonably priced. Our room was clean and quiet. The bed was comfy. The staff was very, very friendly. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Lindsey L,  Thank you for taking your time to write a review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy that you found the Disneyland Parks close to your property, rooms were clean and quiet and also that our front desk staff were very friendly.  We would love to welcome you back anytime you are visiting the Disneyland Parks or in the Anaheim Area. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Clean, reasonably priced and close proximity to Disneyland
Summary: We arrived at the property at 8:00AM for a 3:00PM check-in.  They allowed us to park our car at the property, so that we could spend the day a Disney parks.  We returned to check-in much later in the day.  Title says it all. I would stay there again on another trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Kenj-824,  Thanks for the kind words about your stay with us at the Alpine Inn. We are happy you were able to leave the car before the 3PM check in time and take the short walk to the Disneyland Parks and that you found the rates priced reasonably. Thank you again, and we would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn, in the near future. Lastly, if you mention that you are a repeat guest and book directly with us (call to make reservation), we can apply an additional discount.   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Just stayed here his past weekend and really enjoyed our stay. Rooms were clean, service was great (thanks Kevin!), And you can't beat the close proximity to Disneyland. Lost our room key too and Kevin helped us out very promptly and politely. Would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear David L,  Thank you for taking the time to write an amazing review for the Alpine Inn. We are pleased that you had such a great experience with us and that Kevin was helpful and able to provide great customer service. I will personally let him know of the kind words, so thank you very much. We would love for you to stay again with us in the future. Please give us a call directly to make your next reservation and we will be able to apply a discounted rate for our repeat guests. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: it was fine...clean low end property but close to disney and the staff was very nice. was clean  continental breakfast was typical lobby muffins, coffee, fruit they were nice enough to let us leave our car there all day even though we officially checked out at 9am and the parking was free
Manager Response: Dear Michelle C.  Thank you for taking your time to write a review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy about your experience with us and they you were able to leave your car upon departure to go to the Disneyland Parks. Please let us know if there is any feedback for improvement as we strive to continue to enhance your experience with us. Thanks again and hope to see you again in the future.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great small motel within easy walk to parks
Summary: We loved this property, the rooms are back off of Katella so they do not get road noise.  However, if sudden loud noises at night are an issue, the fireworks from the park echo loudly off of the hotel across the street.
Manager Response: Dear Lksegal,  Thank you for taking the time to write a positive review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy that you found the Alpine Inn just an easy to the parks. The way our property is located, we do not get much noise from traffic or Disney but yes unfortunately the Disney fireworks are going to be pretty loud at night. Thank you again and hope to see you again in the future.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: The Alpine Inn is a GREAT place right next to Disneyland.  Accommodations were very easy and welcoming in a choice location.  Walking distance to the park, pharmacies, and tons of restaurant options.  The best part was helpful staff, as they graciously allowed us to park on-site during our stay at the park - even though we had checked out earlier that morning. Great value, and will come back!
Manager Response: Dear Jflo41,  Thank you such much for the amazing review. It does bring our whole team a lot of joy to read the positive review and will pass along the message to our whole team. But overall, delight that you are a great experience with the Alpine Inn. Thank you again and would love to welcome you back anytime you are in the Anaheim area. Please give us a call directly for future reservations and let us know you are a repeat guest and we can apply a discount for your next stay. Thanks you again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: I have stayed at this facility probably 7-8 times for business. It doesn't look like much but the room is clean, has a fridge and microwave which a lot of them around there do not, the bed and pillows are super comfortable and they have a great rate. The people working the desk have always been very nice. I would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Rieubp,  Thank you for writing such a positive review for the Alpine Inn. We do appreciate the kind words and also that you stay with us 7-8 times for business. Also, we are pleased that you had a good experience during each stay; clean room, microwave/mini-fridge, and that our bed was comfortable. Thank you again, and would love to welcome you back to Alpine Inn.   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We stayed two nights in a 2 Queen room. Very clean and just right for our family. Easy walk to Disney parks. Free simple breakfast of muffins and cereal.  There’s no elevator but that wasn’t an issue for us. Beds were firm but comfortable. Staff in office were all friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Minnie1016,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review for the Alpine Inn. We are pleased about your experience staying with us; Very clean rooms, free simple breakfast and easy walk to the Disney Parks. Thank you again and we would love to welcome you back anytime you are in the Anaheim Area.   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: It is completely adequate. The room was clean. The staff was very friendly. They have an included breakfast that includes dry cereals and a basket of fruits. Milk, juice and coffee also included. The room has the style of AC that is mounted in the wall below the window which makes it cold in the bed closest to it and warm on the bed farther away from it. They also have free wifi and do not charge for parking. Their property backs up to Radiator Springs in California Adventure. It is easily in walking distance to Disneyland, Downtown Disney and California Adventure.
Manager Response: Dear RSRBOB,  Thanks for taking the time to write a review for the Alpine Inn. We are please you enjoyed the stay, and thank for the feedback about the AC in the rooms. We do appreciate any feedback, so we can improve your experience at the Alpine Inn. Thank you again and would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Close to theme parks and family restaurants,and convenience stores. Reception staff friendly. We arrived from Australia after a long flight on a very hot day  with a 4year old at 10.00am. Since check in was3pm they went out of the way to get our 2rooms ready asap to get us some relief from the heat
Manager Response: Dear Robynnepenrith,  Thank you for taking the time to write a great review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy, that you found the Disney Parks, restaurants, and convenience stores all within walking distance. We do try to accommodate all our guests requests and delighted that you were able to get into the room before our 3PM check in time. Thank you again and hope to see you in the future!   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We had a pleasant stay. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The room was clean and pleasant. The cleaning crew was very thorough. The only downside for us is that the beds are extremely firm - but this may not be an issue for some. If you are visiting Disneyland the location is excellent!
Manager Response: Dear LolaInThe Desert,  Thank you for taking the time to write a postie review for the Alpine Inn. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us, found the rooms pleasant and clean and  also that our front desk team was friendly and helpful. Thank you again and would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn in the future!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: What a find! Cheap for the area, only a 5 minute walk to Disneyland, food places all around, and a 7/11 just up the road. Pool was great, we used it most days, it was never busy. Laundry was $3, dryer 25 cents. You can buy laundry powder at reception for $1.   The room was spacious, comfortable, clean and quiet. We slept well. Good shower. Room had an iron and fridge. Aircon worked well.   My only suggestions would be if there were healthy breakfast meusli's available instead of just sugar cereal or porridge, a kettle and tea bags in the room, and some cutlery and bowls in the room. And do away with the plastic cutlery for environmental purposes.   We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear I-am-amy-nz,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write such a great review for the Alpine Inn. We are delighted that you found the room; affordable, clean, comfortable and quiet but also a short walk to the Disneyland Parks. Thank you also, for giving us feedback for our continental breakfast, we love to hear from the guests on how we can improve and so we can best cater towards your needs. We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn on your next visit to Disneyland!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Rooms clean, quiet, Good front desk service, parking included, convenient location for Disney, restaurants. Good value for the money. I would stay here again if visiting Disney. Enjoyed our stay, thank you.
Manager Response: Dear Adam I,  Thanks for writing the Alpine Inn a positive review. We are happy that you had a great experience with us and it was a convenient location for the Disneyland Parks and restaurants. We hope to see you again in the near future, please contact us directly the next time you book and we can offer a repeat guest rate. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Excellent place to stay a true hidden  gem very close to Disneyland very quiet will go back have already booked for Christmas trip will recommend this  motel to others room was very clean and bed was comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Kjamesreading,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review for the Alpine Inn and recommending us to your friends. We are also delighted that you enjoyed your birthday trip! Thank you again and we will look forward to seeing you during your Christmas trip!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Good hotel in a great location
Summary: We stayed for 3 nights in August 17. The room was a good size and was nice and clean with reliable WiFi. The location was great - about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland. We walked home late at night and always felt safe. There is a pharmacy and 7/11 on the corner if needed and plenty of restaurants around if required. We didn't have a car but parking was available. There was also a small selection of muffins / coffee etc. available for breakfast which was a pleasant surprise. For the price and location, I don't think the Alpine Inn can be beat!
Manager Response: Dear Aimee S,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a great review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy that you were satisfied with your room size, and had reliable WiFi. We actually just upgraded our WiFi, to a stronger fiber connection! Thank you again for the positive review and would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn.   Best, Derrick L Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: A nice place to stay - right in the backyard of Disneyland.
Summary: This place was very convenient to nearby locations for resturants and stores and other attractions - walking distance to Disneyland. This place was a bit far from the beach or the coastal shore line. If you want to be very close to the beach, then book elsewhere. Other than that, a good and comfortable place to stay and the staff were friendly and courteous. Recommended for potential customers wanting to see Anaheim and Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Johnkowal,  Thank you for writing such an amazing review for the Alpine Inn. We are delighted that you found the Alpine Inn conveniently located to restaurants, stores and walking distance to Disneyland. We appreciate the kind words about the front desk staff as we truly value your experience with us. Thanks again and would love to welcome you back, anytime you are in the Anaheim area.   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great hotel for being on a Budget!
Summary: We stayed here for 6 days and 5 nights! I enjoyed my stay at Alpine Inn. We stayed for our summer vacation, and enjoyed a short walk to Disneyland for 5 days. The hotel price was great for us, as we were on a budget. About a 10 min walk to the gate at Disneyland. The room was very standard, the free breakfast was standard, the staff was friendly. I would recommend this hotel to those who are on  budget! just your basic hotel and it was good enough for us!
Manager Response: Dear KpelotAZ,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy that you found us to be less expensive and a great value. Also, that you enjoyed the short 10-12 minute walk to Disneyland. Thank you very much for the recommendation and would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn! Thank you again for the review!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Affordable and Safe, all I need when visiting Anaheim
Summary: This is my second time staying with the Alpine Inn and I have to say I now have a go to place to stay in Anaheim. Literally on the California Adventure back-end property, this small Inn has continued to be a warm and welcoming place for those looking for a quick getaway to Disneyland. The front service staff was always welcoming and pleasant and remembered who I was from my first stay! Even getting to the Inn at 8 am, they got us checked in within 5 minutes and held our bags so we were able to go to the park right away. Nothing fancy for breakfast but were more than generous with their selection of fruit, muffins, OJ, milk, cereal, coffee, and tea. Let's be honest, breakfast is going to be a pricey meal if you're headed to the park and I'm usually a grab and go eater anyways so
Manager Response: Dear Daniel525600,  Thank you taking the time for write such a great review for the Alpine Inn! We do appreciate you returning to the Alpine Inn and that we are your go to Inn for Disney. Our front desk team appreciates your feedback and love to see returning guests! Overall, we are more than happy that you had a memorable stay and look forward to many more to come! If you are ever back in the Anaheim area, we would love to welcome you back. Please give us a call directly to make a reservation and ask for the repeat guest rate. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Best Value for your hotel in the area!!!
Summary: Other than the Disney resort hotels there is only about 1 hotel that is closed of a walk to downtown Disney! The location is very convenient and is a 2 minute walk from Walgreens,CVS, and 7/11. The rooms are very clean and spacious. The hotel staff are amazing and very kind and they let you leave your bags behind the front desk if you get there early before your room or if you want to do things after you check out! The pool (for being in a parking lot) was very clean and nice with chairs and umbrellas!
Manager Response: Dear Katelynm1223,  Thank for you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review for the Alpine Inn. We are delighted that you had a great vacation at the Disneyland Parks, the rooms very clean and spacious and also that our front desk staff were helpful. Thank you again for the kind words and would love to welcome you back, anytime you are in the Anaheim area. Thanks again!  Best. Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great Value and not as "hectic" as other Disney area properties
Summary: AI was half the price of the Marriott where the convention was taking place. Which was nice on the wallet and on the ability to break away from the convention to spend time with family while they were taking breaks from the happiest place.
Manager Response: Dear B8427ACjeffk,  Thank you for taking the time to write a positive review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy you not only found the Alpine Inn, a "great value" but convenient to get to the Anaheim Convention Center and the Disneyland parks. Thank you again and we would love to welcome you back, to the Alpine Inn in the future!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: could not ask for anything better
Summary: great location, 15 min to the park gates, variety of restaurants all within walking distance, continental breakfast was a good selection of cereals, milk, juice yogurt, queen room with 2 beds was roomy.good for two adults and two teens, pool was clean, fresh towels every day, housekeeping was impeccable. I highly recommend you consider staying at the Alpine. You will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Nagevader,  Thanks for taking the time to write a great review for the Alpine Inn. We are more than happy that, you had a memorable experience during your vacation and at the Alpine Inn. We do appreciate the recommendation and we will love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn, anytime you are in the Anaheim area. Thank you again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: I have stayed here 3 times. The first two were a little more pleasant than the last but I was still satisfied overall. I booked on booking.com, 3 nights for 385 bucks but after taxes and fees it came out to about 450. The room was noticeably not as nice as the times I booked directly through the hotel's website so in the future I will definitely do that. In this case there was no availability on their site so I was grateful to find it on another platform through trip advisor. The beds this time were NOT comfortable - mattresses definitely need to be replaced in RM 122. And the water pressure was pretty low, carpets felt dirty/damp, AC barely functioned and bathroom light was dim. These were not issues in the past. On the plus side, Alpine Inn does not charge extra for parking,
Manager Response: Dear Joni L,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review for the Alpine Inn. Thank you also for returning back the Alpine Inn, as we do try our best to provide a consistent positive experience for all of our returning guests. The issues you have brought up will be directed to the right personnel, and will look into the room as well. But thank you for the kind words and we hope you are willing to give us another chance to make things right. If you have any questions or concerns please don't hesitate to contact us. In the future, please give us a call directly to make a reservation, and we can happily apply a repeat guest rate. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Clean and affordable hotel within walking distance to Disney parks
Summary: We did not have any issues during our five night stay. The room was cleaned daily, towels were changed regularly. There is a fridge, microwave, iron with a board, alarm clock, TV, hairdryer and two complimentary bottles of water. There was no noise. Light breakfast (3-4 choices of cereal, oatmeal, muffins, yogurt, apples and oranges, coffee or tea, milk and orange juice) was decent and hit the spot. No need for a car or shuttle if you don't mind 15 minute walk to the park, literally the hotel is right behind the Cars Land. The staff was very friendly. The beds were super comfortable. There is a Seven 11 store on a way to the park where you can get some water and any last minute things. Overall, I would recommend this hotel for a budget stay.
Manager Response: Dear Nataliah724,  Thank you very much for taking the time write such a positive review for the Alpine Inn. We are delighted all of our room amenities; mini-fridge, microwave, met all your needs. Also that you found the Disneyland parks just a short walk from our property. Thank you again, and we hope to see you soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Clean, comfortable, quiet, friendly. Easy walk to the Disney parks. Park your car with free, no hassle parking. Front desk very friendly and helpful. Will most definitely stay here again. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear Intrepidtraveler45,  Thank you very much for the amazing review! We are pleased you found the Alpine Inn, "Clean, comfortable, quiet and friendly". Also just a convenient walk to the Disney Parks with out having to drive or find parking. I will relay the kind message to our front desk team. We do value your experience at the Alpine Inn and hope to see you again in the near future! Thanks again.  Best, Derrick L Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Good economical housing. It is not a Hyatt, Hilton or Marriot it is economical
Summary: Across the street from the convention center BUT it the convention center is under construction. A nice walk from the arena to the end of the convention center.  The arena is at the front.  Breakfast is good for a fast start breakfast.  The coffee is yucky!  Just saying--needs to be stronger or use a different brand.  I felt like we were under a microscope when we were getting items to take back to our rooms to eat.  Sometimes they have boxed milk & sometimes not, sometimes they have yogurt & somtimes not. I found out as i was leaving you need to ask if the items are not out--"they forget" to put them out.   Personally if you are going to offer breakfast quit nickel & diming it just do it! There is no where in this very small lobby to eat.  So if you are taking food for the
Manager Response: Dear Sherry W,  Thank your very much for taking the time to write such a detailed review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy that you found the rooms clean, beds comfortable and the WIFI had great service. We do apologize about the breakfast situation and will go over the issues with all of our staff. Thank you again for taking  your time to write the review and we would love to welcome you back, anytime you are in the Anaheim Area!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: This inn was exceptional. Any of the smallest questions I had about anything near especially Disneyland was answered amacable. The staff was fantastic and the rooms were what you would expect except for the AC. I mean damn do you use Elsa flurries to power those things or what? Overall I love you guys and next time I come to Disneyland I will definitely look you up. After all you are only a skip hop and a jump away from the happiest place on Earth.
Manager Response: Dear Whos_haten,  Thanks for taking the time to write such a great review for the Alpine Inn. We are pleased that our rooms and amenities met your needs, and that you found the Alpine Inn a short distance to the Disney Parks. We would love for you to stay again, please give us a call directly to make your next reservation, to see if we are able to apply a discounted rate for your next stay. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: A Sanctuary in the Vacation Storm!
Summary: Okay - I'm not gonna lie....if you want a fancy hotel with tons of amenities, huge pool, and lots of staff to serve your every whim - don't stay here.  However, if you realize you are staying right beside California Adventure park (literally right behind the rocks of Radiator Springs Racers) and will probably be very busy with all the other things around, especially the Disney Parks and Anaheim Convention Center, and spend very little time in your room...then this place is great! It was so nice to be able to park and not have to drive anywhere - to walk 10 minutes and be at the gates of Disneyland or California Adventure Parks and be able to walk back at the end of the day, or even when exhausted and need a short break in the middle of the day. The room was a standard hotel
Manager Response: Dear LiahonaDad,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a detailed review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy that our property was the perfect fit for your stay. The convenience of a short walk to the Disney Main Gates and also to the Anaheim Convention Center. Thank you very much for the feedback about our continental breakfast as we are always trying to improve. Also, we do appreciate the kinds words for the Front Desk Team and we are pleased that we were able to help you in anyway. If you are ever back in the Anaheim area, we would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: The room was freshly painted and everything looked great until you looked at the floors. The carpet was matted down and very dingy. The bathroom tile and grout were dirty. Needless to say we wore flip flops the whole time. It was convenient to Disney. Breakfast is offered but very limited (packaged items). The ac never worked well though they "fixed"it.
Manager Response: Dear PastorAmy,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We do apologize about your experience and we have informed the upper management about your concerns. We are currently in the process of removing the carpets and replacing them with hardwood flooring. Although, we do have weekly maintenance on all our carpets. We hope you can stay with us in the future, once we remodel our rooms. Thanks again and have a wonderful day!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: The hotel was very convenient for the park in fact just a 10 minute walk away. The hotel itself was very clean and had everything needed for a family of four including hairdryer, an iron and an ironing board. There was also the facility to leave your washing and have it returned by the end of the day. The bathroom was clean and had a bath with a shower over it the sink was separate which made getting ready in the morning easier. There was a hairdryer located by the sink. We had two large double beds that were comfortable. Breakfast was provided, we had a choice of cereal, yogurt, fruit and a selection of patisserie. There was also tea, coffee and orange juice. Most guests took this to their rooms to eat on the trays provided as there is nowhere to sit apart from a couple of
Manager Response: Dear 360AliT,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write such a wonderful review for the Alpine Inn. We are pleased that you found the Disneyland Parks just a short walk, the beds comfortable and that you were satisfied with all our room amenities. We would love for you to stay with us again in the future on your next visit to Anaheim. Thanks again, Cheers!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: location is realllly good, for people who want to travel to Disneyland or California adventure is really good choice! its about 12-15mins walk. room very clean and beds are comfortable. All the staffs are really nice and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Bsbypink7978,  Thanks for writing an awesome review for us! We are delighted that you found it a short walk to the Disneyland Parks, that the beds were comfortable and your room very clean. We also appreciate the kind words about the Staff. Thanks again for taking the time to write the review for us and welcome you back to the Alpine Inn, anytime you are in the area!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Terrific reasonable hotel near Disneyland. Very nice staff  clean rooms even coffee and muffins and fruit to get you started in the morning.  We stayed 5 nights and thought it was perfect for our needs. If you're going to Disneyland or to see the Angels this is a perfect place to stay and save money for other things. Reasonable for the area and location and made to feel welcome!
Manager Response: Dear Christotara,  Thank you for taking the time to write a wonderful review! We are ecstatic that you had a terrific stay and found the Alpine Inn, perfect for your needs; close to the Disney Parks and reasonable pricing! From the all of us at the Alpine Inn, thank you, for the kind words about the Front Desk Staff and Housekeeping! If you are ever in the Anaheim Area, we would love to welcome you back!   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: The Alpine Inn is at very good location; it was an easy walk to Disneyland. The staff was very helpful and courteous. The front desk helped us secure a motorized scooter from a local business. It was delivered and then staff took care of it. The Inn is an older motel but rooms are nice, clean, and comfortable. The pool is very nice as well.
Manager Response: Dear GandC N,  Thank you for taking the time and writing an awesome review for the Alpine Inn. We are delighted that you found our property an easy walk to Disney and that the front desk staff were able to secure a motorized scooter during your stay. And also, that you found the rooms clean and comfortable! We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn, anytime you are in the Anaheim area. Thanks again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: My family of four stayed at the Alpine Inn for three nights in October 2016 for a Disneyland vacation. The staff was so friendly and helpful and the location was great. The complimentary breakfast was enough until lunchtime and the coffee was good. The outside theme/decor is very nice and my boys enjoyed the pool. Parking is close to the rooms and free! The room was a good enough size considering the amount of time we spent in it. Overall, the room was nice. My only complaint was that the carpet was really dirty and old, which made me quite uncomfortable in the room at the time. However, I have seen recent responses on here from management that they are going to redo the floors at the end of this year. If that is true, then I would say that the Alpine Inn is a perfect place to
Manager Response: Dear SJB6705,  Thank you for writing such a great review for the Alpine Inn. We are pleased that your family enjoyed their stay with us! It is truly our goal, for every guest to have a memorable stay at the Alpine Inn. So I am glad you enjoyed our amenities; heated pool, free parking, and continental breakfast. As you read in recent responses, yes we will be redoing/remodeling our rooms and changing out the carpets to hardwood flooring. We would love to welcome you back once this is completed or anytime you are in the Anaheim area. Thanks again for writing the awesome review!  Best, Derrick L.

Summary: Stayed here for my friend's bachelorette.  Got the room with 3 queens that was roomy and comfortable for us.  I came early to decorate the room for the special occasion which turned out nicely. Good for the price.  Short walk to Disneyland as it's like right behind California Adventure.  Had no issue with sound.  I like to be freezing when I sleep and the AC worked well.  They had some snacks at breakfast time at the main desk.  Also, they let us keep our car in their lot while we were at the park even though we checked out that morning.  Simple place but everyone was nice and we slept well.
Manager Response: Dear Kristen M,  First off, thank you for taking the time to write an excellent review for the Alpine Inn. We are more than happy, that we were able to accommodate your group for the Bachelorette party, and you were satisfied with your room but, most importantly you and your friends had a good time. We take great pride to making sure every guests has a memorable and pleasurable stay with us and would love to welcome you back, anytime you are in the Anaheim area!  Best, Derrick L.

Summary: We stayed here on a trip to Disneyland. This is a good location. It's about a 15 minute walk to the parks. Which is a little long when your tired on your walk back at night. The rooms are basic and comfortable. The breakfast included is dry cereal and tiny muffins and coffee. Nice hotel. Nice location
Manager Response: Dear Melissa M,  Thank you for writing a great review for the Alpine Inn. We are glad that you found the Alpine Inn, comfortable and a good location to the Disneyland Parks. We do understand, since you are walking all day at the parks, the walk back may seem a bit long; so in this case we recommend taking an Uber. We would like to personally thank you again Melissa, and hope to see you in the near future!  Best, Derrick L.

Summary: Alpine Inn was a last minute booking on our part and I couldn't have been happier. My son and I enjoyed the free breakfast every morning. We also enjoyed how clean our room was when we came home from the park each day. Previous raters have said the rooms are small, I thought it was perfect. The hotel is also right behind the cars ride, that is how close the walk is.
Manager Response: Dear Missmay1987, Thank you for taking the time to write an amazing review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our clean rooms, free continental breakfast and the walking distance to the Disneyland Parks. Thank you again, and we look forward to see you on your next visit to Anaheim!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: The Alpine Inn is clean and nicely kept. We stayed four nights and were pleased with the service we received. Their rooms are small, but didn't affect us much because we weren't there a lot. Somewhat noisy, but not bad. Loved the fact that it is a short walk to Disney land, and that the neighborhood/surrounding area is safe. Super good value for the money!
Manager Response: Dear Byttrup, We would like to personally thank you for taking the time to write a review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy that you were pleased with the service that your received during your 4 night stay and that you found it just a short walk to the Disneyland Parks. We would love to welcome you back if you are every back in the Anaheim Area. Thank you again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: I was so disappointed after all the good reviews I read before booking this hotel.  After spending a short time (less than an hour) in our room the bottoms of my childrens feet were a filthy black color...GROSS!  I went to the office to see if I'd be able to check out since we had only been  there a short time and was told I'd be charged for the first night but would be able to check out the next day & be refunded for the remainder of my stay.  The office did call me a few hours later to offer a room that had recently had the carpets cleaned but I declined.  Needless to say we only stayed the first night and checked out the very next day.  We had the room with 3 queen beds but the room that I guess was supposed to be "master bedroom" was almost like a closet & the window in the
Manager Response: Dear MY,  I am very sorry that you had to cut short of your stay with us. For your information, we will start to renovate our rooms before the year ends. With the new rooms, all flooring will be replaced with wood floors.   On the complimentary cold breakfast, we are offering muffins, cereals, oatmeal, milk, orange juice, yogurts, fresh fruits, coffee, tea and hot chocolate. We are continuous looking for other breakfast options for our guests.  On your next visit to Disneyland, please give us another try and we will try to win you back.  Best regards, Judy Pao, General Manager

Summary Heading: Outstanding Quality and Price in the Middle of Anaheim
Summary: Absolutely fault-free stay during late June in one of America's busiest tourism capitals...easy 15 walk to the Disneyland main gate, as well as close proximity to food types galore, stores, transportation, etc. Beds are comfortable, rooms are a good size with good noise insulation; A/C is dandy, as are towels, toiletries, hot water pressure, etc. Didn't use the pool, although I saw others doing so, and with enthusiasm. Housekeeping and office service was good. Breakfast offerings are OK...good coffee, I must say.
Manager Response: Dear Ray,  Thank you for your wonderful review and so pleased that you had a great time. I am very lucky to have a great team working with me from housekeeping, maintenance and front desk.   You are right on our location to Disneyland and the easy walk. I hope to see you soon!  Best regards, Judy Pao, General Manager

Summary Heading: Good place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: My family stayed here for three nights while visiting Disneyland. Not too long of a walk to the park. Room was clean, continental breakfast and coffee good, comfortable beds, great place to stay when spending most of your time at the park and in need of a quiet place to get good sleep.
Manager Response: Dear jkw2607,  I am so glad to learn that our property has met all your needs when visiting Disneyland. We are a small property but we strive to give our guests the best stays possible after a long day at the parks.  We have received many compliments on our beds and some have asked to purchase the beds from us. Thank you for visiting us and stay cool during this summer. Some see us soon!  Best regards, Judy Pao, General Manager

Summary: Was here for a baseball park vacation.  This property literally looks at the backside of Disneyland.  That being said, it was nice and quiet and about 5 minutes walk to the main Disneyland gate.   We didn't go to Disney, but if you were going this would be a good location.   MUCH less expensive than other local hotels (especially within the park) and good value for the money.   "Breakfast" is coffee and packaged muffins.  We went out for breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear tarzan2613,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your review of the stay. You are right on point that our property offers locations, locations and locations for visiting Disneyland and Anaheim Convention Center and even baseball park in your case.   We understand that our guests are conscious about expenses and yet still want them to enjoying their vacations.  Please come and visit us soon.  Best regards, Judy Pao, General Manager

Summary: I usually stay on property when we go to Disneyland but we were planning a quick one day trip to the parks so we went with Alpine Inn this time. Check-in was a breeze and since the hotel is so small getting to our room was quick and easy. Our room was very clean and had an updated flat screen tv. It's an easy 15 minute walk to the parks, you don't have any difficult crossings and the walk is lovely with nice flowers. We left right after 7 and had plenty of time to get through security and in the parks in time for rope drop at 8. I would definitely stay here again if I was looking for a bargain near the parks!
Manager Response: Dear Charley,  Thank you for your review and pleased you have a great stay with us. We understand that our guests are visiting the Happiest Place on Earth and always want to make their trip memorable for years to come. Thank you again and see you on your next visit.  Best regards, Judy Pao, General Manager

Summary: Had a chance to stay for 3 nights with family. More of a Motel than a hotel. Room are too compact. Hardly space after a 2 queen bed. Checkin and checkout a breeze. So close to the disneyland that it is just a ten min walk. So many shops nearby. A good gift shop just around the corner. Subway very closeby too.  The major problem was the so called complimentary breakfast. Not sure in which world would one call this a breakfast.  It was in the 10x6 sqft reception place with literally no items whatsoever. There is not even bread (when enquired , the front desk personnel was kind enough to tell us that breads are available in the corner shop. No milk (except for the small cup towards coffee). No fruits. No... just nothing...  Their advt that complimentary breakfast incl in the room
Manager Response: Dear Clsananth Chennai,  Thank you for your review.  I am so sorry that our breakfast did not meet your needs. However, I like to mention that our cold complimentary breakfast includes packaged muffins, individual cartons of milk, orange juice, flavored yogurt, variety packs of cereal, oat meal, apples, oranges, coffee, tea and hot chocolate.   I like to mention that we will renovate our rooms at the end of the year and I personally would like to invite you back to visit us on your next trip back to Disneyland.  Best regards, Judy Pao, General Manager

Summary: This was our first time visiting Disneyland and I would say the Alpine Inn was ok for the one night stay... too bad they don't have an access gate to Disney being on the other side of the park but all in all maybe I was expecting something else... the room was small and the parking lot was very tight that's all I have to say about that..
Manager Response: Dear Mayra,  Thank you for your review. Disneyland has a south entrance within 50 yards of our property but unfortunately the gate is closed. We are consistently working with Disney on possible re-opening of the gate and will keep our guests posted with the latest.  Please feel free to contact us on your next visit to Disneyland and get the status of the gate.   Best regards, Judy Pao, General Manager

Summary: I'll admit it...I'm a germaphobe and more than once have changed hotels upon seeing a room in poor condition.  No worries at Alpine Inn though.  Everything was very clean and new.  Free parking and free grab-n-go breakfast is icing on the cake.  The walk to the parks took us about 10 to 13 min.  We'll  be back!
Manager Response: Dear Kimberly C, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us. Please feel free to call us the next time you are planning to visit or are in the area so that we may attend to your reservation personally. We’re looking forward to being able to accommodate you on your next stay here. Thanks again for taking the time to review us.  Sincerely,  Alpine Staff

Summary: Convenient location next to the Disney Parks, within a 15 minutes walking distance.  Rooms were clean, breakfast was cereal, juice, milk and muffins.  Good to get on the way out, but nothing special.  Parking lot is very small and difficult to manuever when lot is full.   Hotel staff was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear deneow754, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us. Please feel free to call us the next time you are planning to visit or are in the area so that we may attend to your reservation personally. We’re looking forward to being able to accommodate you on your next stay here. Thanks again for taking the time to review us.  Sincerely,  Alpine Staff

Summary: This is our second stay at Alpine Inn . We will always stay here. The staff are accommodating and friendly. The rooms are clean and beds are comfortable. The walk is 17 minutes to Disneyland park. There is a pool it looks clean but we haven't used it yet. The housekeepers are friendly and nice. We needed to switch rooms because we added on a night and they moved our belongings for us so we didn't need to wait for check in . We arrived back after midnight and were already settled to sleep. Thank you Alpine Inn.
Manager Response: Dear holly h, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us and for deciding to return here to visit us. Please feel free to call us the next time you are planning to visit or are in the area so that we may attend to your reservation personally. We’re looking forward to being able to accommodate you on your next stay here. Thanks again for taking the time to review us.  Sincerely,  Alpine Staff

Summary: Our 2 night stay at the Alpine Inn was easy and comfortable. The room was a nice size, the beds and pillows comfortable. Not a huge bathroom but it's just the shower and toilet the sink area is outside the bathroom which is nice so one can get ready while someone else is in the bathroom. It was my husband and two grown boys, again plenty of room.  About a 10 minute walk to Disneyland, not bad at all or a $4 Uber ride.
Manager Response: Dear mommamagni, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us. Please feel free to call us the next time you are planning to visit or are in the area so that we may attend to your reservation personally. We’re looking forward to being able to accommodate you on your next stay here. Thanks again for taking the time to review us.  Sincerely,  Alpine Staff

Summary: Perfect place to stay while on a Disney trip. Short walk to the parks and friendly staff. Bed was comfortable and room was clean. Heated pool and provided breakfast were wonderful. Loved that parking was free. We will definetly be back!
Manager Response: Dear HYV, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us. Please feel free to call us the next time you are planning to visit or are in the area so that we may attend to your reservation personally. We’re looking forward to being able to accommodate you on your next stay here. Thanks again for taking the time to review us.  Sincerely,  Alpine Staff

Summary: We were happy to find such an affordable place to stay for our recent family Disneyland trip.  It was a short and enjoyable walk to Disneyland and Downtown Disney from the hotel, even with a baby and toddler in tow.  The rooms were well-kept and quiet, the staff was extremely friendly and helpful,  the beds were comfy, the linens and bathrooms were clean and well stocked, the breakfast was simple but convenient (and free!), and the parking was close, convenient and free.  There were no hidden charges at checkout, which we appreciated.  The pool is nothing special, but heated and good for a quick dip!  Our only real complaint was the carpet. The carpet was filthy, which was difficult with small children.  We all kept our shoes on in the room, otherwise socks and the bottoms of
Manager Response: Dear Little RedRosie, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us. The floors for the rooms are being considered about being replaced soon. Please feel free to call us the next time you are planning to visit or are in thee area so that we may attend to your reservation personally. We’re looking forward to being able to accommodate you on your next stay here. Thanks again for taking the time to review us.  Sincerely,  Alpine Staff

Summary: Great location. Parking is tight, but staff and accommodations are excellent. Totally enjoyed our stay. Will definately remember for next trip. Wonderful experience. Walked to Disney with no problems.
Manager Response: Dear thedisneychix, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us. Please feel free to call us the next time you are planning to visit or are in the area so that we may attend to your reservation personally. We’re looking forward to being able to accommodate you on your next stay here. Thanks again for taking the time to review us.  Sincerely,  Alpine Staff

Summary: Loved our stay. Will stay again. Clean updated rooms. Will recommend to our family and friends. Only about a 10 minute walk to Disneylamd. Enjoyed the good options nearby. Office staff very helpful and kind. Coffee Bean and Tea is right across the street.
Manager Response: Dear P8158HXbethw, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us. Please feel free to call us the next time you are planning to visit or are in the area so that we may attend to your reservation personally. We’re looking forward to being able to accommodate you on your next stay here. Thanks again for taking the time to review us.  Sincerely,  Alpine Staff

Summary: I would say the carpets downstairs should be replaced with tile or laminate wood. The upstairs should have carpet to keep the sound down. The place was clean inside and outside. The desk clerk was very friendly and helpful. The walk to Disney was not far for an Adult but would be a test at the end of the day for children. Plenty of places to eat close by.
Manager Response: Dear Ruth Stewart J, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us. Please feel free to call us the next time you are planning to visit or are in the area so that we may attend to your reservation personally. We’re looking forward to being able to accommodate you on your next stay here. Thanks again for taking the time to review us.  Sincerely,  Alpine Staff

Summary: I have stayed at Alpine Inn several times and I am never disappointed, the cleanliness of the room is always my biggest concern. These rooms are always clean, the beds are comfortable, and the sheets always look clean and crisp. I also like the price it is affordable and you can't compare with other hotels who's rates are similar, so I highly recommend this place, it's my go to hotel whenever I'm in the area. it's literally right behind Cars land!
Manager Response: Dear Adriana P, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us. Please feel free to call us the next time you are planning to visit or are in the area so that we may attend to your reservation personally. We’re looking forward to being able to accommodate you on your next stay here. Thanks again for taking the time to review us.  Sincerely,  Alpine Staff

Summary: Our room was clean, quiet and comfortable. Parking is free during your stay and is located within easy walking distance of the Convention Center and about a 15 minute walk to and from California Adventure. Our room was literally on the backside of California Adventure and yet we never heard noise from the park. They have a free shuttle that runs all day. The breakfast located in the small hotel lobby was adequate and items can be taken to your room or to go. There was oatmeal, cold cereal, yogurt, bananas, juice, milk and coffee and hot chocolate. The staff was very nice and helpful to patrons asking for directions and advice about local restaurants and attractions.
Manager Response: Dear L L, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us. Please feel free to call us the next time you are planning to visit or are in the area so that we may attend to your reservation personally. We’re looking forward to being able to accommodate you on your next stay here. Thanks again for taking the time to review us.  Sincerely,  Alpine Staff

Summary Heading: Clean,  comfortable, within walking distance to Disneyland.
Summary: Great value for the price. Attractive exterior. Well maintained. Multiple USB ports in the room. Breakfast was cereal, muffins, fruit, yogurt.  We stayed two nights. Staff was nice. Lots of restaurants within walking distance, as well as drug stores and shops. And Disneyland was a 15-minute walk away. We highly recommend this hotel.

We had plenty of room to put it between the beds. Older motel great price comfortable beds. Walking distance to Disneyland. Continental breakfast was very small but doable. Only con was the parking because we had a large truck. We will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Dee900, 	Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us. We’re glad that you chose to stay here with us among the many other locations in thee area. We’re also glad that you found our room to have an adequate amount of space and near Disneyland. We’re about a 10-15 minute walk to the main gate depending on how fast one walks. Please feel free to call us the next time you are planning to visit or are in thee area so that we may attend to your reservation personally. Thanks again for taking the time to review us. Sincerely, Alpine Staff

Summary: The only suggestion I have is to clean the carpets.  The carpet is not old, just needs to be kept cleaner.  The rest of the room was clean: fairly fresh paint, nice white linens and towels.  Service in the office was outstanding.  They always wanted to know how our stay was going and if they could do anything for us.  Free Parking in a fairly protected area so we felt comfortable leaving our car was a nice perk.
Manager Response: Dear tami3539, 	 Thank you for taking the time to review us. We’re sorry you found our carpet to be dirty. We do have them shampooed regularly and are truly sorry yours turned out to be dirty and that we hadn’t gotten to it sooner. We are glad that you did find the rest of the room to be clean and our service to be outstanding. The parking area we have is monitored under video surveillance and an individual 24 hours a day. Please feel free to call us the next time you are planning to visit or are in thee area so that we may attend to your reservation personally. Thanks again for taking the time to review us. Sincerely, Alpine Staff

Summary: This is an older motel, but it is clean and the rates are right.  It is located, literally, behind the Disneyland California Adventure Park, but was still a quiet place to stay.  Would stay again.  No elevator.

Please feel free to call us the next time you are planning to visit or are in thee area so that we may attend to your reservation personally. Thanks again. Sincerely, Alpine Staff

Summary: It was a really nice stay. My wife is a "clean freak" so cleanliness is always a concern of mine when trying new hotels. I never heard a peep from her about any issues. The staff were all very courteous, friendly and helpful. I would definitely stay there again
Manager Response: Dear kurt 375, 	Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us. We’re glad that we met your and your wife’s standards of cleanliness. We’re also glad you found our staff to be courteous, friendly and helpful. Please feel free to call us the next time you are planning to visit or are in thee area so that we may attend to your reservation personally. Thanks again. Sincerely, Alpine Staff

Summary: Found this darling hotel by chance 3 Disneyland trips ago (last Oct 2016) have been coming back ever since then.  Met all our personal requirements:  clean room, comfortable beds, and close to Disneyland.  It takes us no longer than 15 minutes to walk to Disneyland.  Honestly the main reason we continue to come back to this gem is because of the price.  We bought  Dis  After the Lake County Valley Fire, we bought Disney season passes to remind us to smile and have fun.  One concern about continuing to come down to Anaheim is the hotel prices and we appreciate the fact that Alpine offers affordable prices with clean rooms and comfortable beds.  On top of all that, the hotel offers a mini breakfast.  Thank you!!!!
Manager Response: Dear juliathayer, 	Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us. We appreciate that you have chosen to continue to return and stay here with us.  We’re glad that you found our accommodations to be clean, comfortable and close to Disney. We do try to be as competitive as we can as far as the price is concerned. Please feel free to call us the next time you’re planning on visiting or are in thee area so that we may attend you personally. Thanks again. Sincerely, Alpine Staff

Summary: This cute place is easy to find, walking distance to Disney, surrounded by great restaurants, and so clean! We loved our stay. I'm very picky about hotels, but this stay turned out great. The place is older, but most things have been updated. They take very good care of the rooms, someone was at the front desk 24 hours a day, and it was a very comfortable stay.
Manager Response: Dear ElizzieBelle, 	Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us, we appreciate it. We are definitely not difficult to find. We’re right in front of thee Anaheim Convention Center which is located on the south side of the Disney area. We are a bit older being built around 1958. Whereas, Disney was built in 1956. We’re glad that you noticed that we take care of our rooms. There is always someone on duty 24 hours a day to assist our guests with early/late arrivals and early/late departures. Also, if there are any issues whilst staying here. We’re glad that you had a comfortable stay and that we could accommodate you. Please feel free to call us the next time you are planning to visit or are in thee area so that we may attend to your reservation personally. Thanks again. Sincerely, Alpine Staff

Summary: Thank you again Alpine Inn! We once again enjoyed our stay with you. It was so nice to see you all again and thank you Derek for letting us check in a little early, we really appreciate all your help! Everyone is always so happy and welcoming and we can't wait to come back. Please don't forget about housekeeping those girls are outstanding and make every effort to accommodate you, everyone at the Alpine in does. Thank you again sincerely the Enriquez family
Manager Response: none

Manager Response: Dear Thomas E, 	Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us. We’re glad and appreciate being your chosen destination to stay amongst the many other hotels in thee area. Please feel free to call us the next time you’re planning on visiting or are in the area to set up your reservation so that we may handle it personally. Thanks again and we hope to see you again in the near future. Sincerely, Alpine Staff

Summary: I'm so freaking tired right now so I won't type out a huge review but the guys who were running the place were like, the nicest people I've ever met, helping me out with everything and working with my specific needs, it was so great, never once did I worry about anything wrong happening
