Sincerely, Alpine Staff

Summary Heading: Great family value within walking distance to Disney
Summary: For the price we paid, this was great value!  We travelled with our 4 children and stayed for 2 nights.  We had a room with 3 queen beds and it provided us with all the room we needed.  The room was clean, the beds were comfortable.  Lots of pillows.  It was warm when we visited and the air conditioning worked perfectly.  Breakfast was totally adequate: yogurt, cold and hot cereal, muffins, juice, coffee.  We literally walked to the main gates of Disney in under 10 minutes.  It was a perfect location.  We were down the street (2 min walk) from a 7-Eleven, CVS, Subway, coffee shop and other restaurants.  The best part of this place is the friendly staff!  They will go above and beyond to make sure your stay is the best possible!  Thank you to the staff at Alpine Inn for a great
Manager Response: Dear Amanda M, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us. We are glad that amongst the many other hotels, you decided to stay here with us. We’re also not far from thee Anaheim Garden Walk and Downtown Disney. Please feel free to give us a call the next time you’re planning on visiting thee area so that we may attend to your reservation personally. Thanks again Sincerely, Alpine Staff

Summary Heading: Nice place within walking distance to Disney
Summary: Drove down from San Diego with a cousin visiting from the Philippines to see Disney (she'd never been!) She was bummed she hadn't seen snow during her trip, so I thought booking the Alpine Inn would be a bit of a consolation (very cute on the outside!). We arrived in the morning around 9:30am and were allowed to park at the hotel even though we weren't staying until that night. The park was super close and it was nice to be able to just walk back to the room after a long day.  The staff was super-friendly (thanks Derek!) and the room met my expectations. Only slight annoyance was that we were on the second floor and there were some very squeaky floorboards, which is to be expected with this age of hotel (I just felt bad for anyone beneath us!) Overall a great experience though
Manager Response: Dear rgeneral, 	Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us. We are glad that amongst the many other hotels, you decided to stay here with us. We try to be as competitive as we can with our rates. There is always talk about what to update and I believe the floors are on that list. Please feel free to give us a call the next time you’re planning on visiting thee area so that we may attend to your reservation personally.Thanks again. Sincerely, The Alpine Staff

Summary: A very nice place. Friendly and professional staff. Clean rooms. It was a short walking distance to the park. So much easier then parking at the park. Also a nearby cvs and a coffe bean across the street.

Summary Heading: Great little place next to Disneyland
Summary: Have stayed here a number of times, and always had a good experience. Truly friendly and responsive staff, the rooms are clean and comfortable, no extra charge for parking like the larger chain hotels are doing, and it's a five minute walk from the Disneyland gate. Just don't tell your friends, because I want a room available next time I go.

Summary: Everything was wonderful.  Staff is amazing.  Room was clean and in great condition.  Free parking. Walk to disneyland. Anything you need within walking distance. Park your car free and leave it til you go home.

We can allow our guests to leave their vehicles here, so long as there is ample space. During our peak times, it does make it difficult to allow our guests to leave their vehicles to be able to accommodate our incoming guests. Thanks again. Sincerely, Rudolph R. La Roche

Summary Heading: clean, no frills, very accommodating and friendly staff, great for a trip to disneyland.
Summary: we really appreciated how helpful the staff was at this little joint. they had enough room at the hotel that day and were kind enough to let us leave our car there they day we were checking out while we were at disneyland. as mentioned, very clean, reasonable, and ten minutes walk from the magic kingdom. the rooms aren't much, but they're clean and they have exactly what you need. a great, honest business. thank you alpine inn.

Thanks again and you’re welcome. :) Sincerely, Rudolph R. La Roche

Our room was clean and everything was in good condition. The blinds were much better than the curtains most motels have.  The only complaint we had was the limited number of items included in the breakfast. Overall, we had a great stay and would definitely stay here again.

Please feel free to call us the next time you’re planning your visit or are in thee area so that we may attend to your reservation personally. Thanks again. Sincerely, Rudolph R. La Roche

Summary: This hotel is in a great location if you are visiting Disneyland, the staff is very friendly and always willing to help you out with whatever you might need.  The rooms are nice and clean and the beds are very comfortable.

Summary Heading: Great location, very clean, perfect for Disney trip!
Summary: We stayed at the Alpine Inn for 3 nights and it was perfect! Very clean and super comfortable rooms with lovely amenities like a large flat screen tv, free internet, and a fridge and microwave. The beds were clean and comfortable and the pillows were lovely. There was also free parking, which was a huge bonus. We stayed on the ground floor and never heard any noises from outside or other rooms in the building.  Would highly recommend for anyone planning on visiting Disneyland. The walk to the park entrance was 10-15 minutes from the hotel, super convenient!
Manager Response: Dear kas7685, 	Thank you for choosing to stay here and taking the time to write a review about us. We also have the premium digital cable package for our guests to enjoy. Some other amenities that we have are the heated pool and the guest laundry. We can also arrange an upper level room should you ever want to. We’re glad that you enjoyed your stay here. Thanks again. Sincerely, Rudolph R. La Roche

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay at the Alpine Inn. The staff are very kind and friendly. I requested a bottom floor and I was so impressed they fulfilled my request. The rooms are spacious and the bathrooms are very clean. I traveled alone with my three sons and I felt safe at this hotel. The walk is short to Disneyland and there is a 7-11 right on the corner if you need last minute items.  You get a great deal online when booking this hotel. I will definitely stay here next time I come to Disneyland.

We are also pleased that you felt safe here with your three sons. Also, we can always match or beat rates found online, as long as they are from a credible source. Thanks again. Sincerely, Rudolph R. La Roche

Summary: Wow is this place great.  A typical motel right out of the 1960s on the outside but updated within.  Rooms have little fridges and microwaves.  It is easily walkable to Disneyland.  You do not need a car but if want one, Alamo is right next door.  The CVS and Walgreens are nearby along with a 7-11. Restaurants are also within walking distance.  Price for the hotel was much better than its neighbors.  Even though it backs to California Adventure, noise was negligible.  I picked it out due to price and consistency of reviews related to staff and cleanliness. But they were so much better than I expected.  Rooms are reasonable in size.  Beds were comfortable. The bedding was worn but very clean.  Towels were fluffy.    Breakfast is predictable to boring but enough to get you going.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Awesome location, excellent customer service, easy check out
Summary: Great location - walking distance to Disneyland front gate.  Less than a minute walk to catch disneyland shuttle.  Free parking.  Continental breakfast served if you don't have time to eat at a restaurant.  Our room was on the 1st floor.  Very quiet place.  Rooms were neat and cleaned each day.  Staff was excellent with great customer service.  I bought 2 tickets, 2-day hopper passes from the front desk which made it convenient, however I received 4-day hopper pass tickets.  Staff met me at the front of Disneyland gate and exchanged the tickets for 2-day pass.  It took less than a minute to check out.  I have recommended this place to other family members back in 2013.  They were very satisfied with their stay as well.  I decided to come back in 2017 and I received the same

Sincerely, Rudolph R. La Roche

Summary Heading: Excellent choice that doesnt break the bank

The walk to Disney is about 10 minutes or less, they have a spotless pool, and parking is FREE. Not much of that in the Disney area. No complaints, will return once again to the Alpine Inn when visiting Disney.

Manager Response: Dear Travelin Twosome, 	Thank you for taking the time to review us. We’re glad that you enjoyed your stay here. There are plenty of shops to pick up trinkets and mementos for family and friends in the area. Thanks again for choosing to stay with us and we would also love to welcome you back here again! We would also appreciate it that when you do decide to visit again that if you would please call us so that we may handle your reservation personally. Sincerely,  Rudolph R. La Roche

Summary: The Alpine Inn is a fantastic low budget hotel that is in a fantastic location only ten minutes walk to Disney.. Great rates, comfy beds, very clean and great staff.  Would definitely recommend to our fellow Aussies back home. Breakfast is simple help yourself to cereal box, muffins, yogurt, juice... No restaurant but then we didn't need it as stated at both parks all day long.  The only criticism I have would be the pillows as very large & lumpy
Manager Response: Dear Jenny S,  	Thank you for taking the time to review us. We’re excited that you travelled such a great distance and decide to stay here with us. The next time you decide to stay here, please give us a call so that we may handle your reservation personally. We appreciate the recommendation and thank you again. Sincerely, Rudolph R. La Roche

Summary: The Alpine Inn in many ways is a step back in time when the area around Disneyland was surrounded by kitschy, small, themed hotels and motels.  Most of those are long gone now or extensively expanded to meet today's guests and the economics of the current hotel industry or replaced by the big chains.  But, this little jewel remains.  Of course it has been upgraded and modernized but it still retains a bit of that old charm.  It's a small motel with only 2 floors that is literally right behind Disney's California Adventure (you can see the backs of the buildings) and offers FREE parking, something unheard of in other hotels we have stayed in the area.  And, we parked literally right in front of our room which was very handy.  The rooms are super-clean with modern updated

Summary: We were very happy with our stay at Alpine Inn.  Pulled into a parking spot and our room was right there.  It was so convenient to not have to wait for an elevator and to be so close to the office.  The walk to Disneyland/California Adventure is actually a mile, but it goes quickly.  We stopped off at 7-11 and the other convenience store next to it on our way back to Alpine Inn every night to get cold bottled waters and necessary items like inexpensive Disney rain ponchos.

Thee Outlets at Orange can also be found near here as well. Thanks again. Sincerely, Rudolph R. La Roche

Summary Heading: Wicked accommodation - so close to DIsneyland/California Adventure and Downtown Disney
Summary: We travelled, from NZ, to Anaheim to visit all the theme parks LA has to offer. I'm so glad I chose to stay at The Alpine Inn, as it is so close to Disneyland!  The Inn is located right behind California Adventure, so you don't even have to cross a road to get to Disneyland!!  The Alpine Inn provide a really great breakfast, everyday, which saved us heaps of money. The managers were lovely and couldn't do enough for us.  It is also close to some good, reasonably priced family restaurants - which is great for a quick bite to eat, Target, Convention Centre, Downtown Disney, 7-11, Drug stores and more. The Alpine Inn also has a lovely pool too!.  Our room was super-clean, serviced everyday, ample space and had everything we needed.  I would definitely recommend The Alpine Inn, as

La Roche

Summary: Our stay at the Alpine Inn was a wonderful experience.  The Inn was very clean, quiet, in good condition and the management was more than accommodating and very nice.  The Inn's location to Disneyland was a quick easy walk.  We highly recommend this Inn and will stay again.

Feel free to give us a call the next time you’re planning on visiting or are in thee area so that we may handle your reservation personally. Thanks again. Sincerely, Rudolph R. La Roche

Would definitely recommend for families. Very reasonably priced hotel save your money for expenses of Disneyland.  Will definitely stay again.

There are plenty of restaurants shops and things to do close by, we visited Disneyland and we really enjoyed our stay.

We have them shampooed monthly and have been seeking out new alternatives to find the right type of material to best suit our guests. Thanks again and we hope to see you soon! Sincerely, Rudolph R. La Roche

The rates can't be beat, and the free breakfast is simple but all you need to get your day started!

We would love to welcome you back in the future and would appreciate it if you would please give us a call so that we may attend to your reservation personally. Thanks again! Sincerely, Rudolph R. La Roche

Summary Heading: A Great Choice for a Disney Stay
Summary: A friend and I were doing a very casual trip to Disney. As we are both adults with no children we felt it was unnecessary to stay on Disney property and instead picked this hotel. Summary: Had the family room. Best price around for this type of room and so close to Disney. The hot tub and pool were clean. In a nutshell everything exceeded my expectations for what on the cover seems like a 2 star hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Joni L,  We appreciate you taking the time to leave your comments regarding your stay. We are delighted to hear that your recent stay exceeded your expectations and it was a short and convenient walk to Disney. We are looking forward to your next stay with us!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Super pleased with our stay here, really enjoyed how close it was walking to Disneyland and the quietness.  We didn't use the pool since we were primarily there for the park Halloween party but they do have one.  The staff was absolutely fantastic, quick check in and check out, ice machine very handy and breakfast items were as others have mentioned- perfect for a quick start in the morning.  We were not quite sure where on Katella they were, they do back up right into the rear of California Adventure but we never heard any noise from the park. The two queen beds and mini frig, microwave and space in the room were perfect.  Would definitely stay here again.  Easy to access from the I-5.
Manager Response: Dear T-2SanDiego,  We appreciate your wonderful review about our property! We are so delighted to hear about your great experience with our staff. We take pride in the great service that our staff provides and they will be thrilled to get such a positive feedback. Thank you so much and we hope to see you soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Perfect location to walk to Disneyland. Clean rooms and friendly staff. We stayed for 5 nights in August in one of their triple queen rooms. It was a nice size for our family of 6. Mom and Dad got there own separate space away from the kiddos. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Jasenem,  What a wonderful feedback! We are happy that you enjoyed the family suite and it was enough space for you and your family. Thank you so much and we are glad that you had a lovely stay at the Alpine Inn. We are looking forward to welcoming you back very soon!  Best, Derrick L Alpine Inn

Summary: Our home away from home!  We've been staying @The Alpine Inn for at least 12 years now & have always enjoyed our stay.  Everyone that works there & the owners are always very friendly & hospitable.  They make our stay very comfortable!
Manager Response: Dear Debbie,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review. It is always a pleasure and we always look forward to yourself and Craig, coming back for over 12 years!  We are always happy to see return guests and we appreciate the confidence and loyalty you have given us. See you soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: I will add this to our list of hotels we stay at when we go to Disneyland. The hotel is clean and an easy walk to the park. The breakfast is light, but it is something to get you started. The only thing I would like to see is blackout blinds or curtains. We stay late and sleep in and the room can get very bright.
Manager Response: Dear 4krums,  Thank you very much for taking the time a write a great review! Your comments are greatly appreciated.We are glad that our property has provided you great comfort and convenience for your visit in Anaheim. We love these kind of review because it helps us pay attention to things that we need to improve.  We hope to see you back very very soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: I researched multiple properties for a somewhat impromptu weekend visit to Downtown Disney, Disneyland, and California Adventure.  After cringing over confusing and unhelpful reviews, I chose Alpine Inn.  I am so glad I did.    First of all, I am a big kid at heart when it comes to Disney so the proximity to Cars Land thrilled me to no end when I looked out the back window of our room and saw the backside of the Cars Land attraction and the Hollywood Tower of Terror in the distance.  As we left our room to walk to Downtown Disney and Disneyland Resort,  we could see the glow from World of Color and the flashes from the fireworks over the castle. Neither the shows nor the noise from the rides would have been problematic if we had been sleeping because the rooms are very quiet.
Manager Response: Dear Joe_Cool68510,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave such a detailed review! Your comments are greatly appreciated.  We are glad that our property has provided you great comfort and convenience for your visit to Disney. We are ecstatic to know that our staff has provided you with superb service. We take pride in all our staff members. We hope to see you back very very soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Quaint, quiet, no hustle, no bustle. Great customer service & Easy walk to Disneyland 1 mile or less. no crosswalks or lights to wait at, Disneyland parks entrance right around the block. The Inn is right in back of Cars ride at California Adventure. I did not hear any noise, excellent bed. For my needs as a SoCal resident, this was a perfect choice being as I live 2 hours away. I would definitely come back to The Alpine Inn.
Manager Response: Dear Cheryl R,  Thank you so much for your exceptional review! We are happy to know that you find us a "Hidden Gem", this most certainly motivates us more to deliver the best service around and that the Alpine Inn meet your needs.  We are looking forward to having you at our property soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Small hotel but easy access and was quiet and clean.  The staff was friendly and polite.  The breakfast was simple but better than a few of the other hotels we have stayed at in the area. We were happy with our choice.
Manager Response: Dear ynddiaz,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for such a nice review. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with the room, breakfast and our staff. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: What a great little place to stay
Summary: great place, clean rooms. clean bathroom, nice breakfast. pool looked nice. bathrooms were clean. Its right behind disneyland so close that we could hear the screams from the Cars ride. right across the street from the Anehiem convention center.    the only downside is the parking.  38 parking spaces and 42 rooms means if you want to get to park at the hotel then you need to get there early.
Manager Response: Dear Matt F,  We appreciate the kind words you have for the Alpine Inn! We are glad that our property suited your needs and you enjoyed our clean rooms. We look forward to many more opportunities of delivering phenomenal and amazing experiences at the Alpine Inn Anaheim. We hope to see you soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: It's not a luxury hotel of course, but it was clean, everything worked, super convenient to the Convention center... and the best thing was the Staff! They were all very accommodating, from check-in to even after check-out when my little girl had a restroom emergency. They were very gracious! Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear 789inc,  We would like to take this opportunity to thank you choosing the Alpine Inn and taking time to share your nice feedback. We are ecstatic to know that our staff has provided you with superb service.  Your comments definitely provide encouragement to our team. We are looking forward to having you at our property soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Good value for money, the rooms are big enough and very clean. Exccelent staff, very helpfull and nice. We stayed for 3 nights, close to the Anaheim garden walk. Would definitly stay here again. The pool could do with a little less chlorine though, but all in all, very good.
Manager Response: Dear BerryvdM,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a feedback about your recent stay! We value your feedback greatly! We are thrilled to know that you found the room clean and convenient for your needs. Thank for you the feedback on the pool and the information will be passed to the right person. We hope to see you soon and welcome you back in the future!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: This hotel is a close walk to Disney, has free parking, and could comfortably fit our (adult) family of five - there was a private bedroom attached to a room with two other beds, a decent sized bathroom, and a small place for a fridge. Staff was very friendly! Although we didn't get much of a chance to use the pool, it was nice as well.
Manager Response: Dear SnappleSpice,  Thank you for writing such a positive review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay in the family suite and found our staff to be very friendly! We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn in the future.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Wonderful time love it this place I will came back again next time!!!!super comfortable and very clean, very nice people , very convenient for walk To Disney, store around to buy water, milk , anything you need  we be there next year!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Gabriela M.  Thank you very much for your great feedback regarding your recent stay at the Alpine Inn. We are very delighted that you had a wonderful stay and that you found it convenient to get to Disney and the stores around us. Thank you for your compliments for our clean rooms. Our housekeeping is the best around and they make us very proud. We can't wait to welcome you again soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: I come to Disneyland at least once a year (this year was a whopping 4 times)--and I prefer to stay as close to the park entrance as I can for the best price possible. This is a standard motel that is perfectly fine.  The interior has been updated, the beds were fine, there was plenty of space, it had a fridge and microwave.  The front desk was friendly and accepted my baggage at 10am when I got there and held it for me until I came back from playing in the park at 10:30pm.  There is cold cereal/apples/coffee in the morning, so not a big value add, but convenient.  There is a nice CVS and Walgreens across the street, so that was good.  Its close to the convention center, so if you were doing events there, this would be a good choice.  It took me 11 minutes to walk from the motel
Manager Response: Dear Slc_singer,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review regarding your recent stay with us! We would also like to thank you for giving us the opportunity to give you a great experience at our property. Your review will absolutely help a lot of travelers who plan to stay with us. We are looking forward to seeing you on your next visit in Anaheim!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Enjoyed our family vacation! The staff is very helpful and friendly!  The rooms are clean and the bed is clean. I come every year to the Alpine Inn to stay here. Close to all nearby attractions! Great place to stay!
Manager Response: Dear Bestsy829,  Thank you for your great feedback about the Alpine Inn! We are glad that you had a great experience with us. We will definitely pass your review on to our staff in order to motivate them even more in delivering inspired service. See you soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Love the hotel look, rooms clean, good TV & cable. Parking lot small with not enough stalls. Only Negative is the Parking issue. Would stay there again, front desk great with Fast service. I would refer this hotel to friends & family for future vacations.
Manager Response: Dear GrizzleBear1980,  Thank you for taking the time to leave great comments about your stay. We are glad you liked the room accommodating. Sorry you had trouble with parking, as we understand that parking at times may be a little tight. We are hoping that next time you visit, we could give you an even better experience. See you soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: It was a bit of an older establishment but it was clean, and appeared to be well taken care of. There were a few minor gripes like the faucet in the bathroom sprayed water everywhere but for the price we paid and how close we were to everything, it was well worth the money.
Manager Response: Dear Alexander T,  We appreciate your review of your recent stay with us! We are very delighted that you are satisfied with our rooms. We would like to apologize for the faucet in the room but we have brought the issue to the Maintenance supervisor's attention.  We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Staff was super nice. Always greeted me and asked if I needed anything. I would definitely stay again. Good deal, nice and clean room, pool, breakfast and great channel selection on top of that! Disneyland was a 5 min drive aways and tons of restaurants within 3-5 mins as well!
Manager Response: Dear Cherylnqr,  Thank you for leaving us a great feedback! This really means a lot to us and we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Alpine Inn. We take pride in all our staff members, they make our guests feel at home and welcome. We are also happy, that you found us conveniently located near Disneyland and many restaurants.We can't wait to see you back on your next visit!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Room very dated but clean and comfortable. Air conditioning really noisy. Lorries reversing all night in California Adventure Land with reverse warning sounds directly behind hotel. Pool in car park with a lot of traffic noise. Breakfast collected from reception, not that great. The location is fantastic for Disney with restaurants in walking distance. A lot of homeless on the way to Disney. If you can sleep through noise it is good value. Free wifi and free parking.
Manager Response: Dear Visi2rs,  We are very delighted to hear from you! We apologize for any trouble you had with the noise issue you encountered. Rest assured that these issues will be brought to our head's attention and will be taken with utmost importance. We hope that you could still give us the opportunity to restore your faith in us. If you would like to discuss further, please don't hesitate to reach out to us directly. Hope to see you soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Great hotel for the price. They honored my request of a quiet room but giving us the room in the corner farthest from the front desk and street, and it was excellent. We had a couple of issues, and upon talking to the front desk they fixed them immediately.   Walking at a fast pace it is about a 15 minute walk to the park entrance.  Free breakfast was just pre-packaged muffins and cereal. My husband loved the muffins.
Manager Response: Dear Michelle F,  We appreciate you taking the time to leave a very positive feedback regarding your stay at the Alpine Inn! We are happy to hear that we accommodated your request and were stratified with the room! We do apologize for the issues, but delighted to hear our front desk staff did resolve everything for you, upon check. We hope we will see you on your next visit in Anaheim!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Comfortable, clean and the pool was nice on a hot day. Situated nearby to restaurants and overall good value. They prepare a reasonable continental breakfast in the morning and the hotel staff were extremely helpful in answering any queries we had.
Manager Response: Dear Blakey9804,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for such a nice review. We are delighted to hear that you are satisfied with the room, pool and our staff. We truly hope that you will come visit us again in the near future and give us an opportunity to take care of you again.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We booked a Family Suite for our Disneyland visit, which meant each of our two children got their own queen bed, and my wife and I got our own separate bedroom separated by a door. For the price we paid, this was a great value, far lower than other standard rooms in the area, much less suites. We parked our car outside our room and walked the 15-20 mins back and forth to the parks, saving time and money on parking. Breakfast was limited, but again a plus for what you are paying. Nice to have a microwave and fridge as well. Everything seemed clean and in working order. Staff was friendly. Would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Jeremiah M,  Thank you for taking the time to write a great view. We are happy you enjoyed your stay in our Family Suite, found it to be a great value, and were able to use our amenities. We would love for your stay with us again!  Best, Derrick L. ALpine Inn

Summary Heading: Clean and Friendly (to pocketbook and people)
Summary: Right next to Disneyland, CVS/Walgreen's and many restaurants. The rooms were very clean, the staff very friendly and helpful. They even accommodated a request to store my daughter's insulin in their office fridge after checkout. The daily rate is very reasonable for the area. I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Allen S,  Thank you so much for taking your time to write a write a positive review for the Alpine Inn. We are always happy to accommodate your requests and make your stay with us the best experience. We would love to welcome you back the Alpine Inn soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: This property is a real gem.  It is an easy walk to the Disneyland parks and Anaheim Convention Center.  The rooms are comfortable, clean, quiet, and up to date.  Staff is friendly and accommodating.  This is my second stay here, and I will return.
Manager Response: Dear Laurie C.,  Thanks for the great review! We are happy you enjoyed your stay with us and you found it a short distance to the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland Parks! We would to see you again in the near future!   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Alpine Inn is very well situated right behind the Park. If you are visting Disneyland its perfectly situated. Its quite inexpensive and close to everything possible. Literally steps away from Pharmacies, convenience stores restaurants and the Park entrance. Room is decent too. I got the twin queen bed room. Its very clean and service is quick. Staff memebers are very helpfull too. There are plently of Car rental places as well as one right next to it. I booked for 2 days but ended up upgrading to 2 more days as its convniently situated if yu plan to visit Sandiego zoo or lego land. All the Best All the best
Manager Response: Dear Vishal O,  Thanks for taking the time to write an excellent review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy that it was convenient for you to get to anywhere you wanted, all within walking distance. Also that you found our rooms clean and our front desk staff  helpful! Thank you again and we would love to welcome you back anytime!   Best, Derrick L. Alpine inn

Summary: I've stayed at the Alpine Inn multiple times.  The hotel features clean rooms, friendly, helpful staff, and a solid continental breakfast.  Most importantly, it's walking distance to the Disneyland parks.
Manager Response: Dear Sandycarp2016,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a great review for us. We enjoy seeing you come back and always appreciate repeat guests! Also, we are glad that you find it just a short walk to get to the Disneyland Parks. We look forward to your next stay us!   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We found the Alpine Inn to be reasonably priced given its location...about a 15 minute walk to the main entrance of Disneyland. Other similarly located properties were significantly more expensive. We stayed for three nights, and the proximity was great, particularly on the one day we decided we needed to come back to the hotel for a little rest midday.  This is an older property and there aren't a lot of frills. That said, it had what we needed...clean rooms, reasonably comfortable beds, hot water, and working A/C. There was a also a pool. We didn't end up using it, but while it appeared a bit small, it looked clean.  I should also note that the couple of staff we interacted with at the front desk were all very nice and helpful. Much appreciated!
Manager Response: Dear Brian B,  Thanks for taking your time to write a great review. We are glad you found us to be affordable and convenient to the main entrance of Disneyland. We would love to welcome you back on your next visit to Disney!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Close to all sorts of entertainment, great staff
Summary: Alpine Inn was nice and clean and a great place to come back to after busy days at the park, beach, and islands.  The rooms are spacious and the beds are comfortable.  The staff is very friendly and helpful.  A couple tips: parking is scarce so if you can, park your car for the duration of your visit and then walk wherever you are going.  *We had one parking conflict where another guest was very angry that we had parked in a spot they wanted. I'm not sure why they felt entitled to that space.  The front desk clerk, Oscar, was able to resolve the issue without a problem and I hope that lady had a good rest of her vacation.   Breakfast is just so, so with packaged muffins, yogurt, and fruit.  We appreciated the hot chocolate option as we are not coffee drinkers.  Don't expect to
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to write a detailed review for us. We are definitely glad about your experience with us. I am glad that Oscar took care of the parking situation, as our parking lot can get full at times, but ensure every guest one free parking spot. We hope you see you again and would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: An Affordable Place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: A one night stay We arrived early and were allowed to pre registered so we could parked our packed vehicle, on the property, and walked to Disneyland.  After our time at the Resort we returned to the Alpine Inn late in the evening and went in to the office.  We were greeted by a very friendly and helpful night clerk who gave us our room keys.  The room was clean and welcoming the beds were comfortable.  We slept well, fresh coffee and Danish and we drove home made for a very nice visit to the Disneyland Resort.
Manager Response: Dear campingtom,  Thanks for the  great review! We are happy you were able to park your vehicle here before you went to Disney, a convenient check in process, and most importantly you got a good nights rest. We would love to welcome you back the next time you visit Disney!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We were looking for an inexpensive hotel close enough to Disneyland to walk.  The Alpine Inn was it.  It's a motel, but although you enter the room from the parking lot, it was very quiet.  What set this place apart was the staff.  Everyone was very friendly and helpful.  We were there from August 1-4, and we mostly interacted with the daytime front desk person, who was excellent.  I wish I had gotten his name.  We arrived a few hours early but he held out luggage and called us a half hour later with a room.  We walked to Disneyland each morning and walked back mid-afternoon each day to take a break.  Clean room, comfortable.  Coffee and cereal in the lobby were a nice touch.  Very happy with our stay and would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear 19952015,  Thanks for taking the time to write us a review. First of all, we are happy you had a great vacation, you found us to be a short walk to Disney, and had a great experience with the front desk staff. We would love to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn!   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: When Disney calls, Alpine Inn is home
Summary: My husband and I go to Disneyland at least once a year and we always stay here. No frills but it's clean, comfortable and an easy walk to the parks.  This time around we went with friends. When I was going to book I noticed a suite option. What a money saver! It was basically the regular two doubles room but with a small room attached with a queen bed and a tv. For 5 adults spending every waking hour at the park it was perfect. Alpine Inn is still as good as it was when I visited 7 years ago.
Manager Response: Dear Honey2theBee,  Thank you so much for the review. We always enjoy when you stay here! It is amazing that you having been stay here for over 7 years and appreciate your loyalty. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: The hotel is super close to Disney land which is awesome. It's quite there too, you would expect to hear screaming and rides but you don't. Friendly staff! Very helpful and are there to make your trip enjoyable! I would definitely go back if I go back to Disney land!!
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a positive review. We are happy you found our staff friendly and helpful during your stay. We try our best to create a warm atmosphere, so thank you again! We would love to welcome you back for your next visit to Disneyland.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great location and great customer service.
Summary: We've been staying here for years for our annual Disneyland trips. The location is great, very reasonable prices and customer service is always excellent. Special thanks to Kevin for offering to let us stay in the hotel parking lot and not have to pay for resort parking on our last day.
Manager Response: Dear Hurdb,  Thank for you your great review. We are happy that you enjoyed your Disney Trip and your experience at the Alpine Inn. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Great location, friendly staff, comfortable rooms
Summary: We enjoyed our four night stay here while visiting Disneyland. The inn is just a quick and easy 10 minute walk to the parks. The staff were so friendly and we enjoyed our morning chats while grabbing a cup of complimentary coffee. The rooms are updated and clean. Can't ask for more and we would definitely visit again.
Manager Response: Dear Tconverse  Thanks for taking the time to write us a great review. We are glad our front desk staff were always friendly and enjoyed chatting with you as well. We would love to welcome you back on your next visit to Anaheim.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: The Alpine Inn is a nice place to stay. I've stayed here many times. The rooms are clean and have been updated since the first time we started here. I would give 4 1/2 if I could. My only wish is that the continental breakfast was a little more fresh pastry and less prepackaged muffins.
Manager Response: Dear Aztrooper4698,  Thanks for the great review of the Alpine Inn. We do appreciate you coming back,  and also for the feedback of our continental breakfast. We are happy you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to see you again in the near future!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We love the Alpine Inn! They take such good care of us at the Apline Inn and everyone at the front desk is  great! Housekeeping is amazing and they work very so don't forget them when you leave every morning. We have been staying at the Alpine Inn for many years now and would never stay anywhere else it is the best place to stay! Thank you once again everyone at the Alpine Inn for making us feel at home. Sincerely the Enriquez family!
Manager Response: Dear Rosettapixiefan,  Thank you Enriquez family for writing such a positive review for us. For many years we always look forward to your family staying with us. We just wanted to say thank for your loyalty and the kind words for our front desk and housekeeping team. See you again soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: On a previous stay to Anaheim we stayed at Doubletree Hilton but Alpine Inn was 100% better ! From our arrival we were made to feel so welcome. The room we had had two bedrooms which was great with for the 4 of us - teenagers don't share beds. The room was very clean and had a fridge, microwave, TVs in both rooms and wifi.  Breakfast was more than adequate to get you going for a busy day. Hotel is an easy 15min walk to Disney. Wouldn't hesitate to stay again or recommend to others.
Manager Response: Dear WheretonextBucks,  Thank you for taking the time to write us a great review. We are happy that the family suite was accommodating with our amenities and comfortable for your family. Also an easy walk to the Disney Parks. We would love to welcome you back for your next visit in Anaheim.   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Alpine Inn fulfill all the basics needed for a trip to Disney, especially when you're trying to save money here and there! It was worth it to sacrifice a nice hotel/resort for this great location and price. It was barely a 15 minute walk to Disney and California Adventures which saved us parking money. We did their continental breakfast as well before walking to the park. The room was nice with everything you need, but maybe request the second floor; the walls were very thin and we could hear neighbors all around! The pool is clean, and the ice machine is free. Overall, I definitely recommend this place!
Manager Response: Dear Brooke A,  Thank you for writing such a wonderful review. We are happy you enjoyed your stay with us and found the location just a short walk to Disney. We would love to welcome you back in the near future.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We stayed here for our most recent Disneyland trip because it was cheaper than most for the Summer season, and it had free wi fi and parking. While the staff was nice enough, and the free parking a major perk, the wi fi didn't really connect, and the bedding had strange stains all over it. There was also a big spot on the carpet by the bathroom that looked like it could've been blood. Now, the beds WERE comfortable, and it would've been a decent hotel if it wasn't for all the mysterious spots. I couldn't help wondering if it meant my bedding wasn't cleaned regularly or bleached... And that is a necessity since we all know anything and everything can happen in a hotel, so I just didn't feel 100% safe with it.
Manager Response: Dear Jessilynn,  Thank you for taking the time to write as a review. We do apologize about the situation with the bedding, as it has already been addressed to our housekeeping supervisor. We hope we regain your trust in the future. Thank you again!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We booked this non-smoking hotel very last minute.  Turns out it was exactly what we were looking for.  It's a 10 minute walk from the entry to the park, parking is free, a small breakfast is included, and very reasonably priced ($134/night for 2 queen beds).   I especially appreciated the staff who were VERY nice and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear MyFamilyOfFour,  Thanks for taking the time to write us a great review. We are happy that you found us to be, affordable and convenient to get to the Disneyland Parks. We do value that you had a great experience and vacation. We hope to see you again and would love to welcome you back!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great place to stay. Short walk to Disney. Staff is really helpful.
Summary: My wife, my daughter and sister stayed 2 days at this hotel and tge front desk attendant was so helpfull. All the rooms are non smoking. The next morning we had breakfast and they always ask if we needed anything else. I will definitely stay at this place againg. Thanks for such a nice experience.
Manager Response: Dear Disney12329,  Thank you for the wonderful review! We are thrilled to hear of your nice experience with us and that thefront desk staff were helpful during your stay. Again, thank your taking the time to write your review of the Alpine Inn and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Basic and clean, close to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here two nights on our recent Disney trip. The location is fantastic. It is a 15 minute walk to Disneyland and there are many shops and restaurants close by. It is literally right behind Disney California Adventure but it is a pretty quiet hotel. The rooms are clean and comfortable, although I found the beds to be a little on the hard side. The water in the shower kept switching temperature, I'm not sure if that was a fluke or not. My only major complaint was the parking situation. The parking lot is pretty small and the first night we were there we had to park in the lobby area because the lot was so full. The spaces are tight and it's hard to park and get out, especially if you don't have a compact car. So that is the only major drawback to this place. The staff was
Manager Response: Dear Shawn H,  We appreciate you taking the time to write a detailed review for the Alpine Inn. We are glad, that you found Disneyland and the shops/restaurants close by. We do apologize for the parking situation, as when were are very busy, parking is a bit tight. It is great pleasure, know that the front desk staff were able to help you and were friendly. We would like to welcome you back to the Alpine Inn in the future.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland, clean and VERY reasonable
Summary: Spent 2 nights at the Alpine Inn this week. We visit Disneyland every year, but this is the first time staying at Alpine Inn...not our last. No reason to spend double at other nearby hotels. This place is clean, close and inexpensive!
Manager Response: Dear Cheryl M,  Thanks for taking your time to write a wonderful review for the Alpine Inn. We are glad, that your enjoyed your stay with us and found it close to Disneyland, clean and affordable. We hope to see you in the near future.   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Stopped here for the night after a long day at Universal and before a long day at Disney. It's very small and first impression of the place is of an old inn or motor lodge. The desk clerk was very nice upon arrival. Rooms are not fancy, but ours was very clean. Because there was a total of six of us we had a room with three queen beds, and this was the best value we found on a room this size around Disney. All of us slept comfortably, and there is a free continental breakfast. Again, nothing fancy but it gets you ready for a busy day at Disney. Parking is very tight (I had to parallel park along the pool) but it's free. My family and I would definitely stay here again the next trip we make to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Shyr94,  Thank you for the kind review. We are happy you enjoyed your stay with us. Also, that you had a comfortable stay, after a long day at Disney, in our Family Suite. We hope to see you and your family again in the future.   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Every night I searched hotels in Orange County looking for a good place to stay for our family vacation. I ended up picking the Alpine Inn, and I've been very happy with my choice.   The positives:  location - It's walking distance to Disneyland and many restaurants. The area in s nice and safe. We felt comfortable walking at night.  Clean rooms - the bathroom and rooms were very well kept and clean. The pool area and grounds were kept up well also.  Staff - Everyone we encountered were friendly  Negatives: A/C - It didn't have a thermostat, so it ran continuously. We were either too hot or too cold at night.  Parking - It was tight and there were not enough spaces when the hotel was full  Overall we really enjoyed our stay and would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Angie G, Thank you for taking your time to write a great review for the Alpine Inn. We are happy you enjoyed your stay, found Disneyland a short and safe walk, and the rooms very well kept. We do apologize for the parking, as we it can be a little tight when we are busy. Thanks again, and we hope to see you in the future.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Value for money and right next to the convention center
Summary: This is a small motel literally opposite the convention center. The rooms are clean, the property was quiet and there were a number of restaurants within easy walking distance.  The Alpine was the same price or cheaper than the hotels recommended by the conference, and it was physically closer than most of them.  This is a motel, so the rooms are relatively basic, but clean and in good repair.   All in all, it was good value for money. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear ProvidenceDad, Thank you for taking your time for reviewing the Alpine Inn. We are happy that you found your stay affordable and convenient to the restaurants in walking distance. We look forward to you staying with us in the future.   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We were only there for one night but they upgraded us for free to a suite. It was awesome! The location is great, really close to the theme parks. Even within walking distance of it hadn't been a zillion degrees out. We didn't get a chance to use the pool but it looked nice and clean. Very friendly staff. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear hmbarker79,  Thank you very much for taking your time to write us a review! We are glad to hear you have found our staff to be friendly during your visit and a close proximity to Disneyland. Thank you again for staying with us at the Alpine Inn and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: Stayed there for 4 nights.  It is in a great location for disneyland and the convention center.  There are several resturants within walking distance...including The Cheesecake Factory,  Bu bball Gumps and Calfornia Pizza.   The staff is awesome and you won't find a better value close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Mike R, Thank you for a wonderful review! We are glad to hear you have had a great experience staying with us at the Alpine inn. It is great knowing the walking distance to Disneyland and the nearby restaurants were easy. We would like to welcome you back soon for you next visit in Anaheim.   Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: We have now stayed at the Alpine Inn twice and will certainly book it again next time we come for a family trip to Disneyland. We were in room 106 (both times) and it was perfect. We were able to back into the parking spot right in front of our room and keep the huge double stroller in the car, giving us more space in the room. The staff was so wonderful! My husband and I commented that every time we interacted with them. The pool was wonderful and refreshing for an afternoon break. Wonderful motel and great time!
Manager Response: Dear PrincessMKS, Thank you for taking your time to write us such a nice review! It is a great pleasure knowing your stay with us at the Alpine Inn was wonderful! It is our pleasure to be as helpful as we can to best accommodate you during your stay. Thank for staying with us and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: A Clean, Affordable Option amongst the Mickey Mania!
Summary: I stayed here at the recommendation of a colleague. I was attending a conference at the Anaheim Convention Center, and this location was perfect! I was close to the convention center, the hotels being used for the conference, and many restaurant choices. This hotel is not fancy, but it is impeccably clean. The beds and pillows are very comfy; the pool is small but very clean. The towels and bathroom supplies are no-frills. The staff is friendly and extremely helpful; they extended my checkout to accommodate my airport shuttle schedule. The continental breakfast is a "grab and go" with boxed cereal, pre-packaged pastries, milk, and fruit. I enjoyed the 24/7 coffee/tea/water service available at the front desk. I also liked the fact that I could get away from the convention
Manager Response: Dear Denise S, Thank you for taking your time to write us such a detailed, nice review. We are glad to hear you have had a great time staying with us at the Alpine Inn. It is great knowing you have found our room and pool clean, beds and pillows comfortable, and the proximity to the Anaheim Convention Center close. We try our best to accommodate all of our guests and it is a great pleasure knowing you have found our staff friendly and extremely helpful.  Thank you and we hope to see you soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: I slept more comfortably on their bed than my own at home! It was quiet and the customer service was very helpful with repeated calls in advance to help me prepare mentally for the trip. We went to a convention at the Anaheim Convention Center across the street and it was nice to not have to deal with parking/driving. Plus, there was an excellent well priced Alamo/National car rental right next door so when the convention was over we rented a car for a day trip then returned it easily to take the Supershuttle to/from the airport for easy in/out. I hate to tell anyone this because this is one of those 'small finds' you want to be the only one to know about!!!
Manager Response: Dear GodzJoy, Thank you for writing us such a nice review! It is a great pleasure knowing during your stay with us you have found it a convenience for you when you had a convention at the Anaheim Convention Center. We are glad to hear you have found the Alpine Inn a great place to stay. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: I traveled with my young daughter here recently and did not feel safe at all. We stayed for about 5 minutes and being there gave me the creepy chills. The room was hot and muggy and smelled of mildew. It is a MOTEL contrary to what they say. Our room had a dark cove outside of it and didn't feel comfortable coming back to that after being at Disneyland all day. I contacted management and they were not helpful in providing a refund.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking time to write us a review. We do apologize, that your stay with us, was not what you expected. We keep our property a family atmosphere as our guests are going to the Disney Parks. We do have families stay here daily and I am sorry that you did not feel comfortable. We do wish you would of stopped the front desk during your stay, and spoke with our staff, to come up with a resolution for you.  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: So quiet & beds were super comfortable!
Summary: We come to Disneyland often and have been on a mission of trying to stay at all the quaint hotels around the park. This is in the top 3 for us! The staff was very nice, the room was VERY clean and quiet, and after long days at the park, the beds were amazing! We will stay here again for sure!
Manager Response: Dear Mindy P, Thank you for taking your time to write us such a nice review! We are thrilled to hear we are on your top places to stay at for your visit in Anaheim! It is a great pleasure knowing our staff was nice and room was clean during you stay. Thank you for choosing to stay at the Alpine Inn and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Great value. Motel was clean and very close to convention center. There were very many restaurants of good quality to choose from. The service staff was very good to make sure our needs were met. Even though we reused our towels the faucet wouldn't turn off all the way in the tub/shower so not sure how much water we conserved.
Manager Response: Dear jaymickelsen, Thank you for taking your time to write us such a great review! We are glad to hear our staff has met your service standards and you were able to dine around the many restaurants close by. Also, that you found the Alpine Inn very close to the Anaheim Convention Center. Thank you for taking a part to help conserve water and the feedback for the faucet. We hope to see you soon for your future visits in Anaheim!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: The staff was very friendly and informative.The room was clean and the bed was comfy. The hotel is in a great location, centralized in the city. With that being said the noise level is a bit loud, but it's expected especially being next to the greatest place on earth. Very affordable!!! Overall, we had a great experience and would return on future visits.
Manager Response: Dear Lorena A, Thank you for the kind review! It is great to hear you have had a great experience staying with us at the Alpine Inn. We are glad to hear our staff was friendly and informative during your stay. We hope to see you soon with your next visit!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: My wife and I have been here over five times when we came to visit Disneyland in the past. It's a great place with easy walking distance from the park. Staff is friendly and the rooms are perfect. We never bother to even look at other hotels because this place is everything we look for in a hotel.
Manager Response: Dear jaimee489,  Thank you for taking your time write us such a nice review and also a big thank you for being loyal guests of ours! We are glad to hear you have found our location a great place; for an easy walk to Disneyland, friendly staff, and as well as the room amenities.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for your past visits in Anaheim and looking forward to seeing you back soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Excellent Customer Service! Easy to walk to and from Disneyland. Clean room and nice firm mattress! Only complaint would be I wish they had better towels, they were old and small for an adult. It was so nice having breakfast provided - simple breakfast options but the kids loved it. Loved that there weren't additional fees for parking. Great hotel for the price.
Manager Response: Dear SierraMead, Thank you for taking your time to write us such a nice review! It is our pleasure that you have had a great time staying with us and have found the walk to Disneyland convenient. Thank you for your feedback on the towels, as we will look into them.  We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we would love to welcome you back again in the future!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Stayed here for 5 nights whilst doing Disney and Universal. Booked hotel a few months before arriving and received email from them prior to leaving home to confirm our booking and asking if we had any questions or if they could help,in any way, good customer care. On arriving at about 10pm we were expected and made welcome. Rooms were good size and quiet despite close proximity to Disney we were never bothered with any noise. Breakfast entailed going to reception and collecting what you wanted and taking it back to you room, did this couple of times but otherwise as only 15 minutes to Disney and IHOP 5 minutes away used these at times. Must state tho' that Stafft at all times very helpful and friendly and would help if they possibly could. Only criticism is that the rooms could
Manager Response: Dear John Z,  Thank you so much for taking your time to write us such a detailed, nice review! We truly appreciate your feedback . It is a pleasure knowing you have had a great time at Disneyland and Universal Studio while staying with us at the Alpine Inn. We definitely try our best to accommodate all of our guests and it is great knowing our staff were helpful and friendly.   Thank you for choosing us and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Stayed at the Alpine in for 3 nights on the last leg of our roadtrip. Fantastic location and great price for it. Its a 10-15min walk most to the actual entrance of Disney and only a 40min drive max to Universal. We did them both in two days. Great rooms with all the essentials you need, plus plenty of parking. Staff are friendly and was a quick check in and check out process. Walking distance to restaurants too, including Cheesecake Factory. Overall very pleased with our stay.
Manager Response: Dear carls247,  Thank you for such a nice review! It is a great pleasure knowing you have had a great experience with us at the Alpine Inn. We are glad you have found our location to be convenient for you since it is close by Disneyland and the surrounding restaurants. We definitely try our best to accommodate our guests as soon as they arrive at our front desk, it’s absolutely amazing to know our staff were friendly and it was an easy check-in and check-out process for you. Thank you for staying at the Alpine Inn and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: This is such a great location. Walking distance to the convention center and Disneyland. The price can't be beat. We only paid 129 a night (+ taxes). Staff was amazing. They even let us park our cars there after we checked out because our tournament wasn't quite over.
Manager Response: Dear volleyballdad2016,  Thank you for taking your time to write us a review. It is a pleasure to hear you have found our price affordable and location to be convenient for you to the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland. We do hope to see you again in the near future!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary: Alpine Inn is a short walk from the Disney entrance, maybe 10-15 minutes. It's also waking distance from affordable restaurants if you tire of spending money in the park. There is a Panera, I-Hop, etc. within walking distance, a 7-11 (get water to bring into the park) and a CVS. The location is great.  The motel itself is no frills, as you probably shouldn't expect at this price point. The rooms are small, bathroom is tiny, but all was clean and comfortable. The continental breakfast is the worst continental I've ever had- sugary, pre-wrapped pastry and muffins, sugary, boxed cereals, no fresh fruit or anything "real". Again, for the price I think that's probably to be expected, but I would consider that you'll need to feed your kids somewhere else when choosing this motel.  The
Manager Response: Dear KelliJ9,   Thank you for taking your time to write us a detailed review. We are glad you have found our location convenient to Disneyland, restaurants that are nearby, and as well as 7-11 and CVS. Thank you for your feedback on our basic continental breakfast. We offer pre-wrapped pastries, muffins, boxed cereals, apples and oranges, to help our guests have a fast and easy grab-to-go breakfast items while heading out. Although, we do appreciate your review and are always looking for ways to improve the complimentary continental breakfast for our guests. If you do plan on coming back for another short Disney trip, please feel free to give us a call and we would be more than happy to book the room right away for you! We hope to see you soon!  Best, Derrick L. Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Enjoyed our Stay at the Alpine Inn
Summary: We really enjoyed staying at the Alpine Inn.  All of the staff, including the cleaning ladies were very nice and always ready to help with a smile.  Kevin and Rudy at the front desk went out of their way to make us comfortable and welcomed.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa H,  Thank you for taking your time to write us a nice review! We are glad you felt welcoming with our front desk, Kevin and Rudy and as well as our housekeeping ladies. It is an absolute pleasure knowing you have enjoyed your stay with us at the Alpine Inn. Thank you for choosing us and we hope to see you soon!  Best, Derrick L.

Summary: I was here for VidCon 2016 and to visit Disneyland. We stayed 5 nights, and had a wonderful time. Our room was clean, and we were provided with a larger mini fridge than we were expecting. The staff was absolutely amazing, kind, and was committed to providing us with the best experience possible. I would absolutely recommend staying here, as it is right across the street from the convention center, and a 10-15 min walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Peyerate,  Thank you for writing us such a nice review! It is a pleasure to hear you have had a wonderful time with us at the Alpine Inn. We are glad to hear our staff members were able to provide the best experience possible for you during VidCon and visit to Disneyland. Also, we are glad you have found the distance both to the Anaheim Convention Center and to Disneyland convenient for you. Thank you for recommending us and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Best, Derrick L.

Summary Heading: Great service and very affordable rooms
Summary: I had stayed at more expensive places on previous trips to Disneyland, but after reading the favorable reviews of the Alpine Inn, I decided to give it a chance.  I had a group of 21 that needed lodging, so I wanted to save money, and did with the Alpine Inn.  The people working the front desk were friendly and very helpful.  Anything that I needed, I knew I could come to them and they would help me out.  The rooms were fairly basic, but definitely look well kept.  They aren't shabby at all.  The carpets look like they could use replacing or a very good cleaning, but the furniture and bed were in nice shape, the TV, fridge and microwave all looked fairly new, and the bathroom was clean and looked like it had been updated recently.  The breakfast is very spartan, but it's free and
Manager Response: Dear Scott G,  Thank you for taking your time to write us such a nice, detailed review! Thank you for giving us a chance and we are glad you have enjoyed your stay with us at the Alpine Inn! We are glad to hear our front desk were friendly and helpful during your stay. Thank you for your comments on the carpets, we will definitely take a look at it. We do appreciate any suggestions from our guests; therefore, we are always trying to improve our breakfast items. We are more than happy to make some changes or adjustments that would best satisfy your needs and possibly other guests as well. We are glad to hear the walk from our property was an easy walk. Once again, thank you for writing such a detailed review and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Best, Derrick L.

Summary: I will most definitely stay here again next time I go to Disney!  Fast and friendly check-in, and very attentive to our needs.  Clean, remodeled room.  Quiet property.  The best part:  a short walk to Disney.  All this for a reasonable price.
Manager Response: Dear Todd L,  Thank you for writing such a nice review on our property! We are glad that you it was an easy and fast check in process.  Also, that it was an easy and short walk to Disney. We would love for you to stay with us again in the near future!   Best, Derrick L.

Summary: Is it 5 star, of course not for the price.  Is it the best 2 star hotel an easy walk to the Disneyland entrance, 100% yes.  Clean (very important), with comfortable beds.  Acceptable free continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear radiojg,  Thank you for taking your time to write us a review! It is a pleasure to hear that you have enjoyed your stay with us at the Alpine Inn. Thank you for choosing us and we hope to welcome you back in the near future!   Best, Derrick L.

Summary: We stayed at the Alpine Inn for a week long trip (3 days at Disneyland, one day at the beach and one day at Sea World).  The beds were nice and comfortable. Same with the pillows.   The AC was quiet (which was nice at night).  The sink / vanity are outside of the bathroom, which was nice.  Lots of room to store clothes and other items.  The free breakfast in the morning was cold cereal and some pastries...  Our room was on the second floor in a corner, and even though it was at the top of the stairs, I never really heard anyone outside, and didn't really hear that much outside noise at all.   It's within walking distance to Disneyland (about 10 minutes from the Disneyland gate), Free parking.  Free WIFI. Front desk staff was very helpful and friendly.   Decent price.  At night,
Manager Response: Dear amellen944,  Thank you for your detailed review! We are thrilled to hear you are very happy with your stay with us at the Alpine Inn. We are glad to find out there was hardly any noise that may disturb your sleep. It is great to hear you have had a comfortable stay in the room with the sink placed outside of the bathroom, the AC unit, plenty of space to store your clothes, and a comfortable bed for you to rest up at night. We are glad to hear our staff was helpful and friendly during you stay with us. Thank you for choosing us and we hope to welcome you back soon!  -Derrick L

Summary: Awesome hotel. Awesome staff.  Short walk to disneyland.   Continental breakfast every morning.  Big room.  Refrigerator. Microwave.  Amazing bed.  Quiet hotel.  Security day and night.  Pool was maintained.  Property was maintained.
Manager Response: Dear m2a7j,  Thank you for taking your time to write us a review!  We are glad you have had a great time at the Alpine Inn! It is great to hear the walk from our property to Disneyland was a short walk for you. We do our best to provide our guests a safe and quiet environment and it is our pleasure to find out that is what you have felt during your stay.  We hope to welcome you back soon!  -Derrick L

Summary: Stayed here for the closeness to Disneyland. This inn was Perfect for us. The rooms were clean and and the staff was really helpful and friendly. I would recommend this place to friends and would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear kelseyrae24,  Thank you for taking your time to write us a review. We are glad to hear our property was perfect for your stay. Thank you for recommending us and we hope to see you soon!  -Derrick L

Summary: We were looking for a clean, friendly, reasonably priced hotel within walking distance to Disneyland and this exceeded our expectations.  The parking was free, there was a quick breakfast counter (cereal, yogurt, fruit, etc) and we walked to the parks.  Our room was a bit musty when we first wake in, but no problem--- we just turned on the air conditioner and all was well.  They must have remodeled recently.  There were granite sinks, quartz tub surrounds, and fluffy linens!  We used the money we saved for a character breakfast and World of Color dining package.  We were in the parks all day, so we were totally satisfied with the hotel. We even liked that it was a retro motel type place!
Manager Response: Dear DCEowner,  Thank you for taking your time to write us such a great, detailed review on our property! We are thrilled to hear you have found our property clean, friendly, and reasonably priced! It is great to hear you have had a great time staying with us and at Disneyland. Thank you for choosing us and we hope to welcome you back soon!  -Derrick L

Summary: Our Girl Scout troop of 6 girls and 2 leaders was very pleasant at the Alpine Inn.  We booked 1 family suite and 1 two queen room. The girls are 17 and 18 years old and they had plenty of room for all their stuff and it made it nice they could all stay in the same room. My family is planning a trip back down that way and we have already booked rooms for our stay at the Alpine Inn.  Kevin the desk clerk was very helpful and pleasant any time we saw him.  Thank you everyone at Alpine Inn for making our trip wonderful.
Manager Response: Dear kggiraffe,  Thank you for writing us a great review! We are glad to hear our staff members have made your trip wonderful. Thank you for booking rooms with us at the Alpine Inn. We will see you soon and we hope to welcome you back for your future trips.    -Derrick L

Summary: My two daughters and I stayed two nights at the Alpine Inn.  First of all, when I was searching for a hotel to stay at for our trip, I was looking for location and value.  I really didn't want to pay the room prices for a fancy hotel when we were going to be at Disneyland all day and most of the night.  We just needed a clean, safe economical location to stay at.  I searched the web and read the guest reviews on all of the surrounding hotels near Disneyland.  After about an hour of searching, Alpine Inn seemed to be the location with the best "bang for the buck" and it had a majority of good ratings.   Stay Experience:  Pros:  Very clean lobby and rooms.  The staff was extremely friendly, helpful and professional.  Looking at the design of the Inn in general, you can tell it's
Manager Response: Dear spit74,  Thank you so much for taking your time to write us such a nice detailed review! We are thrilled to hear you have had a fantastic experience with us at the Alpine Inn. It is great to hear the location of our property has been a convenience for you to the 7-11, CVS, Coffee Bean, and the walk to Disneyland. We are glad to hear that our staff has been friendly, helpful, and professional during your stay with us. Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Alpine Inn! We would love to welcome you back soon!  -Derrick L

Summary: I called a couple nights before our stay to book an extra night. Not only were they easy too help book the extra night, but the rates had dropped. I asked if I could get the cheaper rate and they gave it to me for all three nights of our stay. The rooms were clean, the beds were comfy, the walk to Disneyland wasn't horrible. The only thing I would ask for was a better breakfast. Over all, a very pleasant and comfortable stay.
Manager Response: Dear Lori P,  Thank you for writing us a review! We are glad to hear our staff was able to help you book another night easily. It is wonderful to know our rooms were comfortable for you. Also, we are glad to hear that it was an easy walk to Disney. Thank you for your suggestion! We appreciate the feedback for our breakfast and are always looking for ways to improve it. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you soon!  -Derrick L

Summary: We had a very pleasant stay here. The room was clean, the beds were comfortable, the staff was friendly and the location was great!! We walked to Disneyland with three small kids and it only took about ten minutes.
Manager Response: Dear lorenac155,  Thank you for writing us a review! It is amazing to hear you have had a pleasant stay with us at the Alpine Inn. We are glad the location of our property was an easy walk to Disneyland. Also, we are glad to accommodate you during your stay with us with our friendly staff members and providing a clean and comfortable room for you. Thank you and we hope to welcome you back soon!  -Derrick L

Summary: Wonderful staff and excellent location for the price which was great as well.  Room was clean, even the carpet, no issues with cleanliness what so ever.  Noise level was minimal and never an issue with the kids sleeping. Beds and pillows were always clean and very comfortable to sleep on.
Manager Response: Dear cgc0909,  Thank you for writing us a nice review! It is great to hear the location of our property, price of the rooms, and our helpful staff has been a great experience for you. We are glad to hear the beds and pillows were clean and comfortable and the minimal noise level didn’t cause any issue for your kids’ sleep.  Thank you for choosing us and we hope to see you soon!  -Derrick L

Summary: Great place to stay if you are going to the park. It was about 10 to 20 minutes easy walk. Our room was on the first floor. There was no elevator but we don't mind the stairs. The room size was okay. It was clean. Everything in the room looked good. Wifi was free. They offered us free breakfast at the lobby (although we took a no-breakfast package when we booked the room). They had cereal, muffins, fruits, biscuits, coffee, tea, milk and orange juice. We could hear and see a bit of Disney California Adventure from the hotel but once inside, it was quiet. We like it.
Manager Response: Dear Lailiah,  Thank you for taking your time to write us a great review! We are glad to hear we have been a great place for you to stay at. It is great to hear the walk to Disneyland was an easy 10-20 minutes walk. Our basic continental breakfast is complimentary for all of our guests that are staying with us. Thank you for choosing us and we look forward to seeing you soon!  -Derrick L

Summary: I have stayed at the Alpine Inn many times over the past 10 years and is on my short-list of places I stay at in the Disneyland Resort Area.  I choose to stay here because their rates are some of the best of any hotel within a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland and my experiences here have been consistent over the years, so there's no surprises.  Nothing fancy here, it's the classic L-shaped hotel with a pool in the middle of the parking lot.  I don't usually take advantage of hotel amenities as I prefer to spend my time at the parks, so this hotel is perfect if you just want a clean, comfortable and quiet place to stay.  This is not the place for you if you want lush landscaping, a buffet, gym or a reproduction of the Sisitine Chapel ceiling above your bed. The staff at this
Manager Response: Dear Storm619,  Thank you for taking your time to write a detailed nice review of us! We truly appreciated it! We are happy that the quality of your stay with us has been consistent each time you visit. We are glad that you have enjoyed your stay with us based on our location, price, and service quality. If you do plan on another trip to Disneyland anytime soon. We would love for you to stay with us again! Hope to see you soon!  - Derrick L

Summary: This is a two story inn. There is no elevator. It's a smaller complex which made for great parking. Most people are able to park right in front of there room and parking is free. There is also a free continental breakfast. It's basic but just what you need.
