There was a selection of individually wrapped Danish and muffins, instant oatmeal, yogurt, small boxes of cereal, and fruit. There was coffee, hot water for tea or hot chocolate, milk, and oj. The staff was friendly. Room was clean and neat. The walk to Disneyland was about 20 minutes. 7-11, coffee shop, cans convention center close by, as well as a CVS. Hotel met our needs and our price.
Manager Response: Dear christ123454321798,  Thank you for taking the time to write us a nice review! We are glad our basic continental breakfast has helped you start off your day. We are glad the walk to Disneyland and close by shops were convenient to you. We do try our best to provide excellent customer service and clean rooms. It is great to hear you have enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to seeing you soon!  -Derrick L

Summary Heading: The perfect place for a Disney stay!
Summary: Clean, well kept, and very accommodating. Made my Disney experience that much better!! Breakfast was good and the pool was very clean! The people working were kind and helpful with my disneyland itinerary and let me know where the good places to eat in the area were. I Highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Madison S,  Thank you for your review! We are pleased that you enjoyed your Disney experience. It is our pleasure to help you with good restaurants to eat in the area. We are glad to hear you have enjoyed our basic continental breakfast and as well as our pool. Thank you for recommending us! If you plan on another trip to Disneyland. It would be our pleasure to make your experience as enjoyable as your last visit. Hope to see you soon!   -Derrick L

Summary: Clean rooms, comfy beds, friendly staff and not an overly priced to stay if your looking for a place to crash.  Not a Fancy smancy place but this place just works. We stay here over and over and over without any disappointment.
Manager Response: Dear Boltmann55,  Thank you for taking your time to write us a review! It is a pleasure to provide you a good place to stay with clean rooms, comfortable beds, and our friendly staff. Thank you for staying with us and hope to see you soon!  -Derrick L

Summary: This place had an aura of simplicity, yet an elegant feeling for the safe and relaxed atmosphere and friendly people around. Close surrounding to fun places at reasonable price. Very clean and good location, a hidden treasure!
Manager Response: Dear Luvcat7,  We appreciate such a positive review! We are thrilled to find out you have enjoyed your stay with us and felt safe during your stay. We are glad you have found our property a great location to surrounding places at a reasonable price. We would love for you to stay with us again. Hope to see you soon!  -Derrick L

Summary: The people working at Alpine Inn are exceedingly nice and helpful. The rooms adequate and prices reasonable. The convenience of parking here having a place to return to that is close and comfortable and knowing you can get help when needed. The Alpine Inn hits the spot. We have stayed here for these reasons a few times now when visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear sfickers,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review! It is our pleasure to help you out in any way to provide you the best experience during your stay with us! Thank you for choosing us. We look forward to seeing you soon!  -Derrick L

Summary: I stayed here while visiting Disneyland and this location was perfect. Clean rooms, nice amenities in room, and a pool for those hot Southern California days. Good continental breakfast (small things, cereal, muffins, pastries) and a 10 minute or less walk to Disneyland, Downtown Disney, and California adventure. Would definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Dear brandonn_mcc,  Thank you for your nice review! It is a pleasure knowing you have enjoyed your stay with us at Alpine Inn. We are glad to hear you have enjoyed our breakfast items and got to enjoy the pool. Also, that it was an easy walk to the Disney Parks. Thank you for recommending us and hope to see you soon!  -Derrick L

Summary Heading: Good place to stay near Disney
Summary: Alpine Inn is a good enough place to stay and is walk able to Disneyland - in fact to many good outlets nearby like Bubba Gump. Thank goodness the tv was an LCD because usually its the old ones. The only inconvenience was the breakfast. It is arranged in the reception area, which doesn't really have a dining place. The timing is 7-9 am, which isn't justified since people wouldn't wake up before 9 am after an entire day at Disney and driving to LA. Had to miss breakfast on both days. Good place to stay anyway
Manager Response: Dear Nadiaasif,  Thank you taking the time to write us a review. We are happy, that the walk was convenient to get to the Disneyland and restaurants nearby. We do appreciate the feedback and will take in consideration the hours of the continental breakfast; just know, if you do get a later start, you can always stop by the front desk and we can provide you with any breakfast items we serve. Thank you again, and look forward to you returning back to the Alpine Inn.  Best, Derrick L.

Summary: We stay here quite frequently and the entire staff treats us like family!!  We are always greeted with a smile and the accommodations are exactly what we have requested.  Although the rooms are not large, they are quite adequate and meet our needs.  It is the hospitality of the staff and the quality of our stay that keeps us coming back.
Manager Response: Dear Disneyfanatic1944,  Thank you for taking your time to write us such a kind review. We always look forward to your stay with us and and have for many many years. Thank you again and welcome you back to the Alpine Inn soon!  Best, Derrick L.

Summary Heading: No Frills, Close Walk to Downtown Disney & Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here for only one night in a 3 queen suite, great for our family with 3 teenagers. "B-" for cleanliness.  "A" for comfy beds and quiet sleep, "A" for staff help.  Easy check-in; friendly staff. I paid through Trip Advisor which was smooth. Our room was large enough, but the bathroom smelled. It turned out that the toilet was plugged. After calling the front desk, someone came to our door to help within minutes, which was nice. Parking is tight. If you check in earlier in the day, you can secure a good parking space.  Truly a 13-15 minute walk to the front gates of Disneyland. You could stay here instead of a hotel closer to the Disneyland or California Adventure Main Gates, and save $100 or so per night. With free parking & wifi, it's a better deal than some of the
Manager Response: Dear AthleticTouchmom,  We appreciate that you took your time to write a great detailed review and for choosing us for your Disneyland vacation. We try our best to keep the Alpine Inn a family friendly atmosphere for all of our guest, and happy that our front desk staff we able to help you. Thank you for your feedback on our continental breakfast and we will definitely look into making improvements. We looking forward to having you back in the future!  Best, Derrick L.

Summary: Alpine inn was helpful and courteous. They had a speedy check in and check out process. The rooms were small but clean. The pool was clean and well maintained. The property was spotless. I enjoyed the smallness of the hotel. I'm not a fan of huge hotels. The breakfast was simple. Offered fresh fruit, cereal, oatmeal, coffee, hot chocolate, packaged pastries and muffins, milk, orange juice, yogurt...the chocolate muffin was a big hit with the kiddos. It was a small walk from Disneyland. It took maybe 10 minutes to get to Disneyland by walking. Really enjoyed our stay at this little hotel. Would definitely stay again when visiting Disneyland. Thank you alpine inn!
Manager Response: Dear J8225WOamyj,  Thank you, for your kind review of the Alpine Inn. We are really happy that it was convenient for you to walk to the Disney Parks and that you enjoyed your stay with us. There are definitely perks staying at a smaller property and glad that you appreciated them. Thank you again for taking the time to write us a review and look forward to you staying with us in the future!  Best, Derrick L.

Summary: We had a great 5 night stay at the Alpine inn where staff were helpful especially when we had lost the key to our luggage. It's quite a walk to disneyland, but for the price, it's great value. Will definitely choose to stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Kirari,  Thank you very much for having chosen our hotel and for having taken time to share with us your experience during your 5 night stay. We try and go over and beyond to ensure you have a pleasurable stay and were happy to help you with the luggage situation. We hope to see you again soon, and once again thank you!  Best, Derrick L.

Summary: The room was clean exactly what we needed for our short stay. The pillows are super comfy. Hotel is directly behind cars land and the kids loved that. The staff was friendly. The walk isn't bad to Disneyland. Overall we were happy with no complaints.
Manager Response: Hello Ayaeggi,  Thank you for taking the time to write us a wonderful review of the Alpine Inn. We love hearing from our guests, but most of all that you enjoyed your stay with us. Our front desk staff, tries our best for all of guests to have a great experience while going to the Disney Parks. We looking forward to having you stay with us again and once again thank you!  Best, Derrick L.

Summary Heading: Excellent place, within walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: Awesome place, friendly staff, in the city center, 5 MIN WALK to DISNEYLAND and restaurants. 10 minute drive to the baseball stadium (we saw a game while taking a 2 hour break from Disneyland). Parking was a little tight (I wouldn't feel comfortable parking a brand new truck there) but hey PARKING is FREE.  The beds were comfortable and the linen even better (I'm kind of a comforter and sheets snob)!  The room itself was decent, but quite honestly during our weekend stay, we were only in the room to sleep and get ready.  I passed on the 'continental breakfast'; the food wasn't even something I'd eat as a snack. Instead I walked across the street to ihop, and of course if you need an immediate pick me up, the Coffee Bean is directly across the road. All in all, great place for
Manager Response: Dear Agentlxpx,  Thank you very much for your detailed and nice review of the Alpine Inn. It is always a pleasure to hear that you found it convenient to get to the attractions and restaurants around the resort area and even watch an Angels game. Our parking lot can get a bit tight during certain times but always ensure that every room does get one free parking spot. We are also happy that you found our beds comfortable and linens up to par. We looking forward to having you stay with us in the future and once again thank you!  Best, Derrick L.

Summary Heading: Another GREAT Disney vacation and stay at the Alpine Inn!
Summary: Again, my family and I visited the Disney parks and loved our stay at the Alpine Inn. From the staff to the actual hotel in its self you can't go wrong. Amazing place to stay! The in room amenities are perfect for resting and getting ready for your next day at the parks. This hotel is just a quick 12 minute walk from to/from the entrance of Disneyland and California Adventure parks. Book today and enjoy your stay!
Manager Response: Dear Tahoesnowman,  We are grateful for this nice review you took the time to share with us and all TripAdvisor’s readers and travelers. We are delighted that your stay was consistent to your previous. We love having regulars come back at the Alpine Inn and seeing familiar faces. We look forward to your next stay with us, and thank you again!  Best, Derrick L.

Summary: i stayed here for 1 day. and stayed in the pier for 3 . and if i did it again i would probable stay at the Alpine for the 4 days and save 800 dollars . none of the 3 major hotels on disneyland grounds have microwaves. and with 2 young children it was a must . (warm milk).The T.V. at the Alpine was larger and better than the one at the suite. At the Alpine i didn't have to wait for long elevator line cause the don't have any elevators . didn't have to park far away and pay 17 dollars a day to park . At the Alpine i was able to park right in front of my room and that was convenient when retrieving anything and when leaving.  also very close to downtown disney, restaurants and stores. a/c in room.
Manager Response: Dear Jay,  Thank you so much for your kind review of the Alpine Inn. Being a smaller property, we are ecstatic that you found a lot of the advantages of staying with us. We hope you see you again in the near future and once again Thank you!  Best, Derrick L.

Summary: The Alpine Inn has great value for Disneyland annual pass holders, college students, friends, and families looking for affordable housing walking distance from the park gates. The double queen room we stayed in was kept in excellent condition. We were able to get plenty of rest and a quick complimentary breakfast before our days of fun. The free parking, wifi, and breakfast were paramount in choosing our hotel in the area. The Alpine Inn had everything we needed at by far the most lucrative price point.
Manager Response: Dear Scott,   We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for the time you have taken to share your positive comments. We are delighted that you had a great Disney Vacation and enjoyed all of our amenities. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!   Best, Derrick L.

Summary: The Alpine Inn is a great family friendly option close to Disneyland. The rooms aren't huge but they're clean and well maintained. The hotel staff was excellent and really tried to make our stay enjoyable. I highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Cameron,  We appreciate that you took your time to write a great review and for choosing us for your Disneyland vacation. We try our best to keep the Alpine Inn a family friendly atmosphere for all of our guests. We are also happy that you were satisfied with our housekeeping services. Reading your review keeps us motivated to keep ensuring our guests a great stay, consistently, at the Alpine Inn. We looking forward to having you back in the future!  Best, Derrick L.

Summary: I loved it here, had no problem.  The room was clean, they had small breakfast items & cofee ;).  We mainly just slept there and around the corner from Disney. Left our car and walked right over.  Front desk was nice and helpful.  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Letty,  Thank you for taking time to write us a wonderful review! It definitely is a pleasure to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and found it convenient to get to the Disney Parks! We look forward to having you stay with us in the future!   Best, Derrick L.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, very close walk to Disneyland.
Summary: This is a great hotel for the money. Awesome customer service from the front desk, room was always prepared when we came back from our long day at Disneyland. Would definitely recommend this hotel to others and be back for another stay.
Manager Response: Dear Richard,  Thank you for writing us a positive review! We do our best to provide a warm atmosphere for our guest. We do appreciate that you found your room clean and prepared, coming back from Disneyland. Thank you for recommending our property to your family and friends and we will look forward to welcoming you back soon!  -Derrick

Summary: The rooms are older so the appliances in tub and toilet were ok but toilet had issues so had to hold down handle to get it to flush and used a lot of water by the time it finally flushed.   Overall was clean, the carpet is dk. brown and based on the dirty bottom of socks could probably use a good shampooing. Front desk staff very nice.  Very small parking lot so that made it tough if you were out and returned late and trying to find a spot to park.  Overall not a bad place to stay if your not planning to be in room much. What you get for the price was a bit high I thought.
Manager Response: Hi Mitzi,  Thank you for taking the time to give the Alpine Inn a review. We take all our reviews seriously, and are always looking for ways to make your experience the best. I will personally look into the solutions to your issues you had with your bathroom, as well as the carpet. Again, thank you very much for staying with us and writing your review. We hope that you will provide us with the opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence and trust in us.   Best, Derrick L.

Summary: This hotel is really good value for the money.  The staff were really professional and friendly.  The location to Disneyland is the best.  We were able to walk and not pay for parking for our car.  The rooms are a bit old but they have a refrigerator and are clean. Also included was continental breakfast and it was tasty.  Even though it was small you felt very safe and secure.
Manager Response: Dear tartan3673,  Thank you for taking some time to write us a positive review. We are happy it was convenient for you to get to Disneyland and also enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!   -Derrick

Summary: Good value for being within walking distance of disneyland.  Rooms are modern and clean.  Staff very nice and Continental breakfast adequate.  Would highly recommend staying here.  Hotel is very close to 711 and cvs pharmacy and great ice cream parlor named tiffs nearby.
Manager Response: Dear rosed412,  Thank you so much for your review on our property. We are pleased you have enjoyed your stay at Alpine Inn and found it convenient to get to Disneyland and the nearby stores. We look forward to welcoming you back!   -Derrick

Summary: My stay was great!  The price was excellent.  The staff was friendly, helpful and always available.  I was able to park my car there all day during my visit to Disneyland.  And it is close enough to walk to/from the Magic Kingdom.
Manager Response: Dear heathern0515,  Thank you so much for your review on our property. We are pleased to read that you enjoyed your time spent here with us at Alpine Inn. We look forward to welcoming you back!  -Derrick

Summary Heading: Stayed here for the Tinkerbell half marathon
Summary: Great location! We have 4 kids under 7 and two adults and the room was great! We payed $10 extra for a crib in the room and it fit perfect. Traffic in this area is crazy but We never had to use the car once because everything you needed was close by.  Took about 15 minutes to walk to downtown Disney.  The free breakfast muffins, yogurt and milk were great for us and the kids in the morning.
Manager Response: Dear Gina P,  Thank you so much for your review on our property. We are pleased to find out you have enjoyed your time spent here with us at Alpine Inn. We look forward to welcoming you back!  -Derrick

Summary Heading: A great hotel at a bargain price
Summary: The Alpine Inn is a small, older property near Disneyland.  However, it is very clean, the service was great, and the location was a 10 minute walk to Disneyland.  Although we didn't check in until 8:00 p.m., we were able to park in front of our room which made it easy to unload our luggage.  The room was quiet with very little traffic noise.  Because it is an older property the bathroom was small and plain, but there was good water pressure and lots of towels.   The continental breakfast was adequate, and we utilized the refrigerator and microwave in our room.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear chocolate1Phoenix,  It is an absolute pleasure reading your review of your recent stay with us! We are thrilled that you have enjoyed your stay at our property. Please let us know when your next visit will be and we will definitely make a reservation for you in advance!  We look forward to seeing you soon!  -Derrick

Summary: We always have a clean comfortable room. Close to Disneyland and Anaheim Convention Center. Friendly, helpful staff. Newly renovated. Contend tall breakfast and free parking. Great room for the price. Darrek rocks!!!
Manager Response: Dear Linda A,  Thank you so much for your review on our property. We are pleased to find out you have enjoyed your time spent here with us at Alpine Inn. We look forward to welcoming you back!  -Derrick

Summary: A quaint older hotel with the Disney style charm of an Alpine Inn complete with snow on the roof! The only issue is the small parking lot- out of their control. It was clean, beds comfy and the small pool was warm and deep at 9'. Big enough for me to do a few laps and shallow enough at 3' for the kid. Best of all was the welcoming, smiling staff. I even left behind some Disney souvenirs and was called shortly after I left. They offered to mail me the items and they did so the following day! Unheard of. Its a short , pleasant walk to Downtown Disney through the lobby of the California Grand Hotel. And it is located on the back side of the Cars ride. Fun to hear screams every once in awhile but did not affect sleeping.
Manager Response: Dear bribrifitz,  It is an absolute pleasure reading your detailed review of your recent stay with us! We are thrilled that you have enjoyed your stay at our property. Please let us know when your next visit will be and we will definitely make a reservation for you in advance!  We look forward to seeing you soon!  -Derrick

Summary Heading: Good value, close to the parks
Summary: We chose the Alpine Inn based on reviews we had read from various sources (including Disneyland forums.) We were pleased with the cleanliness of the hotel and the proximity to Disneyland. It's about a 10 minute walk to the main gate.   The front desk staff was always friendly, whenever we made a mid-day stop back to our room they would smile and wave to us as we passed by the office.   If you are a Disneyland first-timer and have been to Walt Disney World (as we had) before visiting, you'll find the room size and set up comparable with WDW value resorts.   I'd recommend the Alpine Inn to people looking for an affordable place to stay very close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear alisaurus,   Thank you so much for your review on our property. We are pleased to that you enjoyed your time spent here with us at Alpine Inn. We do focus on and value your overall experience and thrilled that our staff was able to provide a friendly environment.  We look forward to welcoming you back!  -Derrick

Summary: Location was perfect. A 15 minute walk to Disneyland or a $10 taxi ride. CVS & 7 -Eleven 2 minutes away that came in handy when my 3 year old needed milk and many gift stores and food places near by. Room was clean except carpet. Carpet was stained and dirty. It was hard to keep my 3 year old shoes on. Her feet were black within in minutes. We had to lay down towels for rugs. That was the only down fall. Otherwise we had comfy beds and pillows and all the necessities we needed. There was an odd smell to air conditioning. Pool was nice too,  but again you couldn't walk from the pool to your lawn chair without your feet turning black. It's nothing fancy, but ok if your looking for a comfy affordable place to stay. I would stay here again if carpets are changed. Not sure if it was
Manager Response: Dear Cher691,  Thank you so much for your review on your recent stay with us. Please allow us to extend our sincere apologies to the cleanliness of the carpet. We do regularly clean our carpet and we will continue to maintain the cleanliness of the carpet on a regular basis.  We hope we will be able to provide you another opportunity to restore your faith and regain your confidence in us.  -Derrick

Summary: Good place to stay for the price. It backs right up to the Cars ride in the California Adventure park but noise wasn't an issue. The pool (which we didn't use) is in the middle of the parking lot. Free parking for guests and complimentary breakfast are the two biggest perks. The breakfast is just come pastries, fruit, yogurt, milk, orange juice, coffee etc. but it gets the job done. 10-15 min walk to the park. Check in was slow and we all got some allergies from our room.
Manager Response: Dear Jacob,  It is a pleasure reading your review on your recent stay with us! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay! We are sorry to hear your experience with the check-in was slow, we will definitely work on that and we will look into more to it with the room. If you would like to further discuss with us, please feel free to contact us!  -Derrick

Summary Heading: Can't Beat It for Anaheim Convention Center Meetings
Summary: We loved our stay at the Alpine Inn!  My wife attended a conference at the Anaheim Convention Center.  She could walk across the street and reach the convention hall in about 5 minutes.  This is probably the closest hotel to the convention center other than the super expensive Hilton.  The room was very clean and had a modern feel.  There was a frig and microwave available.  The TV had cable with plenty of channels.  The bathroom was clean with standard white towels.  For breakfast, there were plenty of packaged pastries, coffee, milk, yogurt, small OJs, hot water, and some fruit.  It's not a big spread but it's nice enough to have a decent bite in the morning.  Parking is tight.  That's going to be true at most of these hotels around Disney.  We always had a space to park (once
Manager Response: Dear EdLee247,   Thank you so much for the reviews of your recent stay with us. We definitely try our best to have our staff members do his or her best to meet and exceed guests’ expectations! We are glad you are satisfied with our guest service. Once again, thank you for your review! We look forward to seeing you in the near future!  -Derrick

Summary: If you plan on visiting Disneyland and are looking for places in the area ,Alpine  Inn is definitely a must. It is located within walking distance of Disneyland. The staff is just amazing. Despite arriving earlier, and the gentleman being on his lunch break, we were able to check in with no delay. The rooms are absolutely what I wanted. It was very clean, with beds that were extremely comfortable. They have a pool that is open from 9-9, and I felt safe walking to my car during the night. There are plenty of parking spaces and I had a very good nights' sleep. Thank you to the Alpine Inn, I will definitely be staying there again.
Manager Response: Dear Skaracol,  Thank you so much for your kind review! We are pleased to read that you enjoyed your time spent here with us at Alpine Inn. We look forward to welcoming you back!   -Derrick

Summary: The room was good and the staff helpful. I would stay there again. It has a good location as you never have to cross a busy street. It gets the job done. The breakfast works also. I suggest hitting up the souvenir shop on the way in. Its located on the corner as you walk in.
Manager Response: Dear Joe M,  Thank you so much for your review on our property. We are pleased to read that you enjoyed your time spent here with us at Alpine Inn. We look forward to welcoming you back!  -Derrick

Summary: This is a little gem among all the giants!  I was very impressed with our room. Very neat, new looking and most of all super clean! The room was very quiet.  We had adjoining rooms with our grandchildren.  I enjoyed the convenience of leaving the car and walking to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear T9782JTjan,  It is a pleasure reading your review of your recent stay with us! Please let us know when your next visit will be and we will definitely make a reservation for you in advance!  We look forward to seeing you soon!  -Derrick

Summary Heading: Simple, Clean, Comfortable lodging within walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: We visited Disneyland / CA Adventure for three days and needed to be able to give our young son a nap each afternoon, so our lodging needed to be within a reasonable walking distance.  We chose the Alpine Inn based on other reviews, with the goal of keeping our lodging costs down.  We found the Alpine Inn to be clean and comfortable and the price very reasonable.  I have read different estimates of the walk time from the hotel to the Disneyland entrance.  We timed our walks and found our average walk time to be about 15 minutes.  While there were times we wished we had stayed somewhere closer, overall, the walk was not bad.  The room and beds were very comfortable and the staff were friendly and accommodating.  They offer a very simple cold continental breakfast, which helped us
Manager Response: Dear jkwebb1,  It is an absolute pleasure reading your detailed review of your recent stay with us! We are thrilled that you have enjoyed your stay at our property. Please let us know when your next visit will be and we will definitely make a reservation for you in advance!  We look forward to seeing you soon!  -Derrick

Summary Heading: Low cost but very high value
Summary: For my family's first holiday in the US, Alpine Inn made our stay really comfortable - both for our wallet and for our body.  What the place had to offer was all very basic but the staff made it all worthwhile and very satisfactory.  I have to give special mention to Dereck (I hope I spelled his name correctly).  From the moment we first stepped into the front desk, he was consistently 1 step ahead in terms of diligence to meet our needs.  Our room was well kept everyday.  The place was very peaceful.  It only took a 15 minute walk to Disneyland.  They had a laundry service that cost only $34 for a very big plastic bag to fit your clothes.  Well done Alpine Inn and thank you.
Manager Response: Dear yglopaz,  It is an absolute pleasure reading your detailed review of your recent stay with us! We are thrilled that you absolutely enjoyed your stay at our property. Please let us know when your next visit will be and we will definitely make a reservation for you in advance!  We look forward to seeing you soon!  -Derrick

Summary: The Alpine Inn offers simple and clean accommodations for a very good price. We had a family suite that offered an additional bedroom which was a very nice feature of the hotel. The only complaint we had from our stay was the noise from the occupants above us. We had the misfortune of staying underneath a wild group and the ceilings were just not insulated enough to muffle all the noise. I would recommend the hotel but would suggest a reservation on the top (2 floors) floor.   Terry B
Manager Response: Dear Teresa B,  Thank you so much for your review on our property. We are pleased to read that you enjoyed your time spent here with us at Alpine Inn. Please let us know when your next visit will be and we will definitely make a reservation for you in advance!  We look forward to seeing you soon!  -Derrick

Summary: This is a no frills inn located right outside Disneyland. So for people looking for convenience to Disneyland or the Anaheim Convention Centre, this is a great location. However, do not expect the bells and whistles of more modern hotels and inn. The interior is quite dated.
Manager Response: Dear Lester L,  Thank you so much for your review of your stay with us. We are constantly updating and making changes so our guest can have the best experience. We hope that you will provide us with the opportunity in the future.  -Derrick

Summary: Cute little hotel! Nice rooms. Comfortable beds. Great service! Nice contential breakfast and hot coffee each morning. Quiet location even though it is right behind Disney California Adventure. Nice heated pool. Friendly staff! 10 minute walk to the Disney parks so you don't have to drive. Will definitely come back to stay again!
Manager Response: Dear mbrice 76,  Thank you so much for your review! We are looking forward to welcoming you back!  -Derrick

Summary: This establishment was clean and the beds were comfortable.  It was within walking distance to Disneyland and California Adventures.  In addition it was walking distance to good restaurants including Cheesecake Factory which is my favorite. The only things adverse were no elevator to second level so I would certainly request a ground floor room and there was no hot tub.
Manager Response: Dear joanalajoie,  Thank you so much for your review on our property. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time spent here with us at Alpine Inn. We can always accommodate requests on the ground floor so please let us know so we can assign the correct floor for you. We are happy you were able to explore the Garden Walk area and get a nice meal at the Cheesecake Factory. Once again thank you,  and we look forward to welcoming you back!  Best, Derrick L.

Summary: The front dek management were extremely nice and helpful. Enjoyed a basic coffee and pastries for complimentary breaksfast.  Was given a token for any ice needed.  Outside parking and landscape was clean.  Pool was clean.  The water was too cool for me.  I requested a ground floor room as they do not have elevators and I parked my car right outside my room. The hotel is on the older side.  The bed & linens were very very clean and comfortable.  When I entered it had a musty odor.  They didn't have any hair shampoo or conditioner, only six bottles of lotion.  The management changed them out. This is for the manaement...you could remove the acoustic "cottage cheese" ceiling to update and remove the odor .  I also spilled water on the carpet.  I used the white towel to soak it up.
Manager Response: Dear sandiegogogal2015,  It is a pleasure reading your review on your recent stay with us! We are happy to hear our front desk staff are very helpful and nice during your stay. We will definitely bring the issues you stated to our attention and please be rest assured we have taken each and every piece of feedback very seriously. Please feel free to contact us directly, if you would like to discuss about it furthermore. We hope we will be able to provide you a better experience with us for your next stay. We hope to see you soon!  -Derrick

Summary: We arranged for my daughter's family to stay here so they could spend 2 days at Disney. My husband and I were only up to do Disney for one day and wanted to go back to San Diego . We arrived in Anaheim at 7:30 am for the day with 2 cars and the front desk staff let us check in early without accessing our room. We were offered coffee, the bathroom and juice. They did not have to do this but they did. Most importantly, my daughter was allowed to park her car in the lot early and we were able to park for only $15. So convenient. After a long day at the park, we walked the 2-3 blocks back to the hotel. The next morning, my daughter and her family were able to get a nice breakfast of cereal, juice and coffee. When they found out they had a dead battery in their truck, the front desk
Manager Response: Dear lynnTexas,  It is an absolute pleasure reading your detailed review of your recent stay with us! We are thrilled that you and your daughter's family absolutely enjoyed your stay at our property. We definitely try our best to have our staff members do his or her best to meet and exceed our guests’ expectations! We are glad you are satisfied with our guest service. Please let us know when your next visit will be and we will definitely make a reservation for you in advance!  We look forward to seeing you soon!  -Derrick

Summary: I always stay at Alpine, very friendly, very satisfying, the only issue was parking but I understand you can't help that.  I love that your close to Disneyland and other family activities.  We had the room with 2 queens and a king.  Great for the entire family!!!
Manager Response: Hi jananadler,  We are pleased to hear you and your family have been enjoying your stay with us at Alpine Inn. Unfortunately, our property is smaller compared to other properties; therefore, parking may be hard. Our location is definitely an easy access to Disneyland and other family activities. Once again, thank you for choosing your stay with us! We would love to welcome you and your family back for your next trip!   -Derrick

Summary: Very nice place to stay, comfortable beds. The only problem was being on the 2nd floor & trying to get luggage up the stairs, but staff was right there to help. VERY convenient being across the street to the Anaheim Convention center where our conference was! VERY HELPFUL staff! Thanks! Marge M
Manager Response: Dear Marge,  Thank you so much for your review on our property. We are pleased to read that you enjoyed your time spent here with us at Alpine Inn. Yes, unfortunately we do not have an elevator at our property; therefore, carrying your luggage upstairs may be difficult. Not really worth it.   Room: Clean, comfy bed, a/c, tv etc. No problems.  All in all a good little place to stay. Loads around too, shops and eateries. Can't really go wrong.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was a great value. It was the lowest price of all of the hotels near the Disneyland resort and was exactly what we needed it to be. While it is not the fanciest of hotels, it was very clean. The rooms are average sized and updated. The bathroom was clean but is due for an update. The best part about this place is the location. It sits right behind California Adventure and you can see parts of the park from the hotel. We timed the walk to the Disneyland Resort entrance and it took us 11 minutes! That can't be beat for the price! All in all it was a great stay! Thank you Alpine Inn!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I were going to Disneyland for two days and needed a place to crash at night that provided free parking. We wanted a basic room that was safe, clean, close to Disney, and fit our budget. That's what we got at Alpine Inn.  We stayed in room 103 and it seemed clean. It did not have an odor and the linens were fresh. The bathroom was a little run-down, but it wasn't that bad. I am a germ freak, so I never go barefoot in hotels, but the carpet didn't seem unusually dirty or worn. There was an unusual heat wave during our stay, but the room's A/C unit kept us comfortable.  The free parking was a big plus for us, since we planned to walk to Disney and leave our car at the motel. It's about a 15-minute walk to the parks from the hotel, but it's mostly shaded and a
Manager Response: none

Summary: We chose this hotel as we were attending a convention right across the street at the Anaheim Convention Center so great location for that.  Rudy at the front desk was very friendly and helpful.  Rooms were plenty big and comfortable with microwave and mini fridge.  It is on the backside of California Adventure which we visited 2 days. It is a 20-25 min fast walk to the entrance of Disneyland or California Adventure, with no shuttle not sure if would be great location for little kids. There are lots of eating choices within a 5-10 min walk.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Booked for 2 nights, and then extended for another 2!
Summary: I am always suspicious of reading reviews online, and wonder whether the good ones are written by pro-company sponsors, while bearing in mind that of course the people with the worst experience are the most likely to write reviews.  I'll keep this short.  The rooms were very clean and the price very reasonable.  Wifi was good, and staff friendly.  Having a fridge in your room is also nice.  It was close to Disney where we spent one day, but decided to stay an extra two nights because it was a good launching point to go and visit other places nearby, and the quality/price couldn't be easily beaten.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great fun time - Alpine Inn - Thank You
Summary: Thank you Alpine Inn. This place is great to stay at. We had a blast!!!!!!!  This hotel was very clean and it was walking distance to Disneyland. The staff is extremely nice.  We really enjoyed our stay and thank you!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Clean and close by for Disney, very nice staff
Summary: We stayed 2 nights here for Disney. It was a 10 minute walk to gate, movie theater and good restaurants at Garden Walk within walking distance.  Judy at the front desk was VERY helpful when I left behind an expensive mobile device and is mailing to me no problem.  I really appreciate that in service.  The price was just right for the fact that we were never in the room.  We did go in the pool which was clean and refreshing. We would stay here again if ever in the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: They had very friendly staff, clean rooms comfortable beds excellent location at a great price. It was just a short walk from Disneyland. I definitly  enjoyed my stay. I give the Alpine Inn two thumbs up!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We came to alpine inn to stay two nights. Staff we friendly, rooms were clean and location was perfect! Disneyland is an easy walking distance and there is plenty of food and restaurants close by despite what other reviews say!When we had to change our plans and book another night the staff were super helpful and it was no dramas at all!  Thanks for the great stay!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was clean,staff was excellent and I would stay at this hotel again.  Great place to stay. This hotel is close to Disneyland as well as the Convention Center(within walking distance)and there are restaurants at all price ranges available. There is also a refrigerator and microwave available in the rooms which can help to keep your costs in line.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: 1 of the 3 front desk associates so rude I almost cancelled my reservation!
Summary: Booking the reservation and changing the reservation online, no problem.  However, I did put a note in both times to be contacted about our late check in and to confirm they would hold the room. No response either time.  We had MASSIVE flight delays and cancellations (7 delays, 2 cancellations).  I called the first day when I knew we weren't going to make it and the gentleman on the phone was very pleasant (Do not know his name, but has an Italian look to him?  Slicked back hair anyway).  I knew I was going to get charged for the room per their policy, but he was nice about it.  When I called on the 2nd day, not knowing when we were going to make it, but knowing it would be after check in because of the delays, the man I got was INCREDIBLY RUDE!(Indian man)  I let him know we
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Professional staff, ideal location, and clean rooms.
Summary: I recently stayed at the alpine inn for a trip to disneyland. I picked the motel based on the reviews, and they lived up to what other's have said. The staff is very courteous and professional, they truly care about their client's needs. I think they may have been the owners, but I received the best customer service I've ever experienced at a hotel/motel.  The rooms were adequately clean, and the linens and bathroom were cleaned thoroughly. Not totally spotless, but the key areas were very clean (clean linens and bathroom) and the rest was clean for the most part. The building is old, but the rooms have been updated with nice furniture and updated beds and fresh linens. I really liked their premium cable on the HDTV, and I was able to watch all my favorite channels, and they
Manager Response: none

Summary: Myself and my two teenage daughters spent 3 nights here as a base for visiting the Disneyland parks. Both parks are only a 10 minute walk away with numerous places to eat on route. Don't worry if you don't fancy the limited breakfast there is a great smoothie bar around the corner with excellent smoothies, croissants and bagels.  WiFi reliable and fast, room very clean, roomy and comfortable. This was the cheapest but by far the best value accommodation during our 2 week trip around Southern California.  Don't waste your money on the bigger hotel chains in the area, the Alpine Inn has everything you need for a family trip.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Loved our stay at the Alpine Inn!
Summary: We stayed for a week during our recent trip to Disneyland. We've stayed at quite a few other hotels in the area on previous trips, and loved our time at the Alpine Inn. First experience walking into our room we discovered it smelled great & was super clean. The rooms weren't huge, but for our family of 4, it was fine. We didn't spend a lot of time there anyways. We loved that it had a fridge. Because we had a car, we drove to the grocery store & picked up items for snacking & beverages. We were able to supplement the breakfast provided by the motel. We enjoyed the pool everyday. When it got too hot and busy at the park, we came back & cooled off.  The kids loved that! The walk wasn't too bad, we were glad to not have to pay for parking.  The cleaning ladies were amazing! Super
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for a two night trip to Disneyland on our way down to San Diego.  We have visited Disneyland a number of times and usually stay elsewhere.  I wanted to find a place a little closer than we usually stay.  The hotel or rather motel is an old motor court.  The rooms are very clean and very updated.  Parking is tight when they are booked up with people parking in weird locations as space is limited.  People at the front desk are very nice and helpful.  The breakfast spread is wrapped pastries and cereal with juice and milk.  I drove to McDonalds and got breakfast it was better and easier.  The only real complaint was that the air conditioner never cooled the room well and that the upstairs visitors could be heard stomping across the ceiling all night long.   I most
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everyone working at the Alpine Inn was knowledgeable and friendly. We stayed there for two nights while visiting Disneyland and it was the perfect location! The main entrance was a 10 minute walk from the inn.  Because we were only staying for two nights, we didn't need any new towels or sheets so we put the do not disturb sign outside the door. When we came back in the evening there was a personalized message saying that the room hadn't been cleaned but we could call at any time and get new towels/sheets if we changed our minds. It was a small detail but it was really very nice.  Overall the rooms were very spacious and clean and a great value for the location!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great and affordable  place to stay near disneyland
Summary: The rooms are clean and the staff is super friendly. The pool is also clean and family friendly. This is not a five star hotel but It is a great and affordable  place to stay near Disneyland less than 10 minute walk or $5 taxi! Great value for your money.  Parking is free and no extra fees like other hotels.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice staff and we felt that the room was safe and clean. With the parks being so close by it is only about a 10 minute walk. I have stayed at many motel/hotels around the Disneyland area and this is one of the beter. We look forward staying here again in the near future.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is an affordable hotel that is conveniently located close to Disneyland. The rooms are clean and have a pleasant odor. It's not very large of a room, but the beds are comfortable. You won't be in the room for long anyway!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Worst place we've stayed at in States
Summary: We booked this hotel last minute and arrived late with 2 exhausted kids, the room was not clean....2 filthy towels were in the sink and what looked like blood stains on the flat sheet and pillow case. The room had a very bad smell of drains. We checked out the next day and moved to a hotel nearby, a fews hrs later realizing we'd forgotten our toiletries in the shower. We called the hotel to let them know we'd collect them the next day assuming they would be in their lost/found.......all 5 (full) items were allegedly thrown away accidentally! I would strongly recommend against staying here.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice 4 night stay for a family with two little kids.
Summary: The hotel grounds and room were very clean. Room was updated. It was always quiet. Bathroom was so-so but good enough. Continental breakfast was not much to brag about...granola bars, cold cereal, coffee and juice. The walk to Disneyland was a couple of blocks. Definitely a decent walk pushing a stroller. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I've found my new favorite Disneyland-area hotel! My daughter and I stayed in the 2-queen room, second floor for 3 days, then moved to a first floor, family room for 3 more days. Loved the rooms. You are directly behind Radiator Springs Racers so on occasion you do hear screams from people on the ride, but only if you have the bathroom window open, which we opened JUST TO HEAR the sounds from Radiator Springs! We loved that! The walk. My daughter (19) and I (44) tend to walk fast. I timed our walk, Alpine door to Disneyland door was 10 minutes. It's a do-able walk, even after a full day at Disney/DCA, and it's a safe, enjoyable walk!  The greatest thing was surprising my friends, who had never been to Disneyland before. I was able to switch to the family room just before they
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is where we always stay when we go to Disneyland. It's close, clean, and cheap. Before we went to Alpine this trip, we had spent time in San Diego and were miserable at the hotel we stayed at which was twice as expensive--on discount! So yeah, this place is totally worth it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location of the hotel was excellent! Unfortunately parking is a big problem there since there is hardly any space, at one point we had to park on the side of the reception.  Staff there is very helpful and friendly and the complementary breakfast saved us money as we were on a tight budget.  Overall this added to our wonderful vacation experience and we would definitely stay here once again.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  I am glad to learn that you enjoyed your Disney vacation. Our location, service, accommodation and price all set us apart from our neighbors. The simple complimentary breakfast fuels the guests before a fun and exciting day at Disneyland. It is wonderful to hear from our guests that we have done our job right. Thank you again.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Excellent customer service, grear value abd very close to Disneyland.
Summary: Great place to stay in, just a walking distance from Disneyland. Good size rooms, clean and comfortable beds. Nice breakfast to start the day and very friendly staff. Thanks Kevin and Jovie for a great customer service. Thanks also to the ladies who kept our room clean.  Keep up the good work and God bless.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  I am blessed to have great front desk staffs like Kevin and Jobbie to provide great service and wonderful housekeeping ladies to keep our rooms clean and comfortable for the guests to enjoy. I understand the needs of the guests after a long fun day at Disneyland and glad to learn that we have provided for you. Please do come back soon to visit us again.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: 3.8 star Hotel & Close walking to Disneyland (like Paradise Pier is to Disneyland)
Summary: Love the location of the Alpine Inn which was very close to Disneyland which we wanted.  It is about the same distance from Disneyland resort Paradise Pier is to Disneyland Park.   We have stay at all of the three Disneyland Resorts Hotels in the pass and they are excellent hotels but expensive.  We chose Alpine Inn because of the affordable Price and the reviews we read online.  We were very please to fine the hotel very clean and the beds were comfortable. It had a fridge and microwave in the room, and coffee in the morning.  I wish that Bananas were included in with the fruits that they did have for us in the continental breakfast.  Friendly staff.    I am not much of a walker, but I was able to walk to Disneyland in the morning with no problem.  It was in the evening when I
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your review. We are within walking proximity to Disneyland and offer free one parking per room. Our guests can enjoy the easy stroll to the parks and the saving of $15.00 a day on parking. Besides the free parking, all of the rooms are equipped with microwave, refrigerator, LCD TV, iron and ironing board, coffee maker and hair dryer. There is also onsite guest laundry and an outdoor heated pool to be enjoyed year round. Thank you again and we look forward to serving you again.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: If you're looking for a hotel within walking distance (about 10-15 mins) to the Disneyland Resort, this is a great place to stay. I've stayed here a couple of times, and I would love to stay here again but it's usually not in my budget to do so. (I tend to stay further out from the resort as I get free parking with my annual pass, so I can save a lot more on hotels not within the vicinity.)   However, if the budget allows, this would be the place to go. The walk is not too bad to the resort, and you can stop by the 7-11 on the corner of Harbor and Katella if you need to some drinks/snacks to bring into the park. This 7-11 is convenient to have nearby, in general, since you have a fridge and microwave in the room. So if you don't have car, just walk on over and get what you need
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your review and the twice stays with us. We do offer clean and comfortable accommodation with microfrig, free Wi-Fi and parking. We usually offer the best rate in the Disney resort, please do give us a call the next time you visit. Thank you again.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: I originally had a reservation at the Marriott across the street as I was in town for a 3 day conference at the Convention Center. My stay was 5 days and sharing a room with only 1 other person was going to be quite expensive. The "M" was more expensive per night, had to pay $12/day for WiFi and no complimentary breakfast. Quite the opposite at Alpine Inn! We each saved more the $300 by switching hotels and walking a little to the Convention Center. Comp breakfast was typical cold stuff and hot coffee. Hotel staff were all super nice and never hesitant to help with anything! The only reason I'm not giving 5 stars is because at times the internet connection was slow. Overall I highly recommend it and if ever in the area again, will definitely be staying there!!
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you and your colleague. The advantage of been a small property, we can provide personal service and affordable price. However, we do not compromise on service and accommodation. On the issue of Wi-Fi, we are upgrading our system and it will be a better and improved when you visit us the next time. Thank you again.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: The rooms were comfortable and clean, air conditioner worked great. We walked to Disneyland each day without a problem. We were able to have adjoining rooms which I thought was very nice of the hotel to do that for us.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  I am glad to learn that we are able to accommodate your and your family with adjoining rooms. As part of our service, we pay careful attention when assigning rooms each day. If it is allowed, we will try our best to put families close together. We understand that Disney visit is to make memorable experience for years to come. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your next visit.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: The hotel is small and nothing fancy, however it backed up to thfacade of Cars Land... that's how close you are to it all! The rooms are nice, the bathroom is a bit lacking, but for the price (and the fact we didn't spend any time in the room other than sleeping) it was fine.  The walk into downtown Disney is 10 minutes or less.  Next time we come back, we will definitely consider staying again!
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your review. We are located within 10-15 minutes walking proximity to Disney parks and right behind California Adventure Park Cars Land. Our guests can truly experience the Disney visit as soon as they pull in our parking. Beside the great location, our service and rate are a big plus as well. Please do come and visit us soon.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Great personnel, great amenities, great time!
Summary: Room came complete with refrigerator, microwave, iron/ironing board, comfortable twin beds (with 4 pillows each!), big color TV, clock radio, etc. - everything a traveller needs! Our check-in guy was super helpful (we weren't aware Disneyland offers discounted entry after 4pm!), and the maids were super nice, too. Highly recommend!  Mike Ferguson/Hawaii PS.  and free wifi - that actually worked!
Manager Response: Hello Mike,  A wonderful review from someone who lives in one of the most famous travel destination and understands the meaning of hospitality, we are truly honored. What make a property special are the people behind the scene. I am fortunate to have great front desk staffs, housekeeping ladies and maintenance personnel. Thank you for your review and look forward to serving you again.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: This is a typical run of the mill motel, conveniently located to Disneyland and Disney California, this is a no thrills motel. The room was pretty plain, the TV was a decent size, and the room was fairly clean.  Check in was pretty easy, the man at the front desk was not overly friendly, a little curt. We stayed for 3 nights, we tried to checkout early due to some other circumstances but you have to have at least a 48 hour notice for cancellation so we just stuck it out as to not lose our money.  I can't say that I agree with that policy, seems how emergencies arise and its hard to control, I get 24 hours but 48?   Our other problem was the maid service, they were extremely slow.  They did manage to come and take our towels away fairly early but other than that it was after 3:30
Manager Response: Dear guest,  I am so sorry that your stay was not up to your expectation. I value the importance of guest feedback and appreciate the comment on the housekeeping service and heated pool. I will take personal attention on both issues and would like to invite you back to the improved service. Please call me personally at (800) 772-4422 and I will assist you on the reservation. Thank you and look forward to your call.   With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: 15 minute walk to entrance of Disneyland.  Very clean room and helpful front desk person. Had no problems will stay. Would stay there again. Shopping center and restaurants within walking distance. And 7-11 like 3 minute walk.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us your short right to the point reviews. I love it. Please do come and visit us again in the near future.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: Locatioi is key! The Inn is right behind California Adventures and within walking distance of Downtown Disney (20 mins.) the rooms are quite basic so go for it only if you are not planning to spend much time in the room. Breakfast is pretty average, hard to even call it breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your review. We are a no frill property but always strive to provide best rate, great service and clean rooms. Unfortunately we have not met your satisfaction. I will speak with my staffs and make necessary changes to better serve our guests in the future.   With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: Nice clean Rooms. Continually Updated when needed. They are always replacing carpets and mattresses and refinishing furniture. We've been staying there every six months or so for many years. You can find cheaper places to stay but you get what you pay for.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your wonderful review and your patronage. Our goal is to better serve our guests and wish all can make memorable experiences. We are constantly looking for new ways to improve our service and update room accommodation. I am definitely certain when you visit us the next time, we will have new improvement to surprise you. Thank you and look forward to your next visit.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: I am very pleased to have a 5 days and 4 nights stay at your Alpine Inn... The frontdesk service was great... They greet us with a very pleasant smile and very helpful too.... Alpine was also located in a very convenient area.. IT is just a walking distant to Disneyland and also to eatery places.... I am looking forward and will come back to stay with Alpine Inn.. Thanks and regards
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your review. We strive to provide the best service and make our guests feel right at home. With walking proximity to Disneyland is always a plus. Please do come back and visit us in the very near future.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: Arrived late at night for a five night stay, warmly greeted and smoothly booked in.This would be more a motel than hotel establishment with rooms opening directly onto the carpark. Very clean, comfortable room, good bathroom although vanity unit is at the end of the room and not in the bathroom itself. Comfortable beds, and immaculate housekeeping daily. Very helpful pleasant reception staff, always ready to advise and give directions as needed, also book transport as required. Free light breakfast a plus. Close proximity to Disneyland, restaurants and convenience stores, always felt safe walking at night, for two elderly ladies a plus. Good value for money, would recommend.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your wonderful review. I also have traveled with my girlfriends and understand the  importance of safety. At the same time, I like to come back to a clean and comfortable accommodation after a long day of sightseeing. We at Alpine Inn try to service our guests like our family members and friends. Thank you again and we look forward to your next visit.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: My son and I stayed there 3 nights and were very pleased. Clean and comfortable room, very helpful and friendly staff, good wifi, reasonable rates for the area, 10 minutes walk from Disneyland. I would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We strive to provide great service, accommodation and price for all guests to have the best time with wonderful memories for years to share. Kids are growing too fast and I am glad that you and your son had enjoyed the Disneyland visit. Please come back and make more memories with your family and friends soon.   With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: I spent five nights in this wonderful location.   My room was clean and well kept with an excellent ac unit (I like sleeping in a cold room).  I found your location to be conveniently located for Disney as well as the convention center.  The front desk people were very helpful whenever I had a question or needed help with an issue.  I would not hesitate to recommend the Alpine Inn to family or friends.  I would like to have had a restaurant closer for that late night/early morning cup of coffee.  The 55 year old kid in me will be back for Disneyland fun next time.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  I am so glad to hear that you had a great time while visiting Disneyland. I too am 55 years old and still feel like a kid when I travel. Thank you for recomendating us to your friends and family and we look forward to seeing next time.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: My family stayed for 4 nights and we were very pleased.  The room was clean, had a fridge, and microwave.  I thought that the price was perfect for what we needed....a place to shower and sleep.  My only complaint was that either I was hugging the wall or hugging the a/c unit.  The walk to Disneyland is a leisurely 10-15 minutes.  20 minutes at the end of the night.  There's a 7-11 very conveniently located several doors down and area felt very safe.  We enjoyed the pool during mid day breaks from Disneyland.  We had no issues finding parking, but quite honestly, we left a few times for meals and that was it.  Breakfast was basic, but perfect for the morning march to Disney.  I personally think this motel is as close to walk as some that claim "right across from Disney."  My
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your review. I personally read all the reviews to find areas to improve. In the case of the AC, I am afraid that my hands are tight due to the layout of our rooms. However, I am glad you find everything else to meet your satisfaction. From a senior contribution on Tripadvisor, I thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Please visit us soon.   With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: Stayed for 3 nights and couldn't have been happier.  Our room was clean and just enough for us.  It's a short 15 minute walk to Disneyland.  It's nice to have a fridge and microwave.  The free breakfast is plain, but easily eaten on the walk to Disney.  We never had issues with parking, but I could see how others who came in late might.  If I had a complaint, it was sleeping next to the air conditioner.  I think we might have been spooning we were so close.  For the amount of time we spent in the room, this motel is perfect.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  For me a great value means the product and service exceed the money spends. This is my goal when setting up the rate and amenities offerings to make sure the guests will leave with great memories and still have some pocket changes. Thank you for the kind comment and please come and visit us soon.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for  Alpine Inn

Summary: Upon arrival the staff was friendly and helpful.  This hotel is a mature two tier hotel without elevators with remodeled interiors.   Parking is tight so if you have large trucks get there first.  The room is a good in size and the beds are full size. The room we got was clean and did not smell old. Fridge and microwave included. Small Breakfast Include, granola Bars,  Cereal, Fruit And Muffins. Coffee, hot chocolate and milk also.  Laundry machines available and ice machine on site.  This hotel is a short walk to Disney but seems to be farther after a long day at the park.  Supply yourself at the seven 11 on the corner with drinks and snacks for the park. Also there is a 24 hour Subway nearby.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  I am so glad that you found us and decide to stay with us out of 110 other hotels in the Anaheim Disney area. Thank you for your kind comment on our clean room, friendly staffs, convenient location and complimentary breakfast. I am proud to say that we have over 50% repeated guests and would like to invite you back to visit us again in the near future. Thank you.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: We stayed here in June of 2014 in a second-floor room. The staff was friendly and accommodating, and the rooms were good as well. This hotel is located right behind Cars Land at Disney and across the street from the Anaheim Convention Center. It's suitable for families and business travelers alike. There's an in-room fridge and microwave, and also free wi-fi (just get the password from the front desk).   It's about a 10-minute walk to Disneyland Park and it was extremely convenient to come back during the day and rest.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for staying with us early this month. I am glad that you had enjoyed your stay with us. We are a no frill property and yet offer clean rooms, comfortable beds, great service and convenient location for both leisure and business travelers. Please come and visit us soon.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: We have stayed at this property several times,  for only one night & extended visits to DLR. It is easily the most economical  place to stay within an easy walking distance to the parks.    It's a quick 15 minute walk from your door to the Disneyland queue, which is about as far as I am willing to walk after being on my feet all day.  The rooms are small and basic, but always clean, tastefully decorated and well maintained.  Staff is friendly and helpful, rooms are always cleaned early enough for an afternoon break from the parks.   This stretch of Katella is far quieter than staying on Harbor Blvd., which has noise all night long from the proximity of I-5 and deliveries/vendors using Harbor.  I have issues sleeping sometimes, so I really appreciate the quiet.    For extended
Manager Response: Dear guest,  You are absolutely correct on our affordable rate. Yet we do not cut our services to our guests. With complementary WiFi, parking, in-room microve, frig, iron, ironing board, coffee make, hair dryer and brand new LCD TV with premium cable channels, the guests can enjoy all the amenities that a large properties offer. The convenient location and the quietness of Katella are also a plus for guests to choose to stay with us. Thank you for your wonderful review and we look forward to serving you again in the near future.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: A great value for a 10 min walk.
Summary: This wasn't the first time we stayed here. The rooms are clean & the walk isn't too bad. We saved over $60 per night instead of staying at another place across the street from Disneyland. For that amount, 10min walk isn't bad.  Plan on staying at Christmas too.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your review and your patronage. We understand that our guests need a clean and comfortable rest after a long day at Disneyland as well as an affordable price. Our team at Alpine Inn are providing all of those needs. We look forward to your visit during Christmas holiday.  Have a great summer and see your soon.   With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: This was my 2nd stay at this Inn, my mom's first. We had a long weekend visit to Disneyland for her bday in early June 2014. We were able to check in early, albeit with a $20 fee. Probably should have looked into that before we booked, as there was another hotel right around the corner at a similar price that may not have charged that. Either way, check in was smooth and got a room downstairs. The bedding is updated and the rest of room is slightly older, yet clean. It is walking distance to the parks - walk through the Grand California hotel and you'll be dropped off in Downtown Disney close to the entrances. Also if you already have your tickets and are going to CA Adventure, we were able to walk through Grand California's entrance straight into CA Adventure after 11am. Back
Manager Response: Dear guest,  I would like to thank you for staying with us the second time and taking the time for your valuable review. I am glad that we were able to accommodate you on the free parking after you have checked out. As for the $20.00 early check-in fee, it is our standard fee for guest checking in before 10AM. We do offer free storage of luggage at our front desk. Again, thank you and we look forward to serving you the next time you visit Disneyland parks.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: It was your basic no thrill clean hotel. We where there to spend majority of the time at the parks so all the thrills was not needed. Very good customer service. Felt safe walking back from parks by my self. Will stay again.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  With location right behind California Adventure Park, it is an easy and safe walk of 10 to 15 minutes to the entrance of Disney Park. Even though we are a no frill property, we do offer free parking, free WiFi, in-room microwave, frig, coffee maker, hair dryer, iron, ironing board, color LCD TV and premium cable channels. Everyone at Alpine Inn welcomes you back to visit us again. Thank you.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: It's a really good option if you have a limited budget and the location is perfect! Disney California adventure is behind the hotel, you can see the roller coaster so you can walk to both parks and Downtown Disney (it's a 10 min walk). They sell the tickets at the hotel and they give you a better price than internet! For eating, breakfast is poorly in the hotel but you have many restaurants around the hotel like IHop, Tiffany's, Coco's, Denny's and many others. For shopping there is a shuttle bus that you can take at the big hotel stops that goes to South Coast Plaza that is like 20 min far, it cost $10 round trip and children under 17 don't pay. In brief is a really good option to save money and spend it in other things that are more important like the theme parks, food and
Manager Response: Dear guest,  'with the convenient location to Disney parks, convenient store, shopping mall and restaurants, you sure have made the right choice to stay with us. We understand with the current economic situation and offer affordable rate so guests can spend money in other areas to make the vacation memorable. We look forward to your next visit.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: My daughter and I have been going to Disneyland for 23 years in a row now, we have stayed at this hotel for many of those years, I find it to be clean staff is very nice and helpful, we will be returning here again and hope to stay at this location again, the price is great within walking distanc to the Disneyland park, and at night it is very quiet so you can get a good rest before returning to the park!!
Manager Response: Dear guest,  It is so wonderful that you have such great relationship with your daughter. I too just traveled with my dad last month and we too had a wonderful time as well. As an hotelier, I want to make sure each stay for our guests to be as memorable as possible. To hear that you will return again had put a smile on my face. Thank you for your kind review and I look forward to your next visit with your daughter.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: I looked around for the best price. With in walking distant to the "D". I found it. Very nice front desk. I forgot the name of the guy at night. It was very nice to talk to him about his grandfather. Nice snack breakfast. Great clean room, cleaned both days. I walk slow and the walk was about 15 minute. I will tell everyone about this Lovely hidden gem.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  By reading your review, I noticed that you are an avid traveler. To receive such wonderful review, we know that we did our job. Thank you for your feedback, we will continue to do do our best to serve all our guest. Thank you and hope to see you soon.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Excellent stay for family time. Great distance from Disneyland Park & Disneyland California Adventure.
Summary: Great stay!! Perfect area for Disneyland Park & California Adventure! Perfect strip to walk around & the Garden Walk isn't too far from the hotel. The receptionists were really awesome & helpful! That matters to me the most too! I am planning to stay at the hotel again and again. Decent pricing and loved the pool. Thank you guys so much!!
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your wonderful review. We too look forward to your visit with us again and again.   With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: We stayed from May 22 thru May 27 2014. Hotel was recommended by a frequent  traveler to Disneyland and it lived up to their recommendation. Walking distance to Disneyland, free parking and great value.   Wifi could have been better
Manager Response: Dear guest,  I am so glad to learn that we have lived up to your expectation. Please thank your friend for us. In regard to Wi-Fi, we are in the process of upgrading the speed and new equipment. I am certain that you will experience a better, faster and more reliable Wi-Fi at your next visit with us. Thank you and look forward to see you and your friend soon.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary Heading: Best place to stay in Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is a hidden gem! We had such a wonderful time staying here! I would recommend this hotel to everyone! Kevin is very friendly and he made the whole experience great right from the start.  The cute look of the hotel with the snow on the roof and it is so close to Disneyland about an 8 minute walk which is good for Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  I am so happy that you had a great time visiting Disney parks while staying with us. Kevin is a friendly and wonderful person. He always makes sure the guests' needs are taken care of. I am do fortunate to have Kevin on our team.  I like to thank you for your stay and your review. Kevin and I look forward to see you soon.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: Heated pool, walking distance to Disneyland. This is a perfect hotel for people wanting to visit Disneyland on a budget. Nice, clean rooms, free parking and wi-fi.  For the money, look no further, it is very good value.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your concise description of our property and I cannot say it any better. Everything you stated is our goal to provide to our guests. Thank you again and we look forward to your next visit.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: I stayed at the Alpine Inn from May 3rd to May 10th 2014. It was a great place to stay because  1) It had free onsite parking, right outside my room. 2) The room was reasonably spacious, and included 2 large beds, a large flat screen TV with plenty of free channels, drawers and hanging area for clothes, a good fast shower (and bath), and a coffee maker 3) The reception staff were friendly, swift to get me checked-in, and very helpful when I had to call Disney to make a dining reservation 4) It only took 10 mins to walk from my room to Disney, and by that I mean from the hotel room right to the Disneyland Castle, so included the bag search and a brief queue at the Disneyland turnstiles 5) The room was cleaned and fresh clean towels and flannels were provided every day 6) There is
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for giving us your wonderful review. Our goal is to provide clean and comfortable room, affordable rate and friendly service to all our guests. I am glad you that we have made your trip to Disneyland enjoyable.  Please come and visit again soon. Thank you again.  With warmest regards, Judy Pao for Alpine Inn

Summary: Rooms are nice and clean and recently updated.  Free parking is a plus and is only a 10 minute walk from Disneyland entrance.  We always stay here when going to Disneyland.  Great for families, traveling with friends and couples.  Perfect little motel for everyone.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your review. I am so glad to hear that you had stayed with us a number of times and referred friends and families as well. We maintain about 50% of returning guests year after year like you. As a small property, it allows us to have the personal connections with our guests. We value the relationship.
